91a1(rgyud 'grel): lus pa ni 'khrul pa'o// de phyir rgyal po rang gi sems// nyon mongs pa dang bral ba ni// dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgrub par bya// ho yig thog ma tha ma'i dbus// yang dag bde ba'i 'bras ster ba// sku
91a2(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// shes rab chags pas de zhub// ri bong can nyid lta bu ru// rdo rje can yang zhu mthong nas// lha mo rnams ni klu lin byed// bcom ldan 'das ni rdo rje can// sum cu pa dang me'i bla ma// sems can
91a3(rgyud 'grel): kun la bde mdzad pa// khyod kyis 'dod pa'i don gnyer ba// bdag cag rnams ni bsrung bar mdzod// glu ni rdo rje can son nas// srid pa gsum ni ma lus la// mig 'phrul lta bu nyid du ni// gzigs nas bskyed pa ru
91a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad de// 'od zer dri ma med pa 'phro// mtshan ma bcas pa spro bar bya// rdo rje can ni rgyan dang ldan// rgyal ba'i dbang po'i cod pan can// shes rab kyi ni 'khyud pa nyid// rgyal po shes rab thabs kyis te// slar la yang
91a5(rgyud 'grel): ni dkyil 'khor ba// ma lus pa rnams 'byung bar bya// sngon po'i 'od 'phro 'jigs pa'i gzugs// rab tu bzhad pa yi ni zhal// zla ba phyed pa mche gtsigs pa// sgra ni sgrogs pa me'i spyan// gnyis lhag pa yi rgyal
91a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyag/ rig byed zhal la zhabs gnyis pa// shes rab thabs kyi yan lag can// mtshon cha rnams kyis yang dag mtshan// rdo rje shugs kyi gzhug par bya// rkang pa brgyad pa'i shing rtanas// rgyal ba'i
91a7(rgyud 'grel): dgra ni 'jigs byed de// ye shes 'khor lo'i rgyu ru'o// mdun du ye shes de mthong nas// rnam pa bcu yi mchod pa dang // sngags rnams kun dang mchod par bya// lte bar lcags kyu yis btab nas// dri med
91a8(rgyud 'grel): pa yi 'od 'phro ba// ye shes 'khor lo dbang phyug nyid// rigs gtso ces pa'i gdong can gyis// zhags pa de nyid rab tu bcing // mtshon cha rnams kyis 'jigs byas te// ma lus pa ni bsgrubs byas nas//
91b1(rgyud 'grel): slar la yang ni log nas ni// rang gi 'khor lo bskor byas te// gzhug dang bcing dang dgyes pa dang // ro dag mnyam par byed pa ni// 'gugs byed la sogs pa yis so// sems nyid rnal 'byor
91b2(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa ni// nang gi pad+ma'i nyi stengs su// nam mkha' dang ni bcas pa'o// shar du 'du byed dang ni sa// lho ru tsher ba dang ni chu// byang du 'du shes me ru 'gyur// nub tu gzugs ni gzhan nyid do// me ru rlung
91b3(rgyud 'grel): dang gzugs su 'gyur// bden bral me dang 'du shes gnyis// dbang ldan chu dang tshor ba gnyis// rlung du sa dang 'du shes ldan// sangs rgyas lha mo'i bar stong la// mtshan gyi phyogs su bdud rtsi'o// ro lir
91b4(rgyud 'grel): bkang ba'i bum pa brgyad// yang ni rim pa gzhan ma yin// steng du sna dang drir 'gyur te// lho ru mig dang gzugs dgod de// g.yon du lce dang ror 'gyur zhing // nub du lus dang reg bya ni// de bzhin du ni
91b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba yin// lho yi sgo yi g.yon du ste// 'og tu rna ba dang ni sbar// rigs kyi dbang gis 'gyur ba yin// shar gyi sgo yi byang du ste// nam mkha' ru ni yid nyid dang // chos kyi khams su 'gyur ba yin// dang
91b6(rgyud 'grel): po thabs ni rnam pa drug/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni lhag pa'i lha// rigs kyi dbang gis 'gyur ba yin// phyi nas shes rab la sogs drug/ rang rang pad+ma'i gdan la ni// gsal ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// shar gyi
91b7(rgyud 'grel): sgo ru stobs po che// rab gtum ral gri 'dzin pa'o// de'i shes rab rengs byed ma// lho ru lkugs byed nga rgyal char// gyur te nor sbyin gyi phyogs su// nga rgyal byed ma rmugs ma'o// nub tu rengs byed brtson
91b8(rgyud 'grel): 'grus dpag med pa// chu lha ru ni gnas gyur pa// sgo yi dbus na pad+mar gnas// lha rnams 'di dag g.yon brkyang ste// rdo rje can gyi a thung ngu// ral gri can gyi oM thung ngu// 'od dpag med pa u thung du//
92a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur te slar yang l-i yig ni// 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi// ring po'i dngos po'i dbye ba yis// dbyangs kyi tshig ni ma lus pa// rigs drug rnams kyis rim pas so// dpal yum gyi
92a2(rgyud 'grel): ni mi shigs brjod// a las skyes pa nam mkha'i khams// I r-I U lI rim pa las/ rlung dang me dang chu dang sa// thams cad 'byung bar ru ni 'gyur// rgyal ba dam pa'i bdag po dang // sna tshogs yum gyi
92a3(rgyud 'grel): bde don du// lus kyi dngos po phan tshun no// mi bskyod pa ni stong pa'i khams// phyag gi pad+ma ral gri can// spyan ma rnams kyi dngos po'o// rin chen bdag po mA ma kI// gzhan yang pad+ma 'dzin pa dang // gos dkar
92a4(rgyud 'grel): mo ni lus kyi dngos// de bzhin 'khor lo can sgrol ma// rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis na// zung dang rnying ba'i dbyangs rnams kyis// aM ni kun du bzang po la// gyur te lus kyi dbang gis na// phyag na rdo rje 'di ni
92a5(rgyud 'grel): a// gyur te gzhan yang de bzhin du// sa yi snying po a ra ro ste// oM ni 'jig rten mgon po ste// de bzhin ar du gyur pa ste// 'di ni sgrib pa rnam sel lus// a ni chos kyi dbyings nyid du// de bzhin du ni nges par
92a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// a las skyes pa sgra rdo rje// e las skyes pa reg rdo rje// ro yi rigs kyi gtso bo nyid// a lAs skyes pas lus dbye bas// oM las skyes pa gzugs rdo rje// gyur te de bzhin mi'i bdag po// a
92a7(rgyud 'grel): las skyes pa dri rdo rje// dpal gyi bzang mo chos kyi dbyings// sgra yi rigs kyi gtso mo dang // phyag na rdo rje yi ni gzugs// nam mkha'i snying po dri rdo rje// ro yi mchog gi rigs gtso dang // 'jig rten mgon po
92a8(rgyud 'grel): yang ni zung // sa yi snying po gzugs rdo rje// reg bya sgrib pa rnam sel dag/ zung du yang ni 'gyur ba'o// de ltar rigs ni drug po dag/ rigs rnams yon tan dbang gis ni// yang dag par ni rig par bya// ya
92b1(rgyud 'grel): la zung gi rim pa yis// stobs dang gnod mdzes ma ni zung // gsal ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// rarka lkug dang nga rgyal ma// rigs kyi dbang gis 'gyur ba yin// wa dang ra ni 'di nyid las// nga rgyal byed pa
92b2(rgyud 'grel): lkug byed ma// la yA gnas mdzes brtson 'grus ma// rigs kyi dbang gi 'gyur ba yin// shes rab thabs ni yan lag dngos// rigs kyi dbang gi 'gyur ba yin// gang zhig gang la khas phyogs pa'i// /
92b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'chang dpal kun tu bzang // rigs kyi dbang gi 'gyur ba yin// mi bskyod phyag na rdo rje dang // don yod grub pa mkha'i snying po// dri med nor bu med pa dang // yang dag par nas snying po// 'khor lo'i
92b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag dang sgrib sel ba// rigs kyi dbang gi 'gyur ba yin// 'od dpag mod dang 'jig rten mgon// rigs kyi dbang gis 'gyur ba yin// dpal gyi yum dang chos kyi dbyings// rdo rje dbyings dang
92b5(rgyud 'grel): sgra rdo rje// rigs kyi dbang gi 'gyur ba yin// dpal gyi sgron ma reg rdo rje// gos dkar mo'i rigs dbye bas// ro yi rdo rje ma nyid do// mA ma kI dang gzugs rdo rje// rigs kyi dbang gi 'gyur ba yin// spyan
92b6(rgyud 'grel): me dri yi rdo rje ma// slar la yang ni stobs po che// don yod grub pa'i rigs las byung // rin chen phyag las lkug pa nyid// rigs kyi dbang gi 'gyur ba yin// 'od dpag med dang rlom byed ma// rengs paM
92b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid dang rnam snang mdzad// rlung dang me dang chus las// brtson 'grus lag med lcug ma dang // nga rgyal can ma rim pa bzhin// nges pa kho na gsal bar ni// gnod ma ru ni rab tu grags// dkyil 'khor
92b8(rgyud 'grel): gyi ni nang dbus su// ston pa lha mo sogs bum pa// lhan cig rgyal ba yi ni sku// sangs rgyas la sogs chos kyi sku// sgra rdor la sogs byang chub sems// longs spyod rdzogs pa yi ni sku// khro bo
93a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni sprul pa'i sku// yon tan gyi ni dbang gis 'gyur// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gnas pa yi// sems can kun gyi don byed pa// sku yi rdo rje zung du 'gyur// rgyal ba'i sku dang lhan cig tu// sku
93a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa yi rgyu ru'o// gsung gi rdo rje chos kyi sku// zung du yang ni 'gyur ba yin// chos rnams ston par byed pa yi// sems dang longs spyod rdzogs pa yi// zung du yang ni 'gyur ba yin// sems can kun gyi don byed
93a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// ye shes dang ni sprul pa'i sku// srog chags rnams la thar ba ster// zung du yang ni 'gyur ba yin// shes rab thabs kyi yan lag dngos// mthun dang mi mthun pa yi rigs// nyi zla a ka la sogs pa// srid pa rnam
93a4(rgyud 'grel): pa gsum song ba// ye shes rnam shes dbye ba ni// rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya// rdo rje gsum ho sA hAr ldan// spyi bor mgrin pa snying ga dang // lte ba gsang ba spyi bo ru// 'di rnams kyis ni lus byin brlabs// mchog gi rgyal
93a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bdag po ni// lha mo rnams kyi 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje phan tshun rdo rje nyid// cod pan du ni 'gyur ba yin// res dga' sangs rgyas lnga yis ni// gzugs kyi steng du mi bskyod pa// g.yas pa ru ni pad mtshan gyi// rnam par
93a6(rgyud 'grel): sna mdzad nyid du 'gyur// rin chen lce yi pad+ma 'dzin// rab mchog nor bu byed pa ni// don yod grub pa'i dbu rgyan no// drug gi cod pan ral pa mdzod// yon tan gyi ni dbang gi 'gyur// lhag ma 'khor lo gzhan dag go// stong
93a7(rgyud 'grel): panyid dang chos kyi dbyings// rigs gsum gyi ni dam tshig dang // ye shes mchod pa rjes chags dang // gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba yi// de yi rang bzhin bdag nyid ni// sgrub pa po yis mchod par bya// du ba la sogs
93a8(rgyud 'grel): bum pa rnams// snying kha chos kyi 'khor lo yi// rtsa brgyad rnams kyi dag pa yin// rig pa rnams dang sangs rgyas rnams// spyi bo yi ni lhan cig skyes// rtsibs ni bcu drug pa ru grags// mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor
93b1(rgyud 'grel): lo yi// mi'i bdag po nyis 'gyur ni// byang chub sems sogs dag pa'o// lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo yi// nor lha gdengs can gyis bsgres pa'i// 'jigs pa la sogs dag tu'o// lag pa rkang pa dag gi tshogs//
93b2(rgyud 'grel): stong pa drug dang me'i grangs// las kyi 'khor lo'i lha rnams dag/ klu dang gtum mo'i bcu drug rnams// sor mo rnams kyi tshigs kyi mtshams// bya ba'i 'khor lo dag par 'gyur// rdo rje can dpal dus dag par// mi'i
93b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag por 'gyur ba ni// lo dang zla sogs dbye bas so// sems kyi snang ba snang ba med// nyi ma so so'i dbang gis ni// sna tshogs yul ni rnam dag pa// du ba la sogs rlung dag pa// rang gi snying ga'i pad+ma ni// rtsa
93b4(rgyud 'grel): yi 'khor lor gnas pa'o// drag po chung ma bcas mnan pa// nyon mongs pa yi bdud bcom mo// khyab bdag zhabs kyi mthil gyis ni// bdud mnan bdud tshogs bcom pa'o// dung dang gaN+DI nor bu dang // ljon
93b5(rgyud 'grel): shing zhes pa de bzhin du// sku'i rdo rje la sogs bzhin// bum brgyad lus ni bdud rtsi brgyad// rgyal ba rnam par rgyal bum pa// byang chub sems dang rdul bstan pa'o// 'du byed don yod grub pa ste// tshor ba rin
93b6(rgyud 'grel): chen 'byung ldan dang // 'du shes 'dod pag med pa'o// gzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad do// khu ba rkang dang khrag dang ni// dri chu dri chen rnam dag pa'i// khams drug rnam dag lha mo drug/ yul dang yul can rnam dag pa// byang
93b7(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' phyag rgyar bcas// khro bo lnga ni stobs lnga nyid// gzhan ni dbang po lnga yin no// rgan byed la sogs brgyad dang 'khor// pad+ma'i 'dab mar song ba rnams// nyi dus chu tshod rnam dag pa'o// bden
93b8(rgyud 'grel): bral la sogs zla bcu gnyis// pad+ma'i 'dab mar song ba rnams// chu tshod kyi ni dbugs grangs tshad// klu dang gtum mo rnams gsang ba// mi yi bdag po nyis 'gyur ro// rtsa rnams kyis ni dag pa'o// de bzhin spyan
94a1(rgyud 'grel): ma la sogs pa// rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis ni// lus kyi bya ba dag pa'o// sgra rnams grub pa ma lus pa// ba smra rnams ni 'byung ba'i tshogs// sa yi steng na gnas rnams so// de nyid
94a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni gtso mtshan tshe// rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis ni// khams rnams dag pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje rnams ni nang phyag rgya// gtso bo yis ni snying du ni// zla stengs yang dag gnas pa'o// rdo rje can dpal sA
94a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs yum// srid pa rnam pa gsum song ba// dus gsum ye shes sbyar bas so// dpa' dag pa las chos kyi sku// tshes las longs spyod rdzogs skur 'gyur// longs spyod rdzogs las sprul pa'i skur// g+hur
94a4(rgyud 'grel): de rgyal ba'i bdag por ni// sems can gyi ni don gyi phyir// bzhi pa gnas ni nyal ba dang // slar la yang ni gzhan ma gnyis// lus kyi dbye bas sad po'o// de ltar lus kyi dbye ba yis// srog chags rnams kyis lus la yid//
94a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa bzhi ni gnas pa yin// sprul pa longs spyod rnams la yid// lus dang dbang gi rjes byed pa'o// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sems lta ba// rigs kyi dbang gis gyur pa yin// chos kyi sku yi gnyid log pa// dag pa'i bde
94a6(rgyud 'grel): bar gyur pa ste// 'di ni nyin dang mtshan dag gis// thig le gsum gyi grol ba'i mthar// de yi phyir ni mi 'dzag don// nyin dang mtshan gyi dus su ni// rnal 'byor pa yi bsgom par bya// g.yon du srog ni rgyas 'gyur zhing // de bzhin
94a7(rgyud 'grel): g.yas su rdul ba dang // de ni g.yon brkyang gnas pa'o// gtum mo lte pa'i 'khor lo'o// dgu la lag 'gro yis bsnun pa// rgan byed la sogs pa yi lha// snying po ha yi ye shes ni// skad cig ma ru snang ba ste// ye shes gzi
94a8(rgyud 'grel): brjid sad pa'o// lte ba la ni rnam snang sogs// bsreg cing spyan ma mig la sogs// thams cad bsreg nas spyi bor gang // zla ba bzang las 'dzag pa ni// thig le de ni rdo rje can// shes rab chos 'byung la gnas pa// slar
94b1(rgyud 'grel): yang thig le nyid las ni// ma lus par ni spros pa dag/ sna tshogs pa yi rgyan dang ldan// me long nang song lta bu'o// ye shes 'khor lo rang ba byung ba// 'dod pa'i gzugs dang gzugs med pa// srid pa rnam pa gsum zhes pa// rim pa/
94b2(rgyud 'grel): yis ni sbyangs nas su// phyi nang ye shes mchod pa ni// srid pa gsum ni ma lus pa// skad cig gcig gis dgug par bya// zla nyi a dang ka la sogs// rnam pa gsum du 'gro 'ong ba// sku yi rdo rje sogs bzlas pa// so sor skud
94b3(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs drug/ gser ni btso ma'i 'dab ma la// sku dang gsung thugs sbyor ba yi// rdo rje pad+ma dga' la sogs// r-i ni mnyam par 'gyur ba yi// rdo rje gsum ni bsgom par bya// shes rab pad+mar sems thig le// lhan cig
94b4(rgyud 'grel): skyes la bde dbang gis// mi shigs pa ni bsgom par 'gyur// bsnyen pa bdud rtsi lnga la sogs// rigs kyi gtso mo bzhi yis ni// sngags kyi bzlas pa la sogs pa// so sor sdud pa la sogs 'gyur// rdo rje pad+ma
94b5(rgyud 'grel): las skyes pa'i// bdud rtsi nye bar bskul ba'o// dga' ba la sogs rdo rje gsum// pad+ma ro ni mnyam spong ba// / bsgom pa bsgrub par 'gyur ba'o// shes rab sbyor ba mi 'dzag gang // sgrub pa chen po nyid 'gyur te/
94b6(rgyud 'grel): phra mo yi ni sbyor bas so// dang po stong pa'i byang chub nyid// de nas thig le zla 'dus pa// de nas sku ni bskyed pa nyid// rab mchog ro yi rigs kyis ni// yi ge rnams ni dgod pa nyid// 'di rnams thun mong bsnyen pa ste// rdo rje
94b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa parjod ni// dbu ma yin sgrub pa'o// 'di du thabs ni rnam pa bzhed// bsgrub pa'i yan lag de bzhin no// so ser sdud pa rnam pa b+haH// rgyal ba yi n+ti dbang por 'gyur// de bzhin pasam gtan mi brjo
94b8(rgyud 'grel): srob dang rtsol bar la gro can// gling sa yang ni rnam pa bcu// bzung ba rin chen phyag rgya can// gsung po rjes su dran pa ni// bang+ge 'dzin pa du 'gyur// dpal gyi ting 'dzin pa'i le can// de re yang ni la rung phyo//
95a1(rgyud 'grel): slar la yang ni gang dbye ba// a la sogs dang ka la sogs// so sor sdud pa yul can ni// yul can rnam pa bcu po rnams// yul la 'jug pa med pa'o// shes rab rtog pa dpyod pa
95a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams// dga' ba mi g.yo bde ba dang // bsam gtan sems ni gcig pa'o// gtum mo 'di ni snang ba gang // lus la nges par gsal 'gyur ba// nam mkha' de ni rjes dran 'gyur// srog dang rtsol ba gnyis kyi/
95a3(rgyud 'grel): lam// ma 'khrugs pa ru 'gyur ba ni// dbu mar srog ni 'jug pa'o// thig le ru ni srog 'jug cing // gnyis kar 'gro dang 'ong ba dang // bzung ba nyid ni sems gcig pa// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi// lhan
95a4(rgyud 'grel): cig skyes pa de dbang gis// ye shes sku ni ting 'dzin pas// 'di ni chu sogs dbye ba yis// gsum du yang ni 'gyur ba yin// sna tshogs bdag po'i sgrub thabs so// phyag rgya gsum dang tshad ni gsum// rnam pa
95a5(rgyud 'grel): gsumo ni srid dbang gis// las dang kun rtog bzang mo yis// so sor sdud pa'i rnal 'byor pa// yul dang rnam par bral ba dang // sngags rnams kyis ni byin brlabs nas// bsam gtan sbyor ba dag pa yis//
95a6(rgyud 'grel): mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur// srog dang rtsol ba dag pas na// zla ba nyi ma dag dang bral// byang chub sems dpas mchod par 'gyur// bzung ba yis ni stobs kyis ni// nyon mongs la sogs bdud bcom zhing // stobs
95a7(rgyud 'grel): bcu la ni 'jug par 'gyur// rjes dran gyis ni dag par 'gyur// dri med 'od 'phro'i dkyil 'khor te// gzhan yang ye shes sku las so// de phyir dag pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// nyi ma cung zad tsam gyis ni// ye shes sku ni 'grub par
95a8(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// so sor sdud la sogs pa yis// gal te gzir bar ma gyur na// sngags pa rnams kyi 'dod mi 'grub// sgra la sogs pa'i yan lag ma'i// pad+ma rdo rje nor bu ru// thig le bzung ba bsgrub par bya// bsnyen pa dang
95b1(rgyud 'grel): po'i sbyor ba ni// nam mkha' ru ni rnam pa bcu// 'khor lo can 'gro blta ba'o// bgegs ni mthar byed kyang blta ba// bdud rtsi'i lam du song ba yang // nye ba'i bsnyen po yan lag drug/ shes rab la sbyor zla thig
95b2(rgyud 'grel): le// gzhan yang rdo rje nor bu ste// yi ge gsum ni 'grub par 'gyur// bde ba ma nyams gcig zhi pa// lhan cig skyes pa ru ni 'gyur// bsgrub chen ye shes sbyor bas so// srog dang rtsol ba kun nas ni// mgo bo'i
95b3(rgyud 'grel): bar ni phan pa ste// mnyam pa'i bde ba 'bras ster ba// de las steng ni mi phan pa// 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa'o// sems can nyes pas bzlog pa'i rgyu// gtsug tor sgo ni phug nas su// mchog tu bde ba'i go 'phang du// 'di ni
95b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyar bar bya ba nyid// phung po med pa'i rnal 'byor pa// mnyam pa'i bde ba la 'jug mod// 'on kyang 'jig rten grags pa med// dbus su srog dang 'jug pa ni// yul dang rnam par bral ba nyid// sna tshogs yum gyis 'khyud pa'o//
95b5(rgyud 'grel): pad+mar bcug pa'i rang rdo rje// spros pa las ni de bzhin te// rdo rje'i dbus su zhugs par bya// sa la ma lhung ba bde ba// shin tu chags pa'i chags par song // rnal 'byor pa yi sbyor ba 'di// phyag rgya dngos grub don gyi phyir// mchog tu
95b6(rgyud 'grel): yang ni khyab pa'i bdag// dpal ni gsang las gsang ba yi// de ltar yan lag rnam pa bzhis// gal te bsgoms pas skyon ni// de nas sngags kyi bzlas pa bya// oM kA la tsakra ya huM hUM swA hA/ oM hAM hriM hUM swA hA/ oM badz+ra
95b7(rgyud 'grel): d+hU tI shwa re huM ho swA hA/ oM a mo g+ha sid+d+ha ye swA hA/ oM rat+na saM b+ha bA ya swA hA/ oM a smr-i ta b+hA ya swA hA/ oM bai ro tsa nA ya swA hA/ oM lo tsa nA ya swA hA/ oM mA ma kI ye swA hA/ oM paN+Da rA ye swA hA/ oM tA rA ye swA hA/ oM badz+ra pA Ni ye
95b8(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ oM kha gar+b+hA ya swA hA/ oM k+Shi ti gar+b+ha ya swA hA/ oM le ke shwa rA ya swA hA/ oM sarba ni bar bi ska bi ni swA hA/ oM sa man+ta b+ha drA ya swA hA/ oM gan+d+ha badz+ra ye swA hA/ oM rU pa badz+ra ye swA hA/ oM rA sa badz+ra ye swA hA/ oM s+phar sha
96a1(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra swA hA/ oM kap+pa badz+ra ye swAhA/ oM d+harma d+hA tu badz+ra ye swA hA/ oM big+h+nAn+ta kA ya swA hA/ oM pradz+nyAn+ta ka ya swA hA/ oM pad+ma nA k+Sha ya swA hA/ oM ya mAn+ta kA ya swA hA/ de nas bzlas pa skyo ba na/ mchod pa bcu
96a2(rgyud 'grel): dang skegs sogs dang // chang dang bdud rtsis mchod nas ni// de nas bdud rnams tshar ga bicod pa'i// phreng ba'i sngags kyi bstod par bya// oM na mo badz+ra satwA ya/ na mo bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwe b+h+yaHna mo badz+ra kro d+hen+na rA dze b+h+yaHna mo
96a3(rgyud 'grel): bI shra mA trA~M/ na mo buSh+Ta bo d+hi satwA de b+hI b+h+yan mo badz+ra DA kIn+ti g+hun mo b+ha ga ba te kA la tsakrA ya/ badz+ra b+hai rA ba b+h+r-i kA rA ya/ ma ken+da nI la brda shwa rI rA ya/ ma ra kle sha~M tri dA ya/ kAn+te shi ti raHtsa ra nA ya/ kriSh+Na rak+ta sa tokaN+DA ya/
96a4(rgyud 'grel): nI la si ta pI ta raH taiSh+Ta ka rA lo gr-i b+hI Sha Na mu khA ya/ kr-iSh+NA rak+tA shi tA sa bye ta ra skan+d+ha ya/ dwA da sha b+hu dza ye/ sha TI ka ti kA rA ya/ badz+ra khar+tha tI shU la kAr+ha ki bA Na aM ku sha Da mu ru ka mung+ga ra tsakra kun+ma daN+Da pa ra shu badz+ra g+hAtA khe Sha
96a5(rgyud 'grel): kha T+wAM ka pA la ts+tsha pa pA She sha rat+na ka ma le shaM khA daR+sha brah+ma shi rog dza tsarbad+h+wi ka rA yA byAg+h+ra tsarma ni bA sarbA ya/ kan+d+he pur+N+Na mA lA ba laM bi ne/ shi ri sa badz+ra pan+d+ha mu ku Te ka pA la pA lAr+d+ha tsan+na d+ha rA ya/ kuN+DA la ru tsa ka kar+b+bi k+Sha me kha lA nU
96a6(rgyud 'grel): pU ra b+ham+ba ya dz+nyo pa bI ta shro ro ma Ni mah+ma mu dra rA gin+na bi b+hu Sha NA ya/ badz+ra Da ki rI saR+Yo Shi tra hr-i da yA ya/ ir+thAg+na ya ma nr-i R+R-i t+ya ba ru Na bA yu/ ku be re shA na brah+ma/ biSh+Nu bi rA ya ke k+Sharti ke ya nan+ni ma hA ka la gr-i hA rak+Sha tra k+ShitraM/
96a7(rgyud 'grel): pA la/ su ren+ta su ren+te pha Nin+d+ra b+hU ten+da na ren+d+ra saM stu ta tsa ra NA ya/ rigs drug bkod pa'i bstod pa dang // mchog sbyin rdo rje'i bstod pas bstod// de nas mtshan phyed gtor ma sbyin// o oM badz+ra tsan+d+ra sarba d+harma su bi shud+d+ha sarba
96a8(rgyud 'grel): d+harme su bi shud+d+hA yas+thAhA/ oM AHbadz+ra sAr+ya sarba d+harma pra bo d+ha ka sarba d+har+g+haM pra bo d+ha ya swAhA/ oM huM badz+nyA na la sarba d+harmA pra dI pa ka sarba d+har+m+ma pra dI pA ya swAhA/ oM ho sarba d+harma badz+rA pra tA ka ra sarba d+harma badz+rA mr-i taM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ de ltar sngags dang /
96b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya yis// gtor ma byin rlabs zin nas ni// phyag rgya sngags kyi spyan drang bya// oM ha hA hi hrI badz+ra b+hai ra bA kaR+Sha ya kaR+Sha pra be sha ya pra be sha ya// bar+N+Na ya ban+d+ha ya/ to Sha ya to Sha ya/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ sarba DA ki nI naM
96b2(rgyud 'grel): hri da yaM huM hUM phreM phreM phaT/ de rjes mgron rnams byon pa dang // lhar bskyed dbang bskur byin brlabs pa'i// cho ga'i rim pa rdzogs par bya// mchod pa rnams dang haM gtor hI ma bsngo// oM brah+ma/ bi Sh+Ta/ nai ri t+ya/ bA yu/ yA ma/
96b3(rgyud 'grel): eg+ni/ sa mr-i dwe wa ra/ id+hA yat+te b+h+yaHsa pa ri bA re b+h+yaHi pa'o// gan+d+he/ pub+banad+hU bid+d+he baM aN+Da ta da dam he te ts+tshaka h+yas pa ri bA ra shrIg+h+ra mi pa li gr-id+d+ha du khadan bi ban+d+ha we hUM baM hoHsar+b+bap+tA sa~Mnas twa nA/ puSh+Tar k+Sha ba
96b4(rgyud 'grel): na gub+ha~M kun d+hu hUM hUM phaT/ badz+ra d+ha rAdz+nyA ba ya ti swA hA/ slar yang mchod cing bstod pa dang // yig brgyas phrin la so sor bshags// gtsug tor du ni rtse lnga pa'i// rdo rje du ni gyur pa yin// phyi nas rtse mo nyis 'gyur du// gyur pa chos kyi
96b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'o// des ni nyis 'gyur du bsgres pa// lhan cig skyes par 'gyur ba dang // de yi yang ni gzhan nyis 'gyur// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo dang // sprul pa yi ni 'khor lo'o// de yi nang du rtse gcig go// mnyam pa'i
96b6(rgyud 'grel): bde ba'i 'bras ster ba// gsang ba'i pad+ma la gnas pa// phyag rgya sgom pa'i don du gsungs// shin dang mtshan me'i dus su ni// 'dod chags zad don nyid du ni// gsung gi rdo rje myang don du// sngags pa rnams la gsungs pa nyid//
96b7(rgyud 'grel): nyes par bya ba kho na min// nyi ma so so'i dus su ni// zas kun bde ba'i don du ste// mi 'ju ba yi rgyu ru ni// dpal gyi spyod pa dngos grub rgyur// ro bsreg gnas su mtshan mo ni// 'gro ba rtse ba'i don du min// rnal
96b8(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa gang srog gcod pa'i// nyin dang mtshan du byed pa na// de ni srog 'jig pa ru gsungs// sgra gang kha dang bral ba ni// snying la yod par rab gyur pa// de ni brdzun du smra ba nyid// kun mkhyen gyi ni ye shes sar//
97a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa yang ni byed pa gang // rnal 'byor par yang de gsungs so// bde ba'i thig le ma lhung ba// gzhan gyi bud med du ni 'gyur// bsten pa chags bral min pa'o// srog dang rtsol ba'i me
97a2(rgyud 'grel): yis ni// ri bong can yang zhu ba'o// btung ba chang gi btung ba'o// mthe bong tshig nas gtsug tor du// chos kyi dbang gi 'gro ba ni// nya mthar thug pa rang gi sems// gtsug tor nas ni rang gi sems// yang ni 'di
97a3(rgyud 'grel): ni 'gro 'gyur ba// nag po'i phyogs kyi mthar thug pa// rnal 'byor pa yi spyod pa des// nyi ma re re'i dus su ni// 'dod pa'i dngos grub rab tu ster// spyir dang 'dor ba lus chad pa// mchog gi kha yi pad+ma las// tshig
97a4(rgyud 'grel): maM 'byung zhing gnyid log pa'o// 'gul dang na dang rdul ba dang // yid ni 'khrul dang brgyal ba ni// du ba la sogs rdo rje can// de rnams gsal ba rnam po bcu// sog can lus kyi gnas skabs so// 'jig rten 'dod
97a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas skyabs ni// nges pa kho nar gsal ba las// su zhig rgyal bar su 'dod pa// thig le dkar po'i rgyun ni gang // nyin dang mtshan mor lhung ba ni// mA ma kI ni de chang ngo // go ku la sogs mig la sogs// nyi ma
97a6(rgyud 'grel): re re bzhin spros pa// bdud rtsi lnga rnams bsten pa ni// rang gi rigs kyi sar song ba// lha rnams dag pa'i lus la'o// stong pa'i sems de brtson pa yis// lhan cig skyes pa khyab bde ba// de ni skye gnas 'khrig pa min//
97a7(rgyud 'grel): nor gyi sbyin pa btang ba dang // bud med sbyor ba yid kyis ni// mi 'dzag pa ni tshul khrims so// bzod pa sgra sogs mi 'jug pa// gnyis kar song ba'i le lo ni// rnam par 'jig pa brtson 'grus so// bsam gtan
97a8(rgyud 'grel): shes rab sems dang ni// bde ba lhan cig par song kun// 'gro ba thams cad brjed pa'o// sems can don du de rdzu 'phrul// srid pa'i don ni mi byed pa// thob pa gzhan ni bzhi pa'o// // dri med blo gros 'od
97b1(rgyud 'grel): zer gyis ni mun pa thams cad spong bar byed pa rnams// skye bos bla ma'i 'dod pa gang zhig dang po de ni gzung bar byas nas su// bcings las grol 'dod de ni bdag gis nges grol byas pa'o// de ltar dag pa
97b2(rgyud 'grel): dri med gang yin de yis rtag tu 'gro ba'i yid// dus 'khor zhabs zhes de la gnas pa'i go 'phang rtag tu bsam gyur cig// dus kyi 'khor lo'i yan lag bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs dus kyi zhabs chen pos mdzad pa
97b3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// // paN+Di ta bi shA shrI dang / lo ts+tsha ba gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgyur ba'o// @#/ dpal ldan chug kyid dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs yan lag bcug cig pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// // rgya gar skad du/ shrI
97b4(rgyud 'grel): nak+Sha tra maN+Da la sA dz+nyA na ma ka dA sAM ga nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal ldan rgyu skar gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs yan lag bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba/ dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen la phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad
97b5(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku// nyin mor byed pa'i 'od lta bu// pad+ma rgyas pa 'dra ba'i spyan// sangs rgyas seng ge'i gdan bzhugs pa// lha yi mchog la phyag 'tshal nas// dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo yi//
97b6(rgyud 'grel): skar dkyil 'khor sgrub thabs bri// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i gang zag gis// rgyud nas bshad pa'i gnas dag tu// rten dang yo byad bsams nas ni// dngos grub yan lag bcu gcig bsgom// bsrung dang kha
97b7(rgyud 'grel): sogs dag pa dang // bdag nyid dag bya bdag bsrung dang // tshogs gnyis bsags dang dkyil 'khor bskyed// byin gyi brlabs dang dbang bskur dang // phra mo'i thig le'i rnal 'byor dang // mchod bstod rjes kyi bya ba'o//
97b8(rgyud 'grel): cho ga de dag re re la'ang // tshe ga dang ni ting 'dzin dang // nga rgyal bzung ba gsum gsum mo// dang por tho rangs sngar langs nas// nam mkha'i dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma'i// rol mos gnyid sad pa ru bsams// thal
98a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyar sngags 'dis phyag bya'o// oM sar+b+ba bI ra yo gi nI na maHkA ya bak+Shi t+ta pra Na me ban+da naM ka ro yA me/ de nas khams bsangs maN+Dal bya// me tog tshom bu lha grangs bzhin// sku gsung thugs kyi
98a2(rgyud 'grel): rten yang dgod// mchod pa rnams dang rol mo dang // gtor ma dag kyang bsham par bya// bdag nyid rdo rje shugs su bsgom// spyi bo sogs su yi ge dgod// rdo rje bsams la bka' sgo ba// hUM lus ngag sems la gnas
98a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yi// bgegs kyi tshogs kun nga la nyon// nga ni dpal ldan rdo rje'i stobs// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rab sbyor bas// rdo rje 'bar ba'i lus 'di yis// sku gsum las byung bkas par bya// gal te dam tshig las
98a4(rgyud 'grel): 'das nas// zhig 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// rdo rje 'bar ba bde chen po// ye shes 'byung ba'i la sogs 'dis// brjed byed la sogs bgegs kyi tshogs// gnas 'dir ma gnas gzhan du dengs// rdo rje rnams la
98a5(rgyud 'grel): me dpung 'bar// sngags 'dis bgegs rnams sreg par byed// oM AHhuM ho haM ShaHhAHhAHhAHtrAHra ra ra ra/ badz+nyA na la sar+b+bA ba ra Na d+har+m+ma pra la ya sA b+ha ba mA ra kA yi ka big+h+na bi nA yA kA dI nAM/ dA sha dig+ga tA nAM kA ya bAk+ShI d+hA naM/ da ha daha/
98a6(rgyud 'grel): pa tsa pa tsa/ b+hasmiM ku ru ku ru hUM hUM phaT phaT zhes pas bdud rnams bsreg par bsam/ oM AHhUM ra badz+ra tsan+da sUr+ya rA hu la kA lAg+hA bi ya/ kA ya bAk+tsit+ta dz+nyA na prA kA raM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ zhes pas sna tshogs rdo rje yis/
98a7(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid sa dang rtsig pa bzhi// steng du mda' yi dra ba ni// zo rangs grib ma'i bar du bsgom// yang na gnam sa 'byor bar ro// oM huM pa sha kA ya badz+ra kU TA gA raM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ zhes pas me dpung ra ba
98a8(rgyud 'grel): bsgom// oM hAM yAM rAM bAM laM badz+ra kA sha bo te dzo da ka pr-i thi bi badz+ra swa b+hA ba pany+tsa d+hA tu b+hu badz+ra maN+Da la ni ku ru ku ru swA hA/ 'byung ba lnga brtsegs gyur pa las// ra ba sum ldan gzhal yas khang// dbus su 'khor lo
98b1(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs brgyad bsam// oM paHbi shwa badz+ra pad+mi ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM raHbadz+ra sUr+ya badz+ra sUr+ya sa naM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ zhes pas gdan rnams bsam par bya// oM huM kro d+hen+do hAM kro d+hA nA mUdz+nyA dA ya ka swA hA/
98b2(rgyud 'grel): dbus su rdo rje shugs khro bo// 'chad par 'gyur bar bdag nyid bsam// oM hi badz+ra bo d+hod+hA dza ma b+hA uSh+NIShi d+h+r-i da shi rA'aM kA dukAru swAH/ oM yAM bAdz+ra gr-id+hArA dzA ti bA la bin+d+han+ta ka prAHdi shir m+mu rA T+Ta ru swAH/
98b3(rgyud 'grel): oM raM badz+ra krod+hA rA dza dzaM b+ha ka duSh+Ta pradz+nyAn+ta ka daSh+Ti da~M shi ra NAM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM waM badz+ra kro d+ha rA dza man ka bI ra gi pad+mAn+ta kot+tar di shi rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM laM badz+ra kro d+ha rA dza s+t+raim+b+ha ka la~M ya mAn+ta ka pa sh+tsi ma di shi rak+ShAM ku ru ku/
98b4(rgyud 'grel): rU s+yAhA/ oM la/ badz+ra gr-id+hA r-I dza mA hA ba la bA ya b+hI d+hi shi Sh+Ti ku ru ku ru swAH/ oM Sh+Ta badz+ra kro d+ha rA dzA tsa li shAn+di shI t+taM ku ru ku rA s+yAn+ta/ oM ra/ badz+ra kro d+ha d+hA sh+tsak+ki ni ra t+ya dI shrI raSh+Ta ku ru ku ru swAn+ta/ oM yaHba
98b5(rgyud 'grel): kr-i d+ha rA dza nI la daN+Da ag+ne yAM daM sha rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM hAHbadz+ra kro d+ha rA dza suM b+hU d+ho dai shaM rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ sngar gyi rdo rje shugs kyis ni// dbang po'i bu ga so so las// khro bo bcu dag spros nas ni// rang rang
98b6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su gdan dgod do// dad+hA TIny+tsin+da ts+tshi pu mUR+Shan+tau/ sngar bzhin bad par bcu yang spro// thugs kyir ba'i phyi rol bsrung // b+har+m+ma d+hi dz+nyAn+na NA~M Tub+hUdz+nyo trA~M/ de bzhin phyogs skyong bcu yang spro// gsung gi ra ba'i nang du bsrung //
98b7(rgyud 'grel): ga gA dzi dzAM r+tha dzI bu pU d+h+r-i d+h+r-i/ de bzhin bza' ba cu spros nas ni// de yi phyi rol bkod la bsrung // kha khA/ tshi dzI tri Sh+Ti pu pU b+h+r-i b+h+r-i/ de bzhin klu rgyal bcu yang spro// sku yi ra ba'i nang du bsrung // ka kA tsi tsI nr-i D+heM pu pU R+Ya
98b8(rgyud 'grel): d+h+r-i/ 'byung po bcu yang spros nas ni// de yi phyi rol bsrung bar bya'o// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta rak+Sha tsakra swa b+hA bAt+ma ko&haM/ sngags kyi nga rgyal bzung bar bya'o// bsrung ba'i 'khor lor yan lag ste dang po'o//
99a1(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi lnga dang stobs lnga yi// ri lu sran chung tshad tsang bya// ye kaM go ku han bi mu pa shru/ rlung me thod par bcu bo bas ma// oM badz+ra tsan+d+ra sar+b+ba d+harmA su bi shud+d+haHswa b+hA ba sarbad+harbadz+nyAH
99a2(rgyud 'grel): d+ha ya swAH/ zla ga oM gyi dag par bya// oM sweHspyad+ya sa rbAd+harmA b+hA bo d+ha ka sar+b+bar+d+harmAn+d+ra bo d+ha ya s+yAt+ma/ nyi ma A yi 'od kyi s+hoH/ oM hUM brtan la sar+b+ba d+had+hA pra daM pak+Shasan+nid+harmAn+sa pra dwI pa ka ye swAH/ skrag can n+d+ha
99a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bar bar bya/ oM ho sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma badz+rA mr-i tA ka ra sar+b+ba d+har+m+manA badz+rA mr-i ta ku ru ku ru swAh+lA'aM/ dus me ho yis bdud rtsirabasam// rang nyid lce rtse hUM yig lasa'o// rdo rje gyur te 'a'od 'phros pas// bdud rtsi bkug
99a4(rgyud 'grel): ste myangs par bsams// oM sar+b+ba bIr yo gi ne pra'i Ne yA mi swAhA/ gtsug tor steng du baM las ni// zla ba'i gdan la rdo rje dkar// baM gi mtshan bzhi rgyas la// las gzhan dag la nye sogs sbyar// oM AH
99a5(rgyud 'grel): buM ho/ haM k+Sha pradz+nyo pA ya/ At+ma ka k+Sha ya bAkr-it+ta dz+nyAn/ ad+b+ha pa ti/ ma mA k+Sha ya bAk+tsit+ta badz+rA badz+ra mr-i taM swab+hA baM/ ku ru ku rukan+d+ha d+hA tra/ yAtan+t+ra nIHswa b+hA ba swA hA/ rdo rje la sogs zhu ba'i chus// lus kyi dri ma
99a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dor// zhi ba zla ba lte bur dkar la dge par bsgom// las gzhan rang rang kha dog go/ swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha/ sar+b+ba d+hir+m+ma swa b+hA ba shud+d+hi haM/ des dge pa'i nga rgyal bya'o// kha la sogs pa dag par bya ba'i
99a7(rgyud 'grel): yan lag ste gnyis pa'o// bdag nyid dus 'khor zhal gcig pa// phyag gnyis yum dang ldan pa yi// dpral bar oM las mtha' yas bsam// mgrin par AHlas rin 'byung bsam// steng gar hu las
99a8(rgyud 'grel): don yod grub// lte bar ho las rnam snang mdzad// gtsug tor haM las mi bskyod pa// gsang ba rak+Sha las rdo rje sems// rigs drug po ni dgod par bya// a i ri u laM a e ar o a la ha ya ral
99b1(rgyud 'grel): wa la/ lag g.yon sor mo'i tshigs gsum la'o/ lA wA rA yA hA/ A la oM ar ai A/ l-I U r-I I A/ g.yas pa'i sor tshigs gsum la dgod// oM hraHsar+b+ba s+pha ra/ dzA mA ra kle shAn+ta ka ra/
99b2(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra ta~Mk+ta duHkha tshed ma ma ka ra bi shud+d+ha ya swA hA/ lag pa'i yi ge rdo rjer 'gyur// oM AHtsu ha~M hak+ShaHkA ya bAk+tsit+sA d+hi pa ti/ badz+ra k+Sha ya ma ma k+Sha ya bAk+tsit+ta dz+nyA na badz+ra badz+ra kA ya swa b+ha pra bi kre ru ku ru swA hA/ mdzes pa'i
99b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya kun tu reg/ rdo rje'i rang bzhin lus su bsam// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra kA ya swa b+ha bAt+ma ko haM/ rdo rje'i lus kyi nga rgyal bya'o// bdag dag par bya ba'i yan lag ste gsum pa'o// // de nas lag pa
99b4(rgyud 'grel): thal sbyar te// oM d+h+waM hr-id ya na ma/ oMr+d+haM shi ra si wa shaT/ oM b+h+yAM shi kha ya wa shaT/ oM b+h+raM ka ba tsa ya hUM/ oM hA Ne tha bo ShaT/ oM hraHaSh+Ta ya phaT/ go cha dang ni mtshon cha'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta rbi da ya shir si
99b5(rgyud 'grel): si khaHka ba tsan traSh+Ta'i badz+ra shar+t+r-i ga swa b+hA bAt+ma ko&haM/ zhes re pa'i sngags kyi nga rgyal bya'o// go cha'i yan lag ste bzhi pa'o// rang gi snying gar paM las ni// pad+ma a las zla ba'i steng // hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga
99b6(rgyud 'grel): pa// 'od zer lnga ldan phyogs bcur spro// bla ma dkyil 'khor rgyal sras rnams// spyan drangs mdun gyi mkha' la bzhugs// 'od zer slar la snying gar bsdu// zla dkyil ka sogs ste tshan drug/ ring thung
99b7(rgyud 'grel): brtsegs pa bcu gnyis las// mchod rdzas lha mo gyur pa spro// oM s+yA badz+ra ga r+b+ha gar+dz+dza oM tsan+da kra rA ku ru sAH/ oM r+g+ha badz+ra ma le mA lA rtsa na ku ru kA ru s+saH/ an+ta badz+ra d+ha be rtsub rtsa ni ku ru ku ru swAr+tha/ oMSh+Tha badz+ra ma
100a1(rgyud 'grel): dI pre pa dI pAr+d+ha naM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM p+tA badz+ra mr-i te nai bid+ya pU dzaM ku ru ku ru s+yAhA/ oM b+hA badz+rA k+Sha te k+Sha ta pha lAr+Na naM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oMSh+Ta badz+ra la s+ye sab+hA b+ha ra Na pudz+nyA ku ru ku ru sAhA/ oMn+d+ra badz+ra ha s+ye
100a2(rgyud 'grel): g+hAg+haN TA dad+ya pU dzAM ku ru ku ru sAhA/ oMk+Sh+ma badz+ra wA d+ya wId+ha pU d+h+r-i dzAM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oMk+ShA badz+ran+ma n+yainr-iHpUdz+nye d+h+r-i ku ru ku ru swAhA/ oM stA badz+ra gI te gI tA pU dzA b+h+r-i ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM s+thA badz+ra ka me sar+b+ba bud+d+ha b+ho d+hes+sab+h+raM d+hA nAM kro D+hA
100a3(rgyud 'grel): daMnAM badz+ra su rata pU dzA ku ru ku ru swA hA/ rje sna tshogs mchod pa byas te sdig pa rnam pa dz+haiM mang po bshags bgyis la/ bsgrub pa pos b+h+rUM ni lus dang ngag dang yid dang bas gsum la shrI gus su 'chi bar bgyi/ rdzogs
100a4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sna tshogs dge ba gang byas pa'i dge 'dun dang de dag kun la rjes su yi rang nas ni sdig bral byang chub spyod la rjes su 'jug/ sangs rgyas rnam sa la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar
100a5(rgyud 'grel): bskul zhing mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs par gsol// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms dag la byang chub par du skyabs su mchi/ 'dir ni sems can don phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub bdag
100a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur smon lam gdab par bgyi/ bsod nams rtsa ba gsum sogs dran// ye shes tshogs ni stong nyid bsgom// phyi dang snod bcud thams cad ni// dngos dang bral bas stong pa nyid// rgyu la 'das pas mtshan ma
100a7(rgyud 'grel): med// 'bras bu med pas smon pa med// skye 'gags med pas 'dus ma byas// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA bAt+ma ko haM/ oM a ni mai ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swab+hA bAt+ma ko haM/ oM a pra Ni hi tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA bAt+ma ko haM/ oM an
100a8(rgyud 'grel): b+hI saM s+phA ra dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA bAt+ma ko haM/ rang nyid thugs mtshan yi ge sogs/ thig le'i bdag nyid skar mda' bzhin// rim pas bsdus te 'dzin med par// sa chu me rlung nam mkha'i khams// rang bzhin shugs pas
100b1(rgyud 'grel): yul dang bral// kun gzhin ma shes 'od gsal bsgom// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta shU n+ya ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA bAt+ma ko haM/ de ying rgyal bzung bar bya'o// tshogs gnyis bsags pa'i yan lag ste lnga pa'o//
100b2(rgyud 'grel): de nas stong nyid dang las ni// nyi stengs sna tshogs rdo rje dang // rdo rje dra gur rtsi bas bcu yi// lte bar a las chos 'byung ngo // b+h+rUM hUM yaM hUM/ hUM raM hUM/ hUM baM hUM/ hUM laM hUM/ hUM baM hUM/ hUM k+ShaM hUM/ hUM haM hUM/ rlung gnag zlum po rgyal
100b3(rgyud 'grel): na// pa dmang thugs ga rlung / nga rnas pa brnas nan// sags gra ba 'khong pa sa/ de dag ga du me // sa / de ngas smra pa /
100b4(rgyud 'grel): badrA ma gcan banas// desti oM ma mas ni// gnam ma bad+hAgs ma rjo // na chen dang shin rnam shig// de rkyen snab bu ba gra dang // rna ban mda' la ba dang // dang
100b5(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnyis dang // re khA gsum dang lnga po gnyis// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo'o// snying po ye shes 'dab ma dag/ rdo rje phreng bas bskor ba'o// phyi ma thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la// pad sogs ka ba bcu drug dang //
100b6(rgyud 'grel): chu skyes rdo rje rabs mdzes// lha yi snam bu dag gis bskor// de nas gsung gi dkyil 'khor la// chu skyes 'dab ma brgyad pa brgyad// pad+ma'i phreng bas yongs su bskor// phyi rol sku yi dkyil 'khor la// pad
100b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dab bzhi brgyad bcu drug pa// bcu gnyis 'khor lo'i phreng bas bskor// phyi rol grang ni bcu gnyis dang // nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bum pa che// rnga bo che dang byang chub shing // rdo rje 'bar ba'i phreng bas
100b8(rgyud 'grel): bskor// dbus kyi pad+ma lte ba'i steng // zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan dang // bdud dang drag po yab yu ma dang // bdud ni gdong cig kha dog dmar// lag bzhi mda' dang lcags kyu g.yas// g.yon pa gzhu dang zhags pa 'dzin
101a1(rgyud 'grel): yum ni dga' mo dang bcas g.yas// drag po gdong gsum mdog dmar po// g.yon pa skrod pa/ khan+d+ha 'dzin// dbu ma'i yum bcas g.yon du gdeng // de stengs mngon par byang chub pa// a
101a2(rgyud 'grel): i raM/ u le/ a ai a la o al/ ta ya ra wa la aM AHlA bA rA yA tAM/ A la/ oM Ar/ lAM U r-I AM A/ zla ba yi ge mtshan pa steng // me 'ong ye shes dang po'o// l+lal+lA/ yA/ D+hAn+tha/ l+lalpA/ rAy+YA/
101a3(rgyud 'grel): (/ sa/ m+b+haHaT+Ta// / pa r+m+mag/ nanam / /
101a4(rgyud 'grel): ma y-i phigs ka mtshan 'og mnyam nyid ye shes gnyis nyaM pa'o// bar medu dri za'i yi ge nAM/ so sor rtog pa gsum pa'o// hi yig gcig gyur rdo rjer gyur// bya grub ye shes bzhi pa'o//
101a5(rgyud 'grel): phaT kyi sha chas yongs su rdzogs// chos dbyings ye shes lnga pa'o// gtso bo sku mdog sngon po la// kha dog phyogs bzhi dag tu gsungs// zhal bzhi phyag ni nyer bzhi pa// mgrin gsum zhabs gnyis brkyang
101a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa// dbus zhal mthing ga mche gtsegs drag/ g.yas pa dmar po chags pa che// g.yon pa dkar po zhi ba'i zhal// rgyab ni ser po ting 'dzin bzhugs// ral pa'i mthor tshugs bcu gnyis spyan//
101a7(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed dang// rdo rje sems dpa' dbu brgyan pa'o// glang chen stag lpags na bza' can// mgrin gsum gnag dmar dkar po'o// dpung pa drug ni sngo dmar dkar// phyag dar bcu gnyis de bzhin no//
101a8(rgyud 'grel): phyag mgo nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni// gnag dmar dkar po'i rim pa bzhin// mthe bong la sogs sor mo bcu// ser dkar dmar gnag snga rims bzhin// tshogs kyi phreng ba sdod mar dkar// rdo rje ral gri rtse gsum dang /
101b1(rgyud 'grel): gri gug mda' dang lcags kyu dang // TA ru thob 'khor lo mdung // dbug pa dgras g.yas pas 'dzin// dril bu phub dang kha T+wAMg/ thod pa gzhu dang zhugs pa dang // rin chen pad dkar dung dang ni// me long
101b2(rgyud 'grel): lcags sgrog tshangs mgo g.yon// cod pan snyan cha mgul rgyan dang // gdubu dpung rgyan ska rags dang // zhabs gdub rnams ni rdo rjes brgyan// mgo bo'i phreng ba do shal dang // thal ba phreng ba gtsug nor bu//
101b3(rgyud 'grel): klu chen bcu yis de bzhin brgyar// g.yon dkar g.yas dmar brkyang ba'i zhabs// yum ser zhal bzhi phyag brgyad ma// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar rgyab zhal gnag/ gri gug lcags kyu nA ma ru// phreng
101b4(rgyud 'grel): pa g+sa // nga zhugs pa bad+ma bras // na rnaMs pa dab du wA/ shA byung nas pa'i la 'gyu pal ma dpa
101b5(rgyud 'grel): oM AHhU~M ho De ThaHdgod// de nas 'gro drug sems can rnabs// bkug nas dkyil 'khor de la gzhug/ yab yum mkha' gsang byin brlabs te// snyoms 'jug sgra yis rnam snang sogs// nang du bkug nas bzhugs
101b6(rgyud 'grel): par bsam// yab yul byang chub sems kyis ni// b+ha gar de la dbang bskur bya// sems can de rnams dkyil 'khor lha// zhal gsum phyag drug sogs su gyur// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// mchog
101b7(rgyud 'grel): dga'i bdebs gang bar bsam// nAr+Ne nA~M na T+Te/ thAR+R-i ts+tshan+d+ra nA~M/ Sha~M Shadu laSh+TaM thA Ne b+hUrats+tshe tA la nAM/ DUN+DAt+yan+naSh+Ta/ T+TAk+ShASh+tsag+h+nAn+tu/ de sog so sa kyi dkyil 'khor pa// byung la dkyil 'khor gtsug
101b8(rgyud 'grel): par bya// sbyi mgri snying gang oM An+tu/ na hU~M kyai'i bsams lte ba ru// las ga ma mi yi ni Sh+T+r-inI R+R-i \u0f7f'i babar gtso bo yab yul gnyis// bdi chen 'od du shu ba las// tshad
102a1(rgyud 'grel): med bzhi yi lha mi'i glus// 'gro ba'i don du gzhengs pas bskul// spyan ma bdag ni 'gro ba'i ma// rnal 'byor pa yi rgyu mthun gnas// bdag gi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis// dus
102a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gzhengs la bdag chags mdzod// bdag ni srin mo mA ma kI// rnal 'byor pa yi rnam smin+da gnas// bdag gi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis// dus 'khor gzhengs la bdag chags mdzod// gos
102a3(rgyud 'grel): dkar bdag ni bu mo ste// rnal 'byor pa yi skyes bu'i gnas// bdag gi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis// dus 'khor gzhengs la bdag cag mdzod// sgrol ma bdag ni tsha mo ste// rnal 'byor pa yi dri med
102a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas// bdag gi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis// dus 'khor bzhengs la bdag chags mdzod// lha mos klu mdzad bcom ldan khyod// sems can kun la phan mdzad pa// rdo rje can gyis bdag bsrungs mdzod//
102a5(rgyud 'grel): lha mo'i bla mas 'dod can 'dod pa mdzad don bzhengs// de ltar bskul ba gnas nas ni// chos su stong pa'i rang bzhin las// mig 'phrul lta bu bzhengs mdzad de// hUM baM spro zhing bskul bas zhu// rdo rje dang ni gr-i
102a6(rgyud 'grel): gug b+hUM du gyur// de bzhin gtso bo yab yum bzhengs// de nas 'khor gyi/ spro'i phyir// rdo rje pad+ma byin brlabs la// thabs dang shes rabs snyoms 'jug sbas// chos kyi dbyings nas sangs rgyas rnams//
102a7(rgyud 'grel): bkug la yab kyi zhal du thim// b+ha ga gnas rgyud yum gyi ni// pad+ma zhugs te b+ha gar brgyad// yul gyi zhal nas yab zhal du// zhugs nas yab kyi rdo rje nas// sa bon yum gyi pad+ma ru// yi ge smos nas
