107b6(rgyud 'grel): zhal// rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma g.yas// dril bu rin chen ral gri g.yon// spro bsdu sngar bzhin gsol ba gdab// oM a b+hi Shiny+tsan+tu ma tsit+ta badz+rod// sngar bzhin dbang bskur thugs kar bzhugs// dpal ldan rdo rje thugs
107b7(rgyud 'grel): 'chang ba// mi phyed rdo rje gsum gyis dngos// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su// thugs kyi rdo rje mdzad du gsol// phyogs btsur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyi bdag/ deng bdag byin
107b8(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlabs nas su// thugs kyi rdo rje mdzad du gsol// thugs kar sgra gcan na hUM nag bsgom// de nas gsum la rigs drug ste// lte ba gsang ba gtsug tor du// ka hoHswa haM ni dgod par bya// 'khor rnams la yang de
108a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin no// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta k+Sha ya bASh+Ti d+d+ha badz+ra swa b+ha bAt+ma ko haM// zhes pas nga rgyal bzung bar bya'o// byin gyis brlabs pa'i yan lag ste bdun pa'o// // thugs ka'i hUM gi 'od zer gyis// thugs
108a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi la 'khor bdun du bzhugs/ / oMng+ge A wA coM ba d+hA m-iH pa 'a cu tu ma stan/ oM a oM ngaM u ma sa buH/ ba mus sum mo sa
108a3(rgyud 'grel): A aM aHha hA haM hAHpheM ho sarba pA ra mi ta ma ma badz+ra pa b+hA ban+d+ha yan+t+ra huM hUM phaT/ oM hUM ho dz+nyA na badz+rI na swa b+hA be kA ru Na pradz+nyAt+ma ke badz+ra badz+ra b+har+N+Na sa bye ta ra ka ra yorma ma badz+ra satwa/ sa pradz+nyo da dan+ta huM hUM phaT/ oM a A/ e ai/ ar
108a4(rgyud 'grel): Ar/ o au/ a la A la/ aM aHsarba b+ho d+hi satwaHsab+hAR+YA/ sarba karmo pa b+ho ga badz+ra pe taM ma ma dadan+na swAhA/ oM ha hA ya yA ra rA wa wA la lA sarba kro d+ha rA dzaHsa b+hAR+sha mai tri kA ru NA mu daM to pak+Sha/ sa ma ta swa haM baM/
108a5(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra pU rba ga maM nA ma med dan+t+ra huM hUM phaT/ oM e waM e lAM pad+ma badz+ri tsits+tsha pradz+nyo pa yan+tu mA lA/ d+hi pa ti badz+ra su kha dz+nyA nA ga dz+nyA na ma me dadan+du hU~M phaT/ dbang bdun gsol ba gdab pa'o// oM A/ ra rI ulI pany+tsad+ha trA bi sho d+ha ni/
108a6(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ cod pa ne rigs lngas dbu rgyan bkon// o a i raM a li pany+tsa ta thA ga ta pa ri shud+d+he swA hA/ o a A aM aHha hA hAM hAM/ pheM ho da sha pA ra mi ta ta pa ri pA ra Ne swA hA/ oM AHhUM hoHsUr+ya tsan+d+ra bi sho d+haka
108a7(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM a A/ e ai ar Ar o au a la A laHaM aHbi Sha yan+na ya bi shau d+ha ni sAhA/ oM ha dA ya yA ra rA la lA tsa tur brah+ma bi ra bi shud+d+ha sAt+ma/ oM hai k+Sha d+harma tsakra pra bar+d+had+ha ka swA hA/ zhes pas dbang
108a8(rgyud 'grel): bdun bskur bar bsam// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sap+ta b+hU mi prA pa to haM/ thob pa'i nga rgyal bzung ba'o// oM oM pradz+nyo pA ya~M ka la shA b+hi She / ma mAd dA taM huM hUM phaT/ oM hUM pradz+nyo pa yau badz+ra satwa bi shra mA ta ro pradz+nyA dz+nyA nA b+hi She kaM me
108b1(rgyud 'grel): da dA taM huM hUM phaT/ zhes pas dbang gsum bskur bar gsol ba btab pas bdag tshul bzhin du bum pa dang / gsang dbang shes rab ye shes sku/ oM oM badz+ra satwe na badz+ra ka la shA b+hi She ke nA b+hi Shik+to badz+ra satwa pu tA tsa la b+hU mi
108b2(rgyud 'grel): lab+h+yo haM/ oM AHoM badz+ra satwe na gu h+yA b+hI Shek+te badz+ra satwa yu ba rA dze na ba b+hU mi lab+h+yo haM/ oM huM badz+ra satwe na pradz+nyA dz+nyA ne nA b+hi Shi ke nA b+hi Shi kA haM dwi ti ya badz+ra d+hi ro haM d+harma me g+ha b+hu mi lab+h+yo haM/ thob pa'i nga rgyal bzung ngo // oM ho pradz+nyo pa
108b3(rgyud 'grel): yAt+ma ka badz+ra satwa ma hA mudrA dz+nyA nA b+hi She kaM me pra yats+tsha/ oM A huM hoHphaT/ zhes pas gsol ba gdab pa dang / bla med dbang ni bskur bar bsam/ oM haM d+harma d+hA d+hA ShA ra tsa tur+thA b+hi She ka to badz+ra satwe nAt+ma na hi dwi dI yo dA da sha b+hU mi lab+h+yo/
108b4(rgyud 'grel): haM badz+ra satwa ma hA rbaHpar mAk+Sha raHtrai lo kya bi dza ya kA la tsakra b+hag+h+na wA me ba kA raHzhes pas thob pa'i nga rgyal lo// de nas phyag rgya drug bcas la// oM haM haHbA me da k+Shi Na kar+N+Na yor badz+ra kun+da li huM hU~M phaT phaT/ oM aM aHkar+ya
108b5(rgyud 'grel): kan+d+he badz+ra me khalA badz+ra kaN+Ti huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM a AHbA ma da k+Shi Na kar yor badz+ra ru tsa ko hu~M hUM phaT+Ta phaT/ oM ha hA bA ma dak+Shi Na pad yod badz+ra nA pu re hu~M hUM phaT phaT/ oM haM bAM pany+tsa ka ra ma hA shUn+ya tA swa b+hA ba badz+ra shi ro/ ma Ni shir
108b6(rgyud 'grel): sa sarbaM ge basma huM hUM phaT/ oM aM Ad+ha ra rI shwa ra badz+rAn+d+ha tsan+d+ra badz+ra pad+d+ho d+he huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM a AHaM sarba sA raM ka tri swa ra swa b+hA ba/ badz+ra yadz+nyo pa bi ta san+te huM hUM phaT phaT/ de nas phyag rgya bzhi bcas la/ oM k+ShaHdud+han+ta
108b7(rgyud 'grel): b+hi ma nak+Sha yaM ka ra byAg+h+na tsarma/ ka Tau hu~M hUM phaT/ oM k+Sha tri shed swa ra sap+ta ti hra swa dIr+g+ga byany+dza na swa b+hA ba dai t+ye ku la sha da si ro b+hir+m+maN+Da mA la skan+d+ha ba laM bi ni skan+te huM hUM phaT phaT/ o ha hi hAM hurl-i pany+tsa skan+d+ha bi shud+d+ha swa b+hA ba shi ra si ka pA li
108b8(rgyud 'grel): mA le huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM k+Shak+ShA k+Shi k+ShIk+Sh+mI k+Shai ShuSh+Ta ShAM b+h+r-iShAShAHha hA hi hI hAM d+hI hu hU r+tham+mA ta haHsarba big+h+na bi da ri tag dza tsar ma pa b+hUd+ha rak+ta shra bi ta d+hu pheM phaT/ de nas g.yas kyi phyag rgya bca'/ oMny+dzaHkrod+ha badz+ra hU~M phaT/ oMk+ShA badz+ra
109a1(rgyud 'grel): ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/ oMT+Ta/ badz+ra kri shU laM hUM phaT/ oMSh+TaHbadz+ra kan ri hUM phaT/ oMk+Sh+maHbadz+ra bAn hUM phaT/ oM T+TaHbadz+ra gu shad+d+he phaT/ oM T+Ta/ badz+ra Da ma ru ku hUM phaT/ oM k+Sh+ma/ badz+ra mun+tar hUM phaT/ oM T+TA
109a2(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra tsakra hUM phaT/ oM k+ShaHbadz+ra kun+ta hUM phaT/ oM k+ShaHbadz+ra daN+Da hUM phaT/ oM k+ShAHbadz+ra pa ra shu hUM phaT/ de nas g.yon gyi phyag rgya bca'/ oM hUM badz+ra gar+b+he ho pheM phaT/ oM hUM badz+ra khe Ta haM pheM phaT/ oM hUM badz+ra kha T+wAM ga
109a3(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ oM hU~M badz+ra ka pA le ho pheM phaT/ oM hUM badz+ra tsa pi ho pheM phaT/ oM hUM badz+ra pA sha ho pheM phaT/ oM hUM badz+ra rat+na do phaT/ oM hUM badz+ra pad+ma ho pheM phaT/ oM hU~M badz+ra shaM Sha ho pheM baT/ oM hUM badz+rA daR+sha ho pheM phaT/ oM hU~M badz+ra wI Sha/
109a4(rgyud 'grel): le ho pheM phaT/ oM hAM tsa durbe ta mu kha swa b+hA ba brah+ma shi ro ho pheM phaT/ de nas klu'i phyag rgya bca'/ oM hUM badz+ra dza ya nA gen+d+ha badz+ra dza TA mu ku Ta ban+d+he tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM k+ShuM badz+ra bi dzA ya nA gon+d+ha badz+ra ban+d+he ban+d+ha tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha huM hUM phaT/
109a5(rgyud 'grel): na / mam sbyin na/ la / sa
109a6(rgyud 'grel): phaT phaT/ oM hAM h+lA badz+ra tak+Sha ko ma hA pad+mo bA ma dak+Shi Na pA da nA bu ra yo tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha huM hUM phaT phaT/ zhes pas nga rgyal bzung bar bya'o// dbang bskur bar yan lag ste brgyad pa'o// // sngar bshad lha mo bcu gnyis kyi sngags
109a7(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa dbul bar bya'o// oM A huM hrIHphaT/ sngon du mchod yon dbul ba ni/ oM pra ba ra sat+kA raM ma hA rasmin+ma tIts+tsha swA hA/ de nas me tog sogs dbul rin chen gser gyi me tog sna tshogs dri mchog spos sogs mar me dang /
109a8(rgyud 'grel): dril bu me long bla re dang ni sna tshogs 'bras bu ba dan gar dang rol mo dang / sna tshogs mchod pa byas te gzhan rnams bcu po bdag nus ji ltar gsungs bzhin dbul/ bdud rtsi sngar bzhin byin bshad pa// hUM byung rdo rje'i
109b1(rgyud 'grel): lce yis myang // oM bud+d+ha ya na maHoM d+harma ya na maHoM sat+kA ya na maHoM swa b+ha bi ka kA yA ya na maHoM d+harma k+Sha yA ya na maHoM saM b+ho ga kA yA ya na maHoM nar+m+ma Na k+Sha yA ya na maHoM tsit+ta badz+ra ya na maHoM dz+nyA na
109b2(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra ya na maHoM wA kA ya badz+rA ya na maHoM shAkya mu na ye ni maHoM ka la tsakrA ya na maHoM badz+ra satwA na maHde bzhin lha'i sngags rnams la// na ma btags la bdud rtsi myang // srin lag dag gis mchod par
109b3(rgyud 'grel): bya// de nas snyan pa'i dbyings kyis bstod// gang la thog mtha' dbus med gnas dang 'chi dang srid pa dang ni sgra dang dri ste ro dang ni// reg bya gzugs dang sems te rang bzhin dang ni skyes bu med cing rtsa lag thar par byed pa med// sa
109b4(rgyud 'grel): bon gsal ba'i dus su ma lus srid pa ru ni bde dang sdug bsngal rang bzhin mi mnga' ba// mtshan med mya ngan 'das par bya ba bral zhing yon tan bral ba de la phyag 'tshal lo// dus dang sna tshogs la sogs rdo rje dpe bla
109b5(rgyud 'grel): med cing skyes bu kun 'gro spros pa med// brtsegs pa la gnas rna ba sna dang kha mig mgo bo lag pa rkang pa rnams kun du// 'byung ba'i mtha' dang 'byung po'i mgon te gnas pa'i srid pa 'dzin cing bya ba rnams kyi rgyu// rig
109b6(rgyud 'grel): ba dang po rnal 'byor gyis bgrod go 'phang mchog gis bde ba dus 'khor la 'dud do// skyes bu mdzad nus pa yis gzugs can dri med glog 'dra gzi brjid nyi ma bcu gnyis pa// ye shes rdo rje 'od zer mchog gi go
109b7(rgyud 'grel): 'phang la gnas chog drag de la phyag 'tshal lo// dkar po 'jig rten gsum mgon ri bong 'dzin pa las 'dzegs 'jig rten spyi bor yang dag bzhugs// bdud rtsi 'chi ba sel zhing srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms
109b8(rgyud 'grel): pa thig le'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo// sems tsam sngags kyi gzugs la sum nus yongs su bskor ba bde dang sdug bsngal ngo bo la// mkhas pa rnams la zhi ba'i gzugs kyis nyi mdzad nyams myong gdug pa
110a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams la mi gdug pa// gang zhig gang du rang gi yid la las byas de yi 'bras bu de ru bskyed par byed// 'jig rten dbang phyug sna tshogs srid gsum bskyed mdzad rdo rje sems dpa' la yang phyag
110a2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// gcig dang du ma ma yin gcig ste mnyam dang mi mnyam mnyam pa g.yas dang g.yon pa mdun dang rgyab// steng 'og kun nas dkar dang ljang khu kha dog chen po sna tshogs gzugs can thung ngu ring po ste/
110a3(rgyud 'grel): ring thung su dang yon tan med pa yon tan dang bcas skyes bu bud med skyes bu min// gang zhig kun nas rten byas gcig tu b+ha ga bzang mo mchog gi b+ha ga khyod la 'dug/ gzhan yang bstod pa ci rigs bya// oM sar+b+ba ta/
110a4(rgyud 'grel): thA ga ta maN+Da pU dza badz+ra swab+hA bA t+ma ko haM/ mchod bstod nga rgyal bzung bar bya'o// mchod pa dang stod pa'i yan lag ste dgu pa'o// // dpal ldan rdo rje can ni lo dang zla ba dbye ba'i dus kyi dag par 'gyur romi dbang kye/
110a5(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi rnam pa nyi ma ma yin nyin bzhin dbang gis sna tshogs rnam par dag/ du ba la sogs rlung rnams dag par rang snying pad+mar gtso bo'i 'khor lo gnas pa'o// drag po nyon mongs slas bcas bdud kyi tshogs
110a6(rgyud 'grel): bcas bdud kyi gtso bo zhabs kyi 'og/ dung dang gaN+DI nor bu ljon pa dag ni de bzhin sku'i rdo rje rdzogs// bdud rtsi'i yan lag gis ni bum pa brgyad de rgyal dang rnam rgyal bum pa byang sems sogs// 'du byed don yod grub pa
110a7(rgyud 'grel): tsher ba dri med rin chen 'byung gnas 'du shes dpag med 'od// gzugs ni 'khor lo can te ri bong stobs dang khrag dang dri chu rin chen dag/ lha mo drug gi khams rnams kyi ste yul dang yul can gyi ni byang chub sems dpa'
110a8(rgyud 'grel): sras dang bcas// stobs kyi khro bo lnga ste gzhan rnams las kyi dbang po lnga pos so// rA muN+Da la sogs pa thun tshar brgyad kyi pad+ma'i 'dab gnas nyi ma'i dus sbyor chu tshod rnams// lha min la sogs zla ba bcu gnyis
110b1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i 'dab gnas rtsa dang dbugs kyi grangs rnams so// klu dang gtum mo gsang ba la ste rgyal po nyis 'gyur rtsa rnams rnam par dag/ de bzhin 'dod pa la sogs des ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis lus kyi
110b2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba dag skra yi sgrub pa ma lus dur khrod sa gnas pa spu rnams kyis 'byung po'i tshogs rnams so// khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa// sangs rgyas ngo bor bsgom par bya// de nas pad+ma rnam par spangs// a yis
110b3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// hUM gis yi ge rdo rje bcas shes rab la ni mthun phyir ro// hUM rigs rang gi yab kyi rdo rje ni// rtse mo lnga par rnam par bsgom// de dbus a las pad 'dab brgyad// de nas rdo rje pad+mar dgod//
110b4(rgyud 'grel): de nas rnal 'byor hUM phaT brjod// bsrub cing bde chen bsgom par bya// gtum mo lte bar rgyus klu bcom// ho yi ye shes dbus nas su// dri med glog 'dra gzi brjid 'bar// phung khams skye mched la sogs
110b5(rgyud 'grel): bsregs// ri bong spyi bo las 'bab pa// thig le'i gzugs te rdo rje can// gnas bzhi rim bcas slar steng 'og/ rgyan ldan me long gnas lta bur// dus gsum ye shes rang byung ba// gsung dag ye shes
110b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bar bar gcig/ dung can rgyan chen gdum mor brjod// lte stengs rigs ngan d+hU ta'i sku// srog lnga sna rtser yungs kar gzhug/ srog 'gags stong nyid ma bcos dang // de la yid bzhag bsgom par bya// oM
110b7(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badz+ra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko haM/ rnam dag dran pa'i thig le dang // phra mo bsgom pa'i yan lag ste bcu pa'o// de nas nga rgyal bzung bar bya'o// bsgom pas skyo na sngags bzlas te// las la
110b8(rgyud 'grel): shis pa'i phreng ba bzung // sngags kyi sgra spangs grogs po ru// gang 'gyur ba yi sngags de bzlas// oM na mo badz+ra satwA ya// na mo bud+d+ha b+ho ti satwe b+h+yaHna mo badz+ra kro d+hen+na rA dze b+h+yaHna mo bi shwa ma thaM/ na mo bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa
111a1(rgyud 'grel): de bi b+hU/ na mo badz+ra DA ki ni b+h+ya/ oM na mo b+ha ga ba te ka la tsakrA ya badz+ra b+hai ra ba b+hI ka rA ya/ ma hen+ni la bar+t+ta sha ba rI rI ya/ ma ra kle sha hri dA ya/ krAn+ta si na rak+ta tsa ra NA ya/ kr-iSh+Na rak+ta si ta kar+N+Na ya/ nI la
111a2(rgyud 'grel): si ti pI ta rak+ta daMSh+TA ka ra lo gra b+hI Sha Na mu khA ya/ kr-iSh+Ta rak+ta si ta sa bye ta ra skan+d+ha ya/ dA sha b+hu dzA ya/ ShaT bing sha ti ka rA ya/ badz+ra khaD+ga Ti shu la karti ka/ bA NAM ku sha Da ma ru ka/ mud+ga ra/ tsakra kuna?/ daN+Da/ baR+ShA/ She badz+ra g+har+m+maShe
111a3(rgyud 'grel): Ta/ kha T+wAM ga/ ka pA la/ tsa pA pA sha/ rat+na ka ma la shi khi/ a daR+sha/ shr-I kha bi lA/ brah+ma/ shi ro ga dza tsarma d+h+r-ika rA ya/ byA g+h+ra/ tsarma Ni ba sa nA ya/ skan+ne muN+Da mA lA ba laM be ni/ shi ra si/ badz+ra par+Na ma ku Te badz+ra/ ka pA la
111a4(rgyud 'grel): ma lA r+d+ha tsan+na d+ha rA ya/ kun+da la ru tsa ka/ kaN+Di kA/ me kha lA/ nU pU ra/ b+has+sa yadz+nyo ba bI ta shi ro ma Ni/ ma hA mu dA nA gen+na bi b+hU Sha NA ya/ badz+ra DA ki nI san+te Shi tr-i rba da yA ya/ in+nag+ni ya ma nairl-i t+ya ba ru Na ba yu ku be re shA na brah+ma
111a5(rgyud 'grel): bik+tA bi nA ya ka kAn+ti ke ya nan+di ma hA kA la gra he/ nak+Sha tra k+She tra pA la su ren+d+ra pa Nin+d+ra b+hu ten+na na ren+d+ra si sU ta tsa ra NA ya/ rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM AHhUM ho haM k+ShaHb+h+rUM ka la tsakr-i dur+thAn+ta da ma ka dzA ti dza rA ma ra NAn+ta ka/ tre lokya
111a6(rgyud 'grel): bi dza ya/ ma hA b+hI re shwa ra/ badz+ra b+hai ra ba/ badz+ra kA ya/ badz+ra gA tra/ badz+ra nai traM/ badz+ra shwa ra/ badz+ra g+hA Na/ badz+ra dzi tra/ badz+ra dan+t+ra/ badz+ra na kha/ badz+ra kaM sha/ badz+ra k+Sh+mI lo ma/ badz+rA b+ha ra Na/ badz+ra hA sa/ badz+ra gA ta/ badz+ra nr-it+ya/
111a7(rgyud 'grel): badz+rA yu d+ha ka ra/ badz+ra kro d+ha rA dzA d+hi pa ti/ badz+ra DA ka/ badz+ra DA ki nI dza la pa ra br-i ti/ shI g+h+ra a gats+tsha gats+tsha/ badz+ra satwa dz+nyA yA sarba mA ra big+h+na bi nA ya ka kin+na ra kaM pu ru Sha tshaM ga ru Sha gan+d+harba yak+Sha rak+Sha sa b+hu ta ma hA pre ta/ kum+b+haN Da a
111a8(rgyud 'grel): basmAd/ k+She tra pA la/ be tA Da/ pU ta na/ duSh+TA nA ga gra hA da ya ye sarba dz+wa ra/ sarba b+had+hi/ k+Shu dro pa tra ba kA ri NaHsarba satwa nAM sar+b+ba pi kA ra ra tAMs+thA sarbany+dzaHshI g+h+raM badz+ra ku she nA kr-iSh+yA kriSh+ya/ Ur d+ha di shi ga tA nA kr-iSh+ya kr-iSh+ya pU
111b1(rgyud 'grel): dzA ngi shrI ga rman+na kr-ib+h+yAMrmASh+Ta/ da'i \u0f7fdi shig wAn pa~MSh+kakr-ISh+Ta/ uHra dI shig d+hAn+takr-i b+hU kr-i b+h+ya/ pany+tsi ma di shI gad+hAn+nak+ShaSh+yab Sh+Ta/ bA ya byA di shi gar+dz+dzaH pa~M Sh+makl-i b+h+yA/ I shan di shrI ga d+hA nA ga~M b+haHSh+Ta/ noHde ki gan+d+had+ha
111b2(rgyud 'grel): b+h+yab+h+ya/ a shigad+haHb+hAdz+dzaH/ in+ta shig tanab+hAHk+ShaH/ AHsha man+ta la g+h+nAHn+ta g+haH/ bsa?saHlakAH5/ \u0f7fb+hU/ y-imaN+Da la gan
111b3(rgyud 'grel): kr-i Sh+ye/ pr-i b+hI maN+Da la ga tA nA kr-i Sh+ya kr-i Sh+ye/ kA ma d+ha du maN+Da la ga tA nA kr-i Sh+yA kr-i Sh+yA/ rU pa d+ha tu ga tA nA kr-i Sh+yA kr-i Sh+ya/ a rU pa d+hA tu ga tA nA kr-i Sh+yA kr-i Sh+ya/ kA ya d+hA tu ga tA nA kr-i Sh+yA kr-i Sh+ya/ b+hA ka d+hA tu ga tA nA kr-i Sh+yA kr-i Sh+ya/ tsid+had+hA tu
111b4(rgyud 'grel): ga d+han+na kr-iSh+Ta kr-iSh+ya/ pany+tsa san+na gat+t+ra nA kr-i Sh+Ta kr-iSh+Ta/ pany+tsi d+hA tu ga tAn+da kr-i Sh+yA kr-iSh+ya/ bany+tse dr-i ya gad+dan+ta kr-i Sh+ya kr-iSh+ya/ pany+tsa baiSh+Ta ya ga t+san+ta kr-i Sh+Na kr-iSh+Ta/ pany+tsa karmen dzI ya ga tAn+ta kr-iSh+mA kr-i Sh+ya/ pany+tsakarmaMn+d+ha ya bi Sha yig
111b5(rgyud 'grel): tA nA kr-iSh+yA kr-i Sh+ya/ sarba to ya tra ku tra tsit+ta ga tA nA kr-i Sh+yA kr-i Sh+ya/ ma hAsma shA ne badz+rI g+h+ri dz+wa li ta b+hU myaM ni pa ta ya ni pa ta ya/ badz+ra pA she na sarba b+hU dze Shu ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/ badz+ra shr-i kha la yA sarba pA de Shu ne ro d+ha yaM ni ro d+ha ya/
111b6(rgyud 'grel): ma ma sarba satwe Shu kA ya bak+Shit+to ba dra ba ka ra ra tAn+t+ra na ma hA kro d+ha badz+re Na tsAr+N+Na ya nur+N+Na ya/ badz+ra khaD+ge na ni krin+ta ya ni krin+ta ya/ badz+ra tri shU le na b+he da ya b+he da ya/ badz+ra kar+t+ti kA ya ha na ha na/ badz+ra pA Ne na bin+d+ha bin+d+ha/ badz+ratA
111b7(rgyud 'grel): la keHkI la ya kI la ya/ badz+ra mung+ga re NA ko Ta yA/ badz+ra tsakre Nats+tshe da ya ts+tshe da ya/ badz+ra kun+ten b+hin+da b+hin+da/ badz+ra daN+Denat+pa Da ya tA Da ya/ badz+ra par shu nats+tshin+nats+tshan+da/ sAr+d+ha tri ko Ti khaN+Di kri dAsh+ma shAn b+hU mAM sarba b+hu to b+hu ba laM ku ru kA
111b8(rgyud 'grel): ru/ badz+ra Da ma ru ki na badz+ra DA ki nI rA bA ha ya bA ha ya/ badz+ra DA ki ni b+h+yo mA ra kA yi kA na ru d+hi ra ni be da ya ni be da ya/ pany+tsa mr-i ta hA ri Ni b+h+yaHpany+tsa mr-i te ni be da ya be da ya/ sarba badz+ri DA kI nI se hi taHsarba satwA nAM shAn+tika/
111b9(rgyud 'grel): dren to topo'o// rkye'idang can dgeg gro ti phreng 'i phyi bu gro nyisebapa'i 'ateb se ba rje'i 'bye
112a1(rgyud 'grel): pauSh+TiM k+ShaM rak+Sha ba ra Na gup+ti ku ru ku ru huM hUM phaT/ zhes pa ni phreng ba'i sngags so// oM AHhUM ho h+lA swA hA/ snying po'o// oM hUM hrIM hrIM trAM hU~M hUM swAhA/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM kA la tsakrA ya AHhUM ho phaT swA hA/
112a2(rgyud 'grel): oM dAn pA ra mitwA yau hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shU la bA ra me ta yi huM phaT swA hA/ oM kAn+ni pA ra me tA yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM bIr+m+ma r+ye pA ra me tA yai hUM phaT swA hA/ oM d+hA da pA ra mi tA yai hUM phaT swA hA/ oM pradz+nyA pA ra mI trA ya
112a3(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swA hA/ oM u pA ya bI ra mi tA ye hUM phaT swA hA/ oM pra Ni d+hA na bA ra mai tA ye huM phaT swA hA/ oM pA la pA ra mai r+b+r-i tA ye hUM phaT swA hA/ oM dz+nyA na pA ra mi tA yai hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM dzI ya g+ha Te b+h+yo hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM birmA
112a4(rgyud 'grel): yag+ha Te b+h+yo hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM sarba tsihU~M b+h+ya hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM sarba mud+de b+h+yo hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM tsan+ti ma Na ye hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM d+harmA gar+b+ha hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM d+harmA shaM khA ya hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM kalpa br-i k+Sha ya hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM
112a5(rgyud 'grel): ak+Sho b+h+ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM a mo g+ha sid+d+hi ye huM phaT swA hA/ oM rat+na saM b+ha ba ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM a mi tA b+ha ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM bai ro tsa nA ya hUM phaT swA hUM/ oM lo tsa nA yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM mA ma kyai huM phaT swA hA/
112a6(rgyud 'grel): oM pAr+b+ba rA yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM tA ra yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra d+hA tI shA d+yaM huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra pA Na yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM kha gar+b+ha ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM k+Shi ti gar+b+hA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM lo ke shwa rA ya huM phaT swA hA/
112a7(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba nai ba ra Na bi skaM b+ha ne huM phaT swA hA/ oM sa man+ta b+ha drA ya hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM gin+d+ha badz+rA yai hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ru pa badz+rA yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM ra sa badz+ra yaM huM phaT swA hA/ oM s+phaR+sha badz+rA yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM sham+b+ha/
112a8(rgyud 'grel): badz+rA yai hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM d+harmAd+hA tu badz+ra ye huM phaT swA hA/ oM uSh+mA Sha ya hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM big+h+nAn+ta ka ya hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM pradz+nyA na kA ta ye hUM phaT/ oM pad+mAR+tha kA yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM ya mAn+ta kA ya huM phaT swAH/
112b1(rgyud 'grel): oM stam+b+ha na ye huM phaT swA hA/ oM ma Ni ma n+yai hUM phaT swA hA/ oM sto b+hi n+yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM a ti bIr+ya yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM a ti ni lA yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM sarba d+ha ri NI b+h+yo huM phaT swA hA/ oM Sha DaM gA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM/
112b2(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra nA rtsa kA ye huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra bA rA h+yaM hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra ma he shwa r+ye hUM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra oMn+d+ran huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra brah+ma ts+yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra ma hA la g+h+nAM huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra kau mA r+ye huM phaT
112b3(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM badz+ra biSh+Ta byai hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM aSh+TaSh+Ta ke na tsa tuHSh+Ta Shi badz+ra yo gi nI b+h+yo hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM Sha Da tra~M shA tits+tsha b+h+yo hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra baiSh+Ta be hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra \u0f7fnai dr-i t+ya ye huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+rA hU~M
112b4(rgyud 'grel): yai du phaT swAt+ma/ oM prad+d+ho d+hA ye hU~M phaT swAH/ a badz+ren d+hA ya hU~M phaT swAH/ oM bidzi sha ra ya hU~M phaT swAH/ oM badz+ra brAh+ma Ni hU~M phaT swAH/ oM badz+ra bai rA ya k+Sha ya hU~M phaT swAH/ oM badz+ra karti ke yA ya hU~M phaT swAH/
112b5(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra ba ya be hUM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra ya mA ye huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra yak+She b+h+yo hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM bA ru N+ye hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ba ya byai huM phaT swA hA/ oM yA mi n+yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM yak+Shi ts+yai hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA ba lA ya
112b6(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swA hA/ oM a tsa lA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM Tak+ki rA dzA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM nI la dan+d+ha ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM sum+b+ha rA dzA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM ro drA k+ShuM huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra shrI kha la yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM tsun+ta ye
112b7(rgyud 'grel): huM phaT swAhA/ oM b+h+r-i kub+h+yAM huM phaT swA hA/ oM ma rI ts+yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM pra t+ye ka mA sa b+he d+he na ShaSh+Ti ut+ta ra tr-i sha ta badz+ra ti thi de bI b+h+yo huM phaT swA hA/ oM Sha Ta tr-i sha ta pra tIts+tsha b+h+yo hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra dzA yA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM
112b8(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra kar ko Ta kA ya hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra bA su ka yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM nan+tA ya huM phaT/ oM badz+ra rak+Sha ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+re ma hA pad+ma ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra ku li kA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra sha kha pA lA ya hu phaT/
113a1(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ oM badz+ra pad+ma ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra bai dza yA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM shwa nA s+yA ye huM phaT swA hA/ oM sU k+Sha rA s+yA yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM b+ha g+ha s+yA huM phaT swA hA/ oM d+h+r-i ka kA s+ya ye huM phaT swA hA/ oM/
113a2(rgyud 'grel): ga ru DA s+ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM u lA k+Sha s+ya yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM gr-i d+hu s+yA huM phaT swA hA/ oM kA k+Sha s+yA yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM b+hU te b+h+yo hUM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra tsan+d+ra ya hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra sUr+yA ye huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra mang+ga
113a3(rgyud 'grel): lA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra bud+d+hA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra br-i ha swa ta ye huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra shukrA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra sha ni sh+tsa rA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra ke tA bai huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra ra hA be huM phaT swA hA/
113a4(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra kA lAg+na ye hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra d+hU baM hu phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra kas+tha ye hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra k+She ta b+h+yo hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM d+hA da sha rA si b+h+yo hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM Sho Ta sha ka lA b+h+yo hUM phaT swA hA/ oM da sha dkI le b+h+yo hU~M
113a5(rgyud 'grel): phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra nan+di ke shwa rA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra ma hA kA lA ya hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra gar+b+ha kat+tA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra b+h+r-i gi ne huM phaT swA hA/ oM sarba k+She tra pA le b+h+yo hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM sarba d+hu ti b+h+yo hu~M phaT/
113a6(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM hA rI Sh+ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM sarba si dz+haiM b+h+yo hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM d+harmA tsa kA ya hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM b+ha drA g+ha TA ya hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra dur+yA b+h+yo hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM b+ho d+hi br-ik+ShA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM ru bud+d+ha b+ho d+hi satwe b+h+yo/
113a7(rgyud 'grel): na mo huM phaT swAhA/ pho nya badz+ra nye badz+rA ny+dza badz+rA ny+tsa badz+rany+dzi badz+ra nyi badz+ra hUM phaT She swA hA/ oM dz+nya badz+ra dz+nye badz+ra dz+nyo badz+ra dz+nyA badz+ra dz+nyo badz+ra dz+nye badz+ra huM phaT swA hA/ oM dza badz+ra dza badz+ra dzir badz+ra dzu badz+ra dz+r-IM badz+ra dzaM badz+ra hu~M phaT swA hA/
113a8(rgyud 'grel): oM tsha badz+ra tsha badz+ra tshA badz+ra tshu badz+ra r+m+ma badz+ra tshaM badz+ra hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM tsa badz+ra tsi badz+ra ts+tsha badz+ra tsu badz+ra r+thaM badz+ra tsa bodz+ra huM phaT swA hA/ de bzhin du sngar bstan pa'i sa bon kun la yang sbyar bar bya'o// oM ba ru N+ye huM phaT swAhA/
113b1(rgyud 'grel): oM ba ya be hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma ya n+ye huM phaT swA hA/ oM yak+Sha n+ye hUM phaT swA hA/ oM nI la dar+N+Na hUM phaT swA hA/ oM Tak+ki rA dz+nyA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM a la ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA bA lA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM
113b2(rgyud 'grel): sam+b+ha dA dzA ya tsi phaT sa~M hA/ oM badz+ra da~M tak+Sha hu~M phaT swAH/ oM badz+ra shri kha lA~M ya hU~M phaT swAH/ oM badz+ra tsu nI nr-i paTu swAH/ oM badz+ra d+h+r-i ki ra~M shu baT swAH/ oM badz+ra ma ri tsu tsa praT swAH/ oM badz+ra shaSh+Tha shA
113b3(rgyud 'grel): hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra dza yA ya hUM phaT swAhA/ oM badz+ra karko TA ya hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra bA su ki hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+rA man+ta hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra tik+Sha kA ya hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra maH pad+ma ma hU~M phaT swAhA/
113b4(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra ku la na ka ya buM phaT swAH/ oM badz+ra shwa kha pA lA ya hu pan+d+ha steH/ oM badz+ra pad+hA ya hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM badz+ra bi dzA m+b+ha ya hU~M phaT swAH/ oM shA na m+me hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM b+hag+h+ra s+ya hu phaT+Ta swAb+ta/ oM d+hu ka s+yai buM baT+Ta swAH/ a
113b5(rgyud 'grel): ga ru Da s+yai hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM u lA ka s+yai hu~M phaT swAhA/ oM g+har+N+Na s+yai huM phaT sASh+TAM/ oM ka ka s+yai hu~M phaT swAhA/ oM sarba shud+d+he b+ha~M hu phaT swAH/ oM badz+ra tsan+d+rA ya hu phaT swAhA/ oM badz+ra sU d+yA hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM badz+ra ma ga
113b6(rgyud 'grel): lce hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra bud+d+hA ya hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM br-i h+ma ta ye hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra shukrA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra sha ni sh+tsa rA ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+re kAn ri hU~M phaT swAH/ oM badz+ra rA bu la hUM phaT swAhA/ oM badz+ra
113b7(rgyud 'grel): ka lAg+ne hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra d+hU be ni hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra gas+t+ya hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra sarba nak+Sha tre b+h+yo hu phaT swA hA/ oM drA da sha rA shi b+h+yo hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM Sho Sha sha kA la b+h+yo hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM badz+rA nan+de bI shwa rA ya huM phaT swA hA/
113b8(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra ma hA kA lA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra g+hAN+Da kar+N+Na ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra b+hi gi ra Te huM phaT swA hA/ oM sarba k+She Ta pA li b+h+yo hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM sarba dU ti b+h+yo hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM ha ri ti b+h+yo hu~M phaT swA hA/ oM sarba sid+d+hi b+h+yo hu~M
114a1(rgyud 'grel): phaT swA hA/ oM sarba gu ru bud+d+ha b+ho ti satwe d+ho hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM d+har+m+ma tsakrA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM b+ha dra gar+t+ti ye hUM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra dun+du b+h+yo hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM bo d+hi br-ik+Sha ye hUM phaT swA hA// de nas
114a2(rgyud 'grel): mchod pastod ci nus bya// khro rgyal la sogs gtor ma sbyin// dge ba 'di yis 'i rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sems can rnams ni bla med byang chub 'gyur bar shog/ thub pa 'khor bcas gtso bo'i byin gyis
114a3(rgyud 'grel): brlabs kyi sna tshogs phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob gyur pa// srid pa rnam gsum la gnas sems can bcom ldan dus 'khor stobs kyis de bzhin shog/ bsod nams de yis sems can mi 'gyur mchog gi
114a4(rgyud 'grel): bde bar gyur cig de la 'dud/ spyi bor rdo rje rtse lnga ru// gtso bo yab yum gshegs su gsol// thugs kar rtse dgu du ba sogs// dpral bar rtse mo bcu drug bsgom// rigs lnga yab yum bum par gshegs//
114a5(rgyud 'grel): mgrin par rtse mo sum cu gsum// sems dpa' sems ma sgo ba gshegs// lte bar rtse mo drug cu lnga// gsung gi dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol// gsang bar phyi yi sgo srung gshegs// bya ba'i rdo rje
114a6(rgyud 'grel): bden bral sogs// las la klu dang rab gdum gshegs// de nas lha'i rnam par ldang // tshogs gnas rnams bsrung bar bya// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ya ti badz+ra satwa haM dod d+had ma ko huM hUM phaT phaT swAhA// lha'i nga rgyal
114a7(rgyud 'grel): gyi spyod lam bya'o// rjes kyi bya ba'i yan lag ste bcu gcig pa'o// // sangs rgyas byang sems rgyud 'grel las// dbri mnan ma byas cho ga bsdus// dge ba bla med byang chub bsngo// nongs gyur bzod pa mdzad du
114a8(rgyud 'grel): gsol// dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon dus 'khor zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // kha che'i paN+Di ta so mnA tha dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shes rab grags kyis bsgyur ba'o//
114b1(rgyud 'grel): dpal dus kyi 'khor la'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so// rgya gar skad du/ shrI kA la tsakra sA d+ha na nA ma ni/ bod skad du/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dang po'i sangs
114b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan srid gsum mgon po mchog tu bde ba'i bdag nyid rnam par rtog pa ma lus rab tu spangs// spro dang sdud pa'i rgyur gyur dngos dang dngos med mnyam pa'i ye shes skye dang
114b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jig pa rnam par bral// skye bo rnams kyi bsam pa rnams la dgongs te hUM yig la sogs las byung dkyil 'khor gyis ni bskor// bden pa dag la gnas pa'i mchog gi snying rje dang ldan dang po'i sangs rgyas
114b4(rgyud 'grel): de la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jam pa'i dpal gyis bsdus rgyud du// sgrub thabs gsungs pa de bzhin du// 'jig rten mgon gyis 'grel mdzad pa// de dag blangs te bri bar bya// bstan bcos brtsom pa'i dus
114b5(rgyud 'grel): med cing // mdzad las dbyung bar ma nus kyang // bsgom phyir sgrub thabs 'di byas pas// blo ldan rnams la bzod par gsol// dang por sngags pa mchog tu snying rje dang ldan pa gzhan gyis bya ba byed par
114b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pas// zhi ba la sogs las kyi bye brag gis// rgya mtsho'i 'gram la sogs pa'i gnas yid du 'ong ba'i bsam gtan gyi gnas su/ bla ma dang / rgyal ba dang / de'i sras rnams la gus pas/ bcom ldan
114b7(rgyud 'grel): 'das dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi bris sku la sogs pa bzhugs su gsol/ mchod pa dang maN+Dal la sogs pa gzhung nas bshad pa ltar bshams pa la 'jam pa la sogs pa'i stan la bsdad la// shin tu gus
114b8(rgyud 'grel): pa dang ldan pa'i rang gi yid kyis phyag btsal ba la sogs pa rnams dang / phyi'i mchod pa rgya chen po rnams dbang po rnams dang mnyam por bzhag pa ste/ ji ltar gsungs pa ltar dag par byas pa'i
115a1(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi lnga'i ri lu sran ma tsa na ka tsa ma khar bcug nas/ lus dang ngag dang / yid dang ye shes rnam par dag par bya ba la sogs pa rnams bya ba ni/ de yang mchog gi snying rje dang bdud
115a2(rgyud 'grel): rtsi'i dbang gis sems la brlan pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dpal dri ma med par lha nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i don du lus dang ngag dang / yid dang ye shes rnam par dag par
115a3(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa/ oM AHhAM ho haM k+ShaHpradz+nyo pA yA ta ma ka kA ya pA kr-id+ha dz+nyA nA d+hi pa ti ma ma k+Sha ya bAk+Shit+ta ta dz+nyA na badz+ra badz+ra badz+rA mr-i ta swa b+hA baM ku ru ku ru kan+nad+d+ha twA ya trA nA niHswa b+ha baM swA hA/ zhes pa'i sngags brjod la/
115a4(rgyud 'grel): gtsug tor du baM yig yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje zla ba'i dkyil 'khor cha bcu drug pa yongs su rdzogs pa lta bu sngags pas bsam mo// de nas kaM gtsug tor nas bsams te sen mo'i bar gyi lus sbrul
115a5(rgyud 'grel): pags pa rjes pa ltar bsam mo// de ltar zhi ba dang rgyas pa drag la'o// dbang la sogs pa gzhung ches kyi dog nas ma bris so// de nas yang de nyid du gsungs pa'i/ swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsarba d+harmaHswab+hA
115a6(rgyud 'grel): ba shud+d+ho&haM/ zhes pas brjod do// de nas dpral bar o yig yongs su gyur pa las 'od dpag med sku mdog dkar po/ mgrin par aHyig yongs su gyur pa las rin chena'i byung ldan sku mdog
115a7(rgyud 'grel): dmar po/ thugs kar huM yig yongs su gyur pa las don yod grub pa sku mdog nag po// lte bar ho yig yongs su gyur pa las rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog ser po/ gtsug tor du haM yig yongs su gyur pa las
115a8(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa sku mdog ljang gu gsang gnas su k+Sha yig yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje sems dpa' sku ma dag sngon po rnams dgod pa ni/ gsung bar 'gyur ba'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan rnams dang ldan pa'o//
115b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni rdo rje'i zhal dag pa dang rigs drug dgod pa'i nges pa'o// de nas lag pa dag pa'i sngags badz+rod do/ o hraHsar+b+ba sta rA dza mA rA kle shan+ta ka ra badz+ra tik+Sha duHkhats+tsha da ma ma ka raM bi sho d+ha ya swA hA/ zhes pa'i
115b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di nyid kyi lag pa mnye ba ni lag pa dag pa'i nges pa'o// de nas a la sogs pa'i mthar thug pa'i dbyangs yig bco lnga ni/ a i r-i u laM/ a e ar au a la/ ha ya ra wa la/ rnams
115b3(rgyud 'grel): lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe'u chung gi rtsa ba'i tshigs nas brtsams te/ mthe bo'i bar gyi tshigs rnams la nam mkha' la sogs pa dgod pa'o// de nas lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bo'i steng gi tshigs nas
115b4(rgyud 'grel): brtsams te/ mthe'u chung gi tshigs kyi bar du la yig la sogs pa dgod pa ni/ lA wA rA yA/ Al o Ar ai aHl-I U r-I I A/ rnams ni sa la sogs pa rim pa bzhin no// de nas thal mo
115b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyar ba'i nang du zla ba dang nyi ma'i dbus su hUM yig kha dog sngon po bsam/ yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar zla ba dang nyi ma dang sgra gcan gyi sa bon dang ldan pas rtse lnga'i phyag rgya bcings te/ gtsug tor nas
115b6(rgyud 'grel): bortsams nas/ rkang pa'i sen mo'i bar du bdag nyid la reg par bya zhing sngags brjod la/ oM AHhUM to haM k+ShaHkA ya bAk+ShI d+ha dz+nyA na d+hi pa te badz+ra kA yA ma ma k+Sha ya bAk+ShIt+ta dz+nyA na badz+ra badz+rA kA ya sA b+hA baM ku ru ku ru swA hA/
115b7(rgyud 'grel): de'i nga rgyal dang bcas pas/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra kA ya sA b+ha bAt+ma ko haM/ zhes pa ni lus dang ngag dang yid dang ye shes rnam par dag pa'o// de ltar rigs drug la dgod par bya swA na sa/ de nas yan lag drug la
115b8(rgyud 'grel): dgod pa ni/ lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar ba'i mthe bo gnyis snying gar gtad de/ oM b+h+r-i hri da yA ya nA ma/ zhes pa'o// mgo bor oM hUM si ra se swA hA/ zhes pa'o// gtsug tor la oM Sh+T+r-i she khA yai bau ShaT zhes pa'o//
116a1(rgyud 'grel): yan lag thams cad la oM d+h+r-i ka ba tsa ya hUM zhes brjod cing lag pa gnyis kyis lus thams cad la reg par bya'o// oM dz+nyA ne dra ya wa ShaT zhes pas so// mig la oM dz+dzaHAs+thA ya phaT
116a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas phyogs thams cad du mthe bong dang mdzub mos se gol gtogs shing dge ba'i bya ba la g.yon gyis/ mi dge ba'i bya ba la g.yas pas dgod do// de nas oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta hr-i dra ya si ra shI khi ka ba tse
116a3(rgyud 'grel): netra as+tha badz+ra Sha ShaMgs b+ha bAd+h+r-i ko haM/ zhes pa ni yan lag drug la dgod pa'i cho ga'o// de nas srung 'khor gyi don du nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su dang por 'khor lo bzhi bsgom pa ni/ de nas de nyid du
116a4(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa ltar srung ba'i 'khor lo rnam par bsam par bya ba'i phyir/ de yang dang por ya yig yongs su gyur pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'og dang steng du hUM yig yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje kha sbyor ro// de nas
116a5(rgyud 'grel): raM yig yongs su gyur pa las me'i dkyil 'khor dang / waM yig yongs su gyur pa las/ chu'i dkyil 'khor dang / lo yig yongs su gyur pa las sa'i dkyil 'khor rnams rim pa bzhin du/ kha dog nag po dang
116a6(rgyud 'grel): dmar po dang / dkar po dang / ser po rnams kyi 'og dang steng du hUM yig yongs su gyur pa las rang rang gi kha dog dang bcas pa'i rdo rje gnyis gnyis dang bcas pa rnams/ gzhu'i dbyibs dang / gru gsum dang /
116a7(rgyud 'grel): zlum po dang / gru bzhi'i rnam pa la rlung yab dang / bkra shis pad+ma dang 'khor lo rnams kyi spras pa go bar bya'o// de nas yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar dkyil 'khor bzhi gcig tu gyur pa snga dro'i grib ma'i mtshams
116a8(rgyud 'grel): dang / grong khyer gyi mtshams dang / phyi rol du nam mkha' dang sa gzhi 'dus par snang ba'i mtshams su ste/ de yang dkyil 'khor gzhi cig tu gyur pa gru bzhi rgya dang ldan pa'i gzhal yas khang bsgom pa dang / de
116b1(rgyud 'grel): ltar ra ba gsum bsgom pa dang / de ltar grong khyer srung ba'i don du grong khyer gyi mtshams su ra ba lnga bsgom par bya ba dang / de ltar 'og thams cad du rdo rje'i mdung dang / steng du mda'i dra ba shin tu rno ba dang / dbus
116b2(rgyud 'grel): su rdo rje'i sa gzhi rnams grong khyer myi mtshams su baM skyes par bya'o// de nas gzhal yas 'dag dbus su pad+ma 'am/ 'khor lo khru bcug spyi pA m+b+ha khyAd dang bcas pa 'dab ma brjod pa bsgom par bya'o//
116b3(rgyud 'grel): dbus kyi ste ba khru bzhi dang ldan pa nyi ma dang bcas pa'i gdan no// 'on kyang 'di'i bye brag ni hUM yig yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang / oM yig yongs su gyur pa'am/ b+h+rUM yig yongs su gyur pa las
116b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas khang dang / baM yig yongs su gyur pa 'am/ oM yig yongs su gyur pa las pad+ma dang / raM yig yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom zhes bya'o// de ltar ra baM la sogs pa bsgoms nas/
116b5(rgyud 'grel): yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar sngags kyi bye brag tu gyur pa 'di lta ste/ oM AHhUM ra badz+ra tsan+d+ra sIr+ya ra huM ka lAg+na ya/ ka ya bAk+Shit+ta dz+nyA nA badz+ra pra kA raM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ zhes pa ni ra ba'i sngags so// oM hUM bi shwa kA ya
116b6(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra kU bA gA raM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ zhes pa ni gzhal yas khang gi sngags so// oM paHbi shA ba dz+ra pad+ma ku ru ku ru swA hA/ zhes pa ni pad+ma'i sngags so// oM ra badz+ra sUr+ya badz+ra sUr+yA sa naM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ zhes pa ni nyi ma'i gdan
116b7(rgyud 'grel): gyi sngags so// de nas de'i steng du aM yig dkar po yongs su gyur pa las/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin/ ka yig la sogs pa gsal byed 'dus pa'i bdag nyid las/ zla ba'i dkyil
116b8(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bsgom pa me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no// yang de nyid du gsungs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid g.yon dang g.yas su bskor ba dbyangs yig sum cu aHtshig drag dang klad
117a1(rgyud 'grel): kor dang bcas pa bsgom pa ni/ a i raM A li 'di rnams ni dang po lnga bslus pa'o// de yang yon tan gyi dbye bas a e ar o a la rnams ni gnyis pa lnga rnams bsdus pa'o// de nas
117a2(rgyud 'grel): rkyen gyis byung ba hA yar lal rnams ni gsum pa'i bsdus pa lnga// bsdus pa bcoM lnga'i mthar thig le ni aM yig ste/ bcu drug pa 'di rnams ni g.yon bskor gyis so// de nas g.yas bskor gyis nag po'i phyogs
117a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis dang po la sogs pa dgod pa/ lAm+bA rA m+b+ha hA/ A la oM A e AM/ lAM uR+She I A/ de lta bco lnga dang gnam steng gi mthar tshig drag ni AHste 'di de ltar dbyangs yig bcu drug ces bya'o// de nas
117a4(rgyud 'grel): de'i steng du aHyig dmar po yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin du bu mo'i bdag nyid bsam mo// yang de nyid du gsungs pa'i ka yig la sogs pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
117a5(rgyud 'grel): gsal byed bzhi bcu'i bdag nyid de yang / ha ya la la rnams dang // sna tshan drug sa m+b+ha nan lda dang/ kyis brjod pas la wA ya na nams bzung ste/ wa m+b+haHAl+yA R+tha mAHs+yAr+tha/ Sh+TA shAn+tu/ b+hU d+had+d+har+m+ma/ rmA
117a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan pa so sor rtogs ye shes kyi bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o// de nas gsum po gcig tu 'dres pa la bri/ yig gis smras pa bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyis bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o// de nas lus kyi yan la
117b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rdzogs pa haM yig gi bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin 'og nas phyag 'tshal ba'i skabs su 'chad pa'i dpal dus kyi 'khor ste/ 'on kyang phyag nyi shu rtsa drug pa phyag lhag
117b2(rgyud 'grel): ma gnyis kyis glang po che'i bags pa 'dzin pa la/ kha dog ser po zhabs rkyang bsum du bzhugs pa/ zhal gcig ma spyan gsum ma/ phyag gnyis kyi gri gug dang thod pa bsdams pa/ phyag rgya lngas spras pa'i sna tshogs
117b3(rgyud 'grel): yum gyi mgul nas 'khyud pa/ sbrul gyi rgyan gyis btsun pa/ stag gi sham thabs sbyangs pa/ khro bo'i dbang po rdo rje shugs su bdag nyid bsgom mo// yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar phyag rgya la sogs pa dgod pa las/ phyug
117b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya drug rang gi lus la dgod pa/ oM hU~MH/ bA ma dak+ShI Na kaN+Tha yor badz+ra kun+da le nAM hU~M pheMT phaT swAhA/ oM aM aHka b+hi kin+d+re badz+ra me khA badz+ra kan+ti~M ka huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM a A bA ma dak+Shi Na kar yod badz+ra ru tsa ka ru hUM phaT phaT/
117b5(rgyud 'grel): h+mA b+h+ra mad k+ShIn pUd yo badz+ranA pur du d+hU baT+Ta paT/ oM ta ba~M pan+d+hak+Sharam twA~M shAts+tshi si d+hi wa badz+rA bI ro ma Ni shi ra si san+ni ge b+h+yas dz+ra hU~M baT phaT/ oM oM it+pan dri sha ra badz+rAr+d+ha n+ta badz+ra pa Ta phaT/ Ar+d+he trai thA phaT paT+Ta/ oM a aH
117b6(rgyud 'grel): oM sarbA so ra ka tri swa ra sa b+hA byA badz+ra ye d+b+ha pa bIt+ta san+ne huM hUM phaT phaTi/ zhes pa ni phyag rgya drug gi cho ga'o// de nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i glang po'i pags pa'i phyag rgya bzhi'i sngags rnams brjod par bya ste/ oM k+ShaHdun+d+han+tu/ b+h+rUM
117b7(rgyud 'grel): mnak+Sha ya~M ka ra b+hag+na tsarmaHTo hu hUM phaT phaT/ oM hrAk+Sha/ tri shad+tha ra sap+ta tiHswadir+b+ha byan+da nasad+d+ha bar+d+ha t+ya ku la sha ta si ro b+hirbu N+Da mA la skan+d+ha ba laM bi ni san+ne huM hU~M phaT phaT/ oM ha ta dz+nyA du d+hU ban+d+ha san+na bi shud+d+ha swa b+hA ba shaM ru sa
117b8(rgyud 'grel): pA la mA le huM hUM phaT phaT/ zhes pi ni phyag rgya bzhi'i cho ga'o// de ltar phyag rgya bcu rnams pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i dbye ba dang / gnas bcu drug gi de'i bye bas stong pa nyid bcu drug ces pa ni phyag rgya dgod pa'i cho ga'i rim
118a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// de nas g.yon dang g.yas kyi phyag mtshan gyi sa bon rnams brjod par bya ste/ oM k+ShaHkro d+ha badz+ra huM phaT/ oM k+Sha khaD+ga huM phaT/ oM k+ShaHbadz+ra tri shU la huM phaT/ oM k+ShaHbadz+ra kan+ta ri huM phaT/ oM k+ShaHbadz+ra
118a2(rgyud 'grel): bA Na huM phaTaHoM k+ShaHbadz+rI ku sha hUM phaT/ oM k+ShaHbadz+ra Da ma ru ka huM phaT/ oM k+ShaHbadz+ra mung+ga ra huM phaT/ oM k+SheHbadz+ra tsakra huM phaT/ oM k+ShaHbadz+ra kun+ta huM phaT/ oM k+ShAHbadz+ra dar+b+ba hU~M phaT/ oM k+ShaHbedz+ra paR+Sha huM phaT/ zhes pa rnams ni
118a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas kyi phyag mtshan rnams so// de nas g.yon gyi phyag mtshan rnams ni// deng por haM yig brjod par bya/ oM hUM badz+ra gat+ne ho pheM phaT/ oM haM badz+ra khe tra hau paM phaT/ oM hUM badz+ra k+Sha pa le ho pheM phaT/ oM haM badz+ra tsa ba ho ba~M phaT/
118a4(rgyud 'grel): oM hUM badz+ra pA sha ho pheM phaT/ oM hUM badz+ra rat+na ho pheM phaT/ oM hUM badz+ra pad+ma ho pa~M phaT/ oM hUM badz+ra shaM kha ho pheM phaT/ oM hU~M badz+rA daR+sha'o paM phaT/ oM hUM badz+ra shriM kha le ho pau phaT/ oM hAM tsa tu rbe tA swa b+hA ba brah+ma shi ra ho pa~M phaT/ zhes
118a5(rgyud 'grel): panams byag g.yon pa rnams su mi che nam dgod pa'i dam 'aM// de nas thang po'i bkris pa'i sngag sa rnams brjod pa 'i// oMt+paSh+T+r-i Sh+T+r-iSh+T+r-iSh+T+r-ib+h+yaSh+Ta NA~M N+Di rnaM rdzu hU~M / sarba bi k+Sh+ma bi rig
118a6(rgyud 'grel): dza tsarma pan+d+had+hA rak+ta shra ba ta hUM paM/ phyag g.yas dang g.yon gyi sdigs mdzub dang bcas nas bzung ba ni/ g.yas kyi mgo bo'i phyogs kyi lag po dang / 'ogayon gyi rkang pa nas bzung bar bsam pa ni bigs pa bzung
118a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rim pa'i cho ga'o// de nas klu'i rgyal po bcu dgod pa'i sngags ni oM huM badz+ra dza ya nA gen+d+ha badz+ra dzan+da mu ku Ta b+han+d+he tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM k+Shu badz+ra bi dza yA na gen+d+ha badz+ra pan+d+ha b+han+d+he tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM h+yaM h+yA
118a8(rgyud 'grel): badz+rag no cag badz+ra pa d+mo b+h+ra ma ts+li ni kuN+Da la ya ti Sh+ThahrISh+Tha rbu d+hU ba Te baT/ oM rba rba badz+rab tsug y-i Sha pA lo bAm de N+Di Ne ru tsa ki mo/ ti N+DiSh+Thahu hU~M ba~M Ta phaT/ oM hAH brtanan mr-i/ ka ma~M khA l-i/ TI ka ma Na k+Sha tISh+Thats+tsha n+tu
118b1(rgyud 'grel): phaT phaT/ oM h+la d+hA badz+ra tak+Sha ko ma hA pad+mo bA ma dak+Shi Na bA ra nA pur yoHtiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha huM hUM phaT phaT/ de ltar sngags dang phyag rgya dgod par byas la/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang bcas pa'i rkang pa bcu drug pas bsdams pa rnams
118b2(rgyud 'grel): bskrad pa dang / bdud la sogs pa bskrad pa'i sngags dus kyi 'khor lo'i sngags pas yang nas yang du bzlas pa 'di lta ste/ oM na mo badz+ra satwA ya/ na mo bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwe b+ha/ na mo badz+ra kro d+hen+da rA dze b+ha/ na mo bi shwa mA tre/ na mo
118b3(rgyud 'grel): bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa de bi b+h+ya/ na mo badz+ra DA ki nI b+ha/ oM na mo b+ha ga ba te kA la tsakrA ya/ badz+ra bai rA ba b+h+r-i ka rA ya ma hen+na nI la bar+N+Na sha ba rI rA ya/ mA ra kle sha hri da yA kAn+ta sI ta rak+ta tsa ra NA ya kr-iSh+Ta rak+ta si ta kar+N+Na ya Ni la si ta pI ta rak+ta daSh+ThA
118b4(rgyud 'grel): ka rA lo gra b+hI Sha Na mu khA ya/ kr-iSh+Na rak+ta sa ta sa bye ta ra kan+d+ha ya/ drad sha b+hu dza ya/ Sha Da baM sha ti ka rA ya/ badz+ra khaD+ga tri shU la kan+ta ri bA Na aM ku sha Da ma ru ka mung+ga ra tsakra kun+ta daN+Da baR+Sha badz+ra g+har+N+Na khe Ta kha T+wAM ga ga pA la tsA pa pA sha rat+na
118b5(rgyud 'grel): ka ma la shaM kha A daR+sha shI kha la brah+ma shi ro ga dza tsa ra ma d+hi kA rA ya/ b+hag+h+na tsarma Ni ba sanA ya/ kan+ne mur+tha mA lA ba ni shi ra si badz+ra paT+Ta mu ku Te badz+ra ka pA lA ma lAr+d+ha tsan+na d+ha ra ya/ kuN+Da la ru tsi ka kar+t+ti ka mai kha lA nU pU ra b+hasma yadz+dzA
118b6(rgyud 'grel): pa b+hI ta shi ro ma Ni ma hA mu drA nA gen+na bi b+hu Sha NA ya/ badz+ra Da ki nAM saM to ShaM ta hi da yA ya/ in+d+ra g+ni ya ma nai ri t+ya bA ru Na bA yu ku be re shA na brah+ma baSh+Ti bi nA ya ka karti ke yai nan+di ma hA kA la gra ha nak+Sha trak+She tri pA la/ su rin+te su ren+d+ra pa NI da
118b7(rgyud 'grel): b+hu ten+na na ren+d+ra saM sU ta tsa ra NA ya/ zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rkang pa bcu drug pa'i sngags so// bdud rigs brgya'i phreng ba'i sngags kyi sa bon rnams ni gong du sngags brjod pa'i skabs su bshad pas 'dir ma bris so// rkang pa
118b8(rgyud 'grel): bdun cu rtsa gnyis pa ni gzhung ches dogs pas ma bris so// de nas rdo rje dgod par bya ba de nyid gsungs pa ltar dpal dang ldan pa'i yan lag rnams la dgod pa ni dpral bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dkar po la oM yig dgod do//
119a1(rgyud 'grel): mgrin par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dmar po la AHyig dgod do// snying gar sgra gcan gyi dkyil 'khor nag po la hUM yig dgod do// lte bar dus me'i dkyil 'khor ser po la ho yig dgod do// btsug to/
119a2(rgyud 'grel): dang gsang bar rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ljang gu dang sngon po la haMk+ShaHdgod de// de ltar dkyil 'khor drug bsgoms la dkyil 'khor de rnams nyid la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du sa bon
119a3(rgyud 'grel): de rnams yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rnams te/ rtse mo bcu bdun pa dang / rtse mo sum cu so gsum pa dang / rtse mo dgu pa dang / rtse mo drug cu rtsa lnga pa dang / rtse mo lnga pa dang / yang rtse mo sum cu gsum pa zhes pa ste/ rdo rje
119a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyang so so'i dkyil 'khor gyi kha dog dang 'dra bar ji ltar gsung ba'i tshad ltar bsgom par bya ste/ yang de nyid nas gsungs pa ltar rdo rje nor bu rnam par dag pa sor gcig bsgom par bya'o// spyi gtsug gi 'khor lo rnam par
119a5(rgyud 'grel): dag pa sor gnyis pa'o// dpral ba'i 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor bzhi pa'o// mgrin pa'i 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor lnga pa'o// snying ga'i 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor brgyad pa'o// lci ba'i 'khor lo rnam par dag
119a6(rgyud 'grel): ba sor dgu pa'o// gsang gnas kyi 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor bcu gnyis pa'o// de nas g.yon gyi dpung mgo'i tshig la nga ngi d+hi dr-i dIng / g+hab+hig+h+nAM g+hu b+hU g+haM/ ga gi gI gu glai ga/ kha khi khI khu khI kha/ ka kik+ShaM kukl-i kaM/ zhes pa nam
119a7(rgyud 'grel): la nga ga da/ na rgya ma
119b1(rgyud 'grel): sun su na sa na kun
119b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rdo bcu gnyis rnams la rdo rje bsgom par bya/ de yang sbyid dag smrangs pa ltung ba sa ni man pa la cu'i ste shAn bung drung bdag nyid du// bla ma g.yas pa 'dring po'i
119b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid do// de ltar g.yon pa'i mkhrig ma'i tshigs la Ta'i sde tshan thur ngu rnams so// g.yas pa'i mkhrig ma'i tshogs la ring po rnams so// g.yon gyi spyi mgo'i tshigs la pa'i sde tshan thung ngu rnams so// g.yas
119b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi spyi mgo'i chags la ring po rnams so// pus mo g.yon pa'i tshogs la ka'i sde tshan thung ngu rnams so// pus mo g.yas pa'i tshigs la ring po rnams so// long bu g.yon pa'i tshigs la sa'i sde tshan thung ngu rnams kyi rang
119b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin no// long bu g.yas pa'i tshigs la ring po'i bdag nyid do// zhes pa ni tshigs rnams la rdo rje dgod pa'i cho ga'o// rdo rje de rnams kyang nam mkha' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshad dang mnyam pa/ de nyid kyis
119b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya'o// de nas rim pa de bzhin bya ba'i 'khor lo rnams la/ lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe chung nas brtsams te/ rtsa ba'i tshigs rnams la thung ngu drug gi dbye bas ka'i sde tshan ngal sogs pa drug drug las
119b7(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i rtse mo bdun bdun dang ldan pa'i rdo rje lnga bsgom par bya'o// de ltar g.yas kyi mthe bo'i tshigs steng ma nas brtsams te/ tshigs lnga la ring po drug dang ldan pa'i kA la sogs pa drug drug yongs su gyur pa las
119b8(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rnams so// g.yon gyi sor mo'i dbus kyi tshigs rnams la tsi'i sde tshan thung ngu'i bdag nyid las rdo rje rnams so// g.yon gyi sor mo'i dbus kyi tshig rnams la ring po'i bdag nyid rnams so// g.yon gyi sor mo'i
120a1(rgyud 'grel): steng gi tshigs la Ta'i sde tshan thung ngu'i bdag nyid rnams so// g.yas kyi sor mo'i rtsa ba'i tshigs rnams la ring po'i bdag nyid las so// rkang pa g.yon gyi sor mo'i tshigs rnams la snga
120a2(rgyud 'grel): ma ltar pa'i sde tshan thung ngu rnams kyis bdag nyid las so// rkang pa g.yas pa'i tshigs rnams la snga ma ltar ring po rnams kyi bdag nyid las so// de nas g.yon pa'i tshigs rnams snga ma ltar ta'i sde tshan thung ngu
120a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi bdag nyid las so// g.yas pa la ring po'i bdag nyid las so// de ltar g.yon pa'i tshig rnams la sa'i sde tshan thung ngu'i bdag nyid rnams las so// g.yas pa'i tshigs la ring po'i bdag nyid las rdo rje
120a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams te rim pa bzhin sde tshan rnams yongs su dag pa la ljang gu dang / nag po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / ser po'i kha dog rnams/ so so'i tshigs kyi tshad kyis so// de nas rna ba la sogs pa'i rdo rje dgod pa
120a5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ de nyid las gsungs pa ltar/ rna ba dag tu a A dag las rdo rje rtse gsum pa bsgom par bya'o// sna bug dag tu e ai dag las so// mig dag tu ar Ar dag las so// lce dang mchu dag la o au dgra
120a6(rgyud 'grel): las so// rdo rje dang gsang ba dag la al Al dag las so// yid dang khu ba 'dzag pa'i rtsa dag la aM aHdag las te/ 'di rnams kyang rim pa ji lta ba bzhin kha dog gi g.ye ba dang ldan par sor gcig gi tshad kyis
120a7(rgyud 'grel): so// yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar rna ba la rdo rje sor gcig pa zhes pas so// de nas gtsug tor la sogs pa rnams la rdo rje dgod pa ni/ de yang de nyid las gsungs pa ltar gtsug tor dang mgo bo dag la ha hA dag
120a8(rgyud 'grel): las rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o// lce dang rkan dag la ya yA dag las rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o// lag mthil dag la ra rA dag las so// rkang mthil dag la wa wA dag las so// 'phongs kyi g.yas g.yon dag la la lA dag las
120b1(rgyud 'grel): so// de ltar rdo rje'i lus su bdag nyid bsgom par bya ba ni/ de rnams kyi gtsug tor la sogs pa rnam par dag pa gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid do// de nas bdud kyi tshogs bsreg pa ni/ de yang de nyid nas gsungs pa
120b2(rgyud 'grel): ltar/ de rnams las 'od zer 'phros pas rdo rje 'bar bas phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i bdud kyi tshogs sems can rnams la rnam par 'tshe ba rnams bsregs nas/ steng du ljang gu 'bar ba dang / 'og tu sngon po
120b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba dang / shar dang shar lhor nag po 'bar ba dang / lho dang bden bral du dmar po 'bar ba dang / byang dang dbang ldan du dkar po 'bar ba dang / nub dang nub byang du ser po 'bar ba dang zhes so// bdud kyi
120b4(rgyud 'grel): tshegs bsregs pa'i sngags brjod par bya ste/ oM AHhUM ho haM k+ShaHthaHhraHhraHhraHra ra ra ra/ badz+ra a na la sar+b+ba ba ra Na d+harmA pra la ya swa b+hA ba sarba mA ra kA yi ka big+h+na bi nA ya kA dI nAM da sha di g+hA tA naM kA ya bak+tsir+d+ha ni/ da ha da ha/
120b5(rgyud 'grel): pa tsa pa tsa b+hasmi ku ru ku ru huM hUM phaT phaT zhes pa ni bdud rnams rnam par sreg pa'i cho ga'o// de nas lus dang ngag dang yid kyi chos rnam par dag pa gzhal yas khang dang / ra ba gsum dang / ra ba lnga rnams kyis nang dang /
120b6(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol bsrung ba'i don du/ khro bo la sogs pa rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin spro bar bya'o// de nas yang de nyid nas gsungs pa ltar dang por rdo rje shugs su bdag nyid bsgoms la/ de nyid kyi thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil
120b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la ha ya ra wal rnams brtsegs pa'i gzugs su bsam mo// de'i steng du ha las byung ba'i 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyag dang mtshan ma dang zhal rnams dang ldan pa'i sku mdog ljang gu sna bug g.yon pa nas spros te/
120b8(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo'i dbu'i steng du gzhal yas khang gi nang du zla ba'am nyi ma'i steng du gtsug tor can g.yas brkyang du bzhugs pa'o// de ltar hA yig ring po las byung ba'i gnod mdzes rgyal po kha dog sngon po sna bug g.yas nas
122a1(rgyud 'grel): du gnas pa las/ ga gA dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i sgra gcan dang dus me/ stong pa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ ra ba gsum la phyogs pa steng dang 'og tu nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor
122a2(rgyud 'grel): 'o// de ltar dwa d+h+r-i dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i zla ba dang sh+ta sa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ shar dang ma mtshams su dgod de// ts+tshe ga las yongs su rdzogs pa'i baba' lag du byug+sa
122a3(rgyud 'grel): shis/ me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ lho dang bden bral du dgod do// de ltar bu pU dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i pa wa sangs dang phur bu chu yi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ byang dang dbang ldan dag tu'o//
122a4(rgyud 'grel): de ltar d+l-i d+h+r-i dag las yongs su dag pa'i 'jug rings dang spen pa/ sa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa nub dang rlung dag tu ste/ 'di rnams ni ra ba'i phyi rol du bsrung ba'i don du gza'i tshogs rnams
122a5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa'o// de nas ra ba lnga bsrung bar bya ba'i don du klu'i rgyal po rnams spro bar bya ste/ sngon du gsungs pa ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la kha tsha tha pha tha rnams brtsegs pa'i tshul du bsams nas kha khA
122a6(rgyud 'grel): dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyal ba dang rnam par rgyal ba/ ra ba lnga la phyogs pa steng dang 'og nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o// de ltar tshi tshwa dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i karko Ta dang
122a7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dag/ shar dang me mtshams su rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o// de ltar b+h+r-i b+h+rU~M dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i chu bdag dang dung skyong / lho dang bden bral du me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o//
122a8(rgyud 'grel): de pu pU dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i dga' bo dang rigs ldan/ byang dang dbang ldan du chu'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o// de ltar th+liM b+h+r-i dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i pad+ma chen po dang 'jog po nub dang /
122b1(rgyud 'grel): rlung dag tu/ sa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o// de nas ra ba lnga'i phyi rol du bsrung ba'i don du 'byung po lha ma yin rnams bsgom par bya ste/ sngon du gsungs pa ltar nyi mi'i dkyil 'khor la ka tsa Ta pa
122b2(rgyud 'grel): ta rnams brtsegs pa'i tshul du bsam pa ste/ de nas kyang ra ba la phyogs pa steng dang 'og tu ka kA dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i ro langs dang ka sha man+da/ nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o// de
122b3(rgyud 'grel): ltar tsi tsA dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i ri na ra dang / kaM pu ru Sha khyi dang bya rog gi gdong can dang / shar dang mer rlung gi dkyil 'khor la dgod do// de ltar b+h+r-i b+h+rUM dag las yongs su rdzogs pa dri za dang 'byung po/
122b4(rgyud 'grel): phag pa dang bya rgod kyi gdong pa can/ lho dang bden bral du me'i dkyil 'khor la dgod do// de ltar pu pA dag las yongs su rdzogs pa srin po dang yi dgas/ stag dang 'ug pa'i gdong can bya dang dbang ldan du chu'i
122b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la dgod do// de ltar tAM d+h+r-i dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i brjed byed ce spyang gi gdong pa dang / bya khyung gi gdong can/ nub dang rlung du sa'i dkyil 'khor la dgod do// de rnams thams cad shes rab dang
122b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'o// yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar ye shes dang / nam mkha' dang rlung dang me dang chu dang sa rnams khams drug las byung ba'i khro bo'i rgyal po rnams dang / gzugs med dang / gzugs dang / phyogs bcu skyong
122b7(rgyud 'grel): ba dang / gza' rnams dang / klu rnams dang 'byung po rnams sde tshan drug gi bdag nyid srung zhing skyong ba/ phyi dang nang rnams su kha sbyor du gnas pa rnal 'byor pas dgod do// de nas bgegs dang log 'dren la sogs pa
122b8(rgyud 'grel): rnams gsal gdab par bya ba ni/ de yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar de las gzhan pa bgegs dang log 'dren la sogs pa rnams rdo rje lcags kyus khug cig/ rdo rje zhags pas chings shig/ khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje
123a1(rgyud 'grel): phur bu rtse mo mdung gi rnam pa rnams gnas bcur snang ba la btab par bsam mo// sngags rnams kha dog lnga dang ldan pa ste/ oM AHhu~M ho ha~MSh+Tha/ hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT badz+ra kI la k+Sha ya
123a2(rgyud 'grel): thab+hi g+h+nA dz+nyATAd+hi pa te 'ardzub Shad+hU dza 'brub tsa Na sa rba bib+hA bi nA ya d+da did+ya thA na kA ya bA kr-iHdz+nyA nA ni kI la ya kI la b+hu b+hu phaT paT zhes pa ni gdab pa'i sngags so// oM l+li badz+ra kun ra/ sA rA dI tAM shai ra si ka T+Ti rbi
123a3(rgyud 'grel): yen+d+ra T+wAM guh+ya ya n+te badz+ra kI la kAnA ko Ta yA ko Ta ya/ tAk+Shat+na k+ShaN+TaSh+NI Sh+T+rI trAM/ hrIM k+Sh+mAM Sha k+Sha hUM hUM hUM phaT ba Ta phaT/ zhes pa ni bzung ba'i sngags so// de nas nga rgyal byas nas phur bu rnams bsrung ba'i don du/
123a4(rgyud 'grel): khro bo bcu la bka' sgo ba ni/ de'i don du dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal por gsungs pa/ srid pa gsum gyi gnas su dbyug sngon can gyis bdud rnams ma lus brdung bar byed par 'gyur ro// dus
123a5(rgyud 'grel): mtha'i nyi ma dang mtshungs khro bo mi g.yo ba yis 'ching ste phur 'debs shin tu brtson 'grus so// DA k+kis de yi brtson 'grus 'jig rten sa stengs gyur par gnod mdzes rgyal pos nges par byed pa'o// gtsug tor
123a6(rgyud 'grel): can gyis de yi rdzu 'phrul 'jig ste nges par khro bo'i lha mo rnams kyi snga ma bzhin du'o zhes pas so// oM hu~M kro d+hin+do ha/ kro d+ha na mA dz+nyA dA ya ka swA hA/ de nas khro bo rnams la so so'i sngags kyi rkang pas bka' sgo ba/
123b1(rgyud 'grel): oM hAM badz+ra kro d+ha rA dzA ma hoSh+NI Shor+d+ha di shi rak+Sha ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM yaM badz+ra kro d+ha rA dzA ti ba la sarba big+h+nA nAn+ta kapU ra ba di shi rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM raM badz+ra kro d+ha rA dza dzam+b+ha ka duSh+Ta pradz+nyAn+na d+hA ka dak+Shi Na di shi rak+ShAM ku ru ku
123b2(rgyud 'grel): ru sAhA/ oM waM badz+ra kro d+ha rA dza bi rag pad+mAn+na kaut+tA ra di shi rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru sAhA/ a le badz+ra kro d+ha rA dza staM b+ha kA ya man+ta ka pa sh+tsi mi daM shai rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ zhes pa yang de nyid las/ oM lAMHbadz+ra kro d+hA ra dzi ma hA ba
123b3(rgyud 'grel): le bA ya b+h+r-i di shi rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM waMHbadz+ra kro d+hi rA dzA tsa le sha na di shi rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM rAHbadz+ra kro d+ha rA dzA Tak+ki nai ri d+he de shi rak+ShaM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM yAHbadz+ra kro d+ha rA dza nI la dar+N+Nag+ne ya daM shi rak+ShaM ku
123b4(rgyud 'grel): ru ku ru swAhA/ oM b+h+yaHbadz+ra kro d+hA rA dza sum+b+ha d+ho ti rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ zhes pa'i sngags kyi rkang pa 'di rnams ni/ rgyud kyi sgrub thabs las gsungs pa'i tshogs sngags pas dgod par bya'o// de nas oM sarba ta thag tu
123b5(rgyud 'grel): rak+Sha tsakra swa b+hA bAt+ma ka~M haM zhes brjod la 'i rgyal bya'o// 'di ni bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i cho ga'o// de nas stong pa nyid du bsgoms nas bdag nyid gsungs par 'gyur ba'i bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo// zhal
123b6(rgyud 'grel): dang phyag bzhugs tshul rnams su skad cig gis bsams la/ de yang de nyid las gsungs pa ltar bdag nyid skad cig gis lha'i skur bsgoms nas/ rang gi snying gar paM yig yongs su gyur pa las pad+ma dmar
123b7(rgyud 'grel): po 'dab ma brgyad pa/ de'i lte ba'i steng du oM yig yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su de kho na zhes pa ni/ hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa de la kha dog lnga dang ldan pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba rnal
123b8(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pas bsgom par bya'o// de'i 'od zer gyis thog ma med pa'i sngon du sangs rgyas pa'i dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo spyan drangs te/ nam mkha'i dbus na bzhugs pa la/ rnal 'byor pas
124a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod cing phyag 'tshal ba ni/ sgrub thabs kyi tshig rab tu bsdus par bya ba'i phyir dang / dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa rjes su bsgrub pa'i phyir phyag btsal ba'i tshigs su bcad
124a2(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rnams dang rgyal sras khro bo phyogs skyong klu rnams dang ni de rnams kyi// lha mo'i tshogs dang rgyas 'debs bdag dang mchod pa'i lha mo rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// gang
124a3(rgyud 'grel): zhig brjod par gyung pa'i zhal gyis grangs rnams g.yas bskor gyis ni go bya ste/ g.yas dang g.yon gyis rdza ba'i phyag na chu skyes dang ni rang mtshan go bar bya// sna tshogs pad+ma zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan dus ma
124a4(rgyud 'grel): 'phrog byed zhal gcig bdog dkar// rig byed phyag rtse gsum tham rudang dpal gyi drung dang ba d+h+r-ig 'dzin pa'o// rtse mo can gyi mig ldan g.yon drugan rgyal bsgyel ba gnas te g.yas su dran pa nyid//
124a5(rgyud 'grel): bdog dmar po'ad ba lnga lcags kyu gzhung nga zhags pa rnams dang bcas pa de dag la/ gor dag 'byed ma yis bzung ba dkar dang ba'i g.yas brkyang zhabs kyi snying gar mnan// sa bon chu yig dang ni rdo rje dag
124a6(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i ral pa'i tha~Mng tshugs sngon po can// mi spyod pa ste zhal gyi pad+ma sman dang 'od ldan ri bong can rnams rgya mtsho mtshungs// dbus dang g.yas dang g.yon rnams sngon po dmar po dkar po rnams dang ldan
124a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mgrin gsum pa// g.yon gyi dpung pa'i rim bzhin dkar min dmar dang dkar ba rnams te g.yas pa'i dpung pa gsum// de bzhin yin te bcom ldan 'das kyis lag bzung gsum phyug gi mgo
124a8(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa gsum// sor mo rnams ni gser dang nyi ma sprin dang ljang gu' thebs sogs rim pa bzhin// de rnams rtse mo dbus dang rtsa ba rnams kyi tshigs ni sprin dang nyi ma thig le rnams// mi mgo skam po/
124b1(rgyud 'grel): lnga rnams kha dog lnga dang ldan pas nyid kyi dbu la brgyan// mgrin la mgul brgyan nyid dang sked la ska rags rna rgyan gyis ni rna ba la// lag pa dag la yid 'ong lag gdub rkang pa dag la rkang gdub mdzes pas
124b2(rgyud 'grel): spras// dbu la dar dbyangs sku la thugs kar mchod phyir thog pa rnams kyis brgyan// so so'i zhal rnams spyan gsum dang ldan nor bu rdo rje zla// dbu nyid la ste mi mgo brgya yis phreng ba mgo 'dzin la gnas//
124b3(rgyud 'grel): stag gi sham thabs dang ldan rdo rje ral gri rtse gsum gri gug/ mda' dang lcags kyu cang te zod pa 'khor lo dung rnams// dbyug pa dgra sta g.yas min rnams te dril bu phub chung kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa mda' gnas
124b4(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa rin chen// chu skyes dang ni dung dang mchog gi me long lcags sgrog rig byed gdong ldan mgo bo rnams kyi phyag nyid rnams la mtshan// phreM yig gri gug las byung bud med gzugs can sku mdog ser mo/
124b5(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo las gzhan bzhugs pas rab tu 'khyud pa// phyag rgya dang ldan kla yi phyag gis pad+ma sna tshogs yum gyi dbu la dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' cod pan la gnas// gri gug lcags kyu cang te
124b6(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba rnams ni rim pa bzhin du// thod pa zhags pa chu skyes rin chen rnams ni phyag gis 'dzin ma// gser dang zla ba dang ni sprin dang nyi ma rnams dang ldan pa'i// gang zhig zhal bzhi rnams na me yi spyan dang rab tu ldan ma//
124b7(rgyud 'grel): a yig rdo rje dag las byung ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' gang zhig ye shes rnam dag pa// sde dang nyi ma zla ba'i zhal gsum spyan dgu rdo rje 'dug stangs gnas pa'i mnga' bdag nyid// rdo rje sngon po gri gug dgra sta dril
124b8(rgyud 'grel): bu thod pa tshangs mgo rnams ni rim pa bzhin// phyag drug las yin ral pa dang ldan sku la rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma yis 'khyud// shes rab pha rol phyin mas 'khyud pa'i rnam par shes pa dag pa'i bdag nyid mi
125a1(rgyud 'grel): bskyod ljang // a dang rdo rje dag las byung ba'i mi bskyod rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam pa dang ni mtshungs// mi bskyod rnam pa dang mtshungs A dang gri gug las byung rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma//
125a2(rgyud 'grel): aHdang gri gug las byung shes rab pha rol phyin ma rdo rje sems ma'i rnam pa bzhin// dag pa'i lus la sna tshogs pa'i// yum gyis 'khyud pa 'gro ba'i yab// dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo gang // 'khor lo'i
125a3(rgyud 'grel): dbus gnas la phyag 'tshal// rin chen gtsug ma dang mtshungs pa'i// nag mo 'bar ma la sogs pa// brgyad rnams zhal bzhi phyag brgyad ma// mnga' bdag pad 'dab rnams la gnas// a yig rnams
125a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi gsang ba'i thod pa las byung dpal nyid nag mo 'bar ma mdun du gnas// na bza' nag mo sprin dang nyi ma gser dang ri bong can gyi zhal rnams rim bzhin// bdug spos dang ni tsan dan gur gum bla rtsig
125a5(rgyud 'grel): bur dang bcas pad+ma'i snod rnams dang // dril bu pad+ma lha shing me tog phreng ba gang las gang ba de nyid rnams la bstod// g.yas su a yig dang ni mar me dag las byung ba'i dmar po// 'bar ma nyi ma ser dang
125a6(rgyud 'grel): dkar dang nag po'i zhal dang ldan ma// phyag na mar me mu tig phreng bcod pan lag gdub rnams dang // gos dang ska rags rna rgyan rkang gdub rnams dang ldan la phyag 'tshal// g.yon du aM yig dang ni lha
125a7(rgyud 'grel): bshos las byung ba'i// dkar mo 'bar ma dkar nag dmar ser zhal dang ldan// 'o mchu dang sman dang tshad dang ro rnams dang bdud rtsi 'bras bu zan snod phyag ldan nyid la 'dud// chu bdag tu ni a yig dag las
125a8(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i ser mo 'bar ma// gser dang zla ba bung ba dang ni drod byed rnams dang ldan ma// dung dang gling bu dang ni nor bu cang te bi wang dang ni// rnga dang mchog gi mkhar rnga zangs dung phyag na bsnams la phyag 'tshal/
125b1(rgyud 'grel): ha hA haM ha/ rnams las byung ba'i ser dang dkar dang dmar dang bung ba'i kha dog ldan// rlung dang dbang ldan srin po me'i 'dab ma rnams la lha mo rnams te mar me ma// me khyer ma dang smig rgyum ste dpal gyi dub ma
125b2(rgyud 'grel): yis phyag rnams ma lus pas// rim bzhin rnga yab 'dzin ma rang rang mdog mtshungs snga ma las byung rnams phyag 'tshal lo// rtse mo can dang srin po dbang ldan rlung mtshams rnams la gnas pa// hUM yig las byung nor
125b3(rgyud 'grel): bu dang ni AHyig las byung gaN+DI// oM yig las byung chu spyod ho yig las byang dpag bsam shing rnams// byung ba'i zla ba nyi ma gser mchog 'od ldan rnams la phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas zhal gsum phyag drug pa//
125b4(rgyud 'grel): spyan dgu pad dkar nyi ma la// thams cad rdo rje'i 'dug stangs bzhugs// de rnams ral pa'i cod pan can// dbang po a yig ral gri dag las byung ba'i don yod grub pa// rlung dang 'du byed rang bzhin bung pa nyi ma
125b5(rgyud 'grel): dkar ba'i zhal ldan// ral gri dang ni gri gug rtse gsum phub chung zod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga rnams// bsnams pa'i dkar min spyan gsum ldan la phyag 'tshal// g.yas su ri yig rin chen las byung dpal ldan
125b6(rgyud 'grel): rin chen 'byung ldan// dmar po me dang tsher ba'i rang bzhin nyi ma zla ba bung ba'i// zhal ldan padag gi mi'i mnga' bdag mda' dang lcags kyu cang te'u/ gzhu dang rin chen zhags pa phyag na bsnams pa rnams la phyag
125b7(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal// g.yon du u yig pad+ma las byung 'od dpag med ni dkar po// chu dang 'du shes rang bzhin bdud rtsi 'od 'phro sprin dang nyi zhal// dpal ldan gos dkar mo yis spras pa tho ba mdung thung rtse gsum// chu
125b8(rgyud 'grel): skyes dkar po me long phreng ba rnams 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal// rgyab tu l-i yig 'khor lo dag las byung ba'i rnam snang ser po// sa dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin gser dang zla ba nag po'i zhal ldan// sgrol mas spras
126a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'khor lo dang ni dbyug pa rdo rje bsnams dang // dpal gyi dung dang lcags sgrog dril bu phyag na 'dzin la bstod// sangs rgyas rnams mtshungs btsun mo rnams// pad+ma mar dang zla ba la// thams
126a2(rgyud 'grel): cad pad+ma'i 'dug stangs bzhugs// kun la rin chen cod pan bsam// l-i yig 'khor lo dag las byung ba'i spyan mas khams rang bzhin// rnam par snang mdzad mtshungs dang don grub dang bcas rlung
126a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshams gnas dang // U yig pad+ma las byung bdag gi mA ste chu khams rang bzhin// 'od dpag med mtshungs rin 'byung dang bcas dbang ldan gnas la phyag 'tshal// haM yig las byung rgyal ba'i bum pa
126a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid dang ldan dpal ldan thugs kyi 'khor lo yi// shar gyi sgor khro bo'i gdan gyi byi ru ba dA nyid la dgod par bya ba ste/ de ltar hi yig las byung gti mug rdo rje'i g.yas su dgod de de bzhin rin chen sogs
126a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas dgod hI d+ha b+hU las byung bum pa de rnams la ni phyag 'tshal lo// b+h+rU~M b+h+rUM d+hI shri las byung bum pa spyan sogs g.yas su rim bzhin dgod do// ha yig las byung rnam rgyal bum pa sgo gzhan gnas la phyag 'tshal lo//
126a6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas ji bzhin rgyal sras rnams// 'on kyang rin chen cod pan ldan// lha mo de bzhin lha mo rnams// de ltar rim bzhin rab tu gnas// a yig rdo rje dag las byung ba'i dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje thugs khar
126a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje nyid/ sngon po bzung ba rna ba'i dbang po'i bdag nyid mnga' bdag mi bskyod pa dang mtshungs pa ste// ljang gu lho'i sgo'i g.yon gyi brtsig pa'i drung du de'i gdan dang mtshungs par bzhugs pa la// spyi bo sa la reg
126a8(rgyud 'grel): ste de'i zhabs la shin tu dga' bas rab tu phyag 'tshal lo// e yig ral gri dag las byung ba'i nam mkha'i snying po don grub dang mtshungs sna nyid kyi// dbang po'i rang bzhin dpal gyi rdo rje ma bcas shar sgo'i
126b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas na bzhugs pa la phyag 'tshal// ar yig rin chen las byung sa'i snying por rin chen dang mtshungs sku mdog dmar po nyid mig gi dbang po'i rang bzhin dpal ldan gzugs kyi rdo rje mar bcas lho sgo'i gnas
126b2(rgyud 'grel): dang / oM yig pad byung 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od dpag med mtshungs ro rdo rjer// bcas dang lce dbang rang bzhin byang sgo'i g.yas su gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// a la yig 'khor lo las byung sgrig pa rnam sel
126b3(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa'i gser dang mtshungs pa yi// lus kyi dbang po'i rang bzhin dpal ldan rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad dang mtshungs pa// gang gi pang na reg bya rdo rje ma dang bcas pa nub sgo'i g.yas phyogs na// rgyan du
126b4(rgyud 'grel): yang dag gnas pa de la rtag tu gus pas rab tu phyag 'tshal lo// oM yig rdo rje dag las byung ba'i kun tu bzang // skul chos kyi dbyings kyis rdo rje ma yis 'khyud// yid kyi rang bzhin dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpar
126b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs// shar sgo'i g.yon du gnas pa la phyag 'tshal// a yig dang ni rdo rje dag las byung ba'i sgra yi rdo rje ma ste sgra yi rang bzhin dang // dpal ldan phyag dang mtshungs shes rab pha rol phyin ma dang mtshungs
126b6(rgyud 'grel): byang sgo'i g.yon du gnas// A la yig dang ni 'khor lo dag las byung ba'i dri yi rdo rje ma ste dri'i rang bzhin dang // dpal ldan spyan ma dang mtshungs nam mkha'i snying po dang mtshungs rlung mtshams bzhugs la phyag
126b7(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// oM yig chu skyes dag las byung ba'i gzugs kyi rdo rje ma ste gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang // dpal ldan bdag gi ma mtshungs sa yi snying po dang bcas dpal ldan la gnas phyag 'tshal lo// ar
126b8(rgyud 'grel): yig dang ni rin chen las byung ba yi ro yi rdo rje ma ste ro yi rang bzhin dang // dpal ldan gos dkar mo mtshungs 'jig rten dbang po dang bcas bden bral la gnas phyag 'tshal lo// e yig dang ni ral gri dag las
127a1(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i reg bya rdo rje ma ste reg bya'i rang bzhin dang // sgrol ma dang mtshungs sgrib pa rnam par sel dang bcas pa me mtshams gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// A yig rdo rje las byung chos dbyings rdo rje ma
127a2(rgyud 'grel): ste rdo rje dbyings ma dang mtshungs ma// kun du bzang po dang ni bcas pa nub sgo'i g.yon la gnas pa la ni phyag 'tshal lo// khro rnams ral gcig ma la ser lag rkang bshad rang bzhin te// sangs rgyas sras rnams dang
127a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs pa// g.yas brkyang zhabs dang sbal gyis brgyan// yaM yig dang ni ral gri dag las byung ba'i bgegs kyi dgra nyid nam mkha'i snying po mtshungs / rengs byed ma ni mA rI tsi mtshungs spangs nas shar sgo'i dbus su chu skyes
127a4(rgyud 'grel): dkar po dang // nyi ma la gnas pa dang raM yig dbyug pa las byung shes rab mthar byed sa snying dang // mtshungs dang nga rgyal ma mtshungs btsun bcas lho phyogs la gnas dag la phyag 'tshal lo// byang sgor pad+ma zla ba la
127a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas waM yig chu skyes dag las byung ba'i pad+ma'i dgra// 'jig rten dbang phyug dang mtshungs ma ni khro gnyer can ma dang ni mtshungs pa dang // lam yig zo ba las byung gshin rje'i dgra nyid sgrib pa sel mtshungs shin tu
127a6(rgyud 'grel): brtson 'gras ma// rdo rje lcags sgrog dang ni mtshungs pa paM gnas nub phyogs la gnas zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje dung dang gzer bu dang // dpral 'bras cod pan na bza' dang // de ltar phyag mtshan rnams las byung //
127a7(rgyud 'grel): so so'i ming gis mchod byed pa// ka tsa Ta pa ta sa sde tshan thung ngu tshogs las byung ba yi// lha dang gshin rje la sogs g.yas kyi 'dod yon rnams dang steng dang 'og/ 'dir ni rim pa bzhin du glu ma dri ma spos ma gsol
127a8(rgyud 'grel): zas ma// lha mo sgeg mo gar ma ma lus phyag gnyis zla ba'i zhal dang ldan// pa Ta ha dang snod mar me// mu tig phreng dang phreng chu skyes// rim bzhin phyag mtshan las byung ba// lha mo thams cad sa bon mdog/ sAtA
127b1(rgyud 'grel): pA rA tsAkA'i sde tshan ring po brtsegs pa gyur las byung ba yi// chu sogs g.yon gyi 'dod yon rnams dang steng dang 'og rnams la// de ltar rim pa bzhin du sgra ma bzhad ma bdud rtsi ma rnams dang // mar me ma dang phreng ba
127b2(rgyud 'grel): mdang 'dod pa ma rnams la phyag 'tshal zhes pa ni thugs kyi 'khor lo la phyag btsal ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'i rim pa'o// lha mo tsartsi ka sogs sa ga'i rkang thabs dang // zhal gcig spyan gsum rig byed lag dang ldan pa yi/

127b4(rgyud 'grel): bcas gang yin pa// ro dang pad+ma dmar gnas la phyag 'tshal// tsartsi ka sogs pad+ma bsnams// rim pas chu tshod rtsa rang bzhin// mdun nas g.yas skor rim pa bzhin// pad+ma bsnams la rol pas bzhugs//
127b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs byed drag po mche ba gnyis gtsigs ma dang kha nas me 'bar ma dang rlung shugs rab gtum ma// gtum mig ma dang sna chen ma rnams klu yi pad 'dab rnams la tsartsi kA la phyogs nas gnas// brgyad rnams
127b6(rgyud 'grel): dpal gyi gtso mo dang mtshungs hri ya yi d+hi yig rnams dang gri gug las byung bsgom// yul+li yaM rnams dang ni gr-i gug las byung dpal gyi rnal 'byor rnams la 'dir ni phyag 'tshal lo// haHyig dbyug pa dag las byung
127b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phag mo dmar mo dang ni bde byed dkar po dang bcas nyi ma yi// pad+ma ma he'i steng gnas phyag na dbyug pa ral gri lcags sgrog phub chung rnams dang ldan pa// gshin rje la ni bzhugs pa'i zhabs gnyis dag la nges
127b8(rgyud 'grel): par phyag 'tshal lo// keng rus dus mtshan ma dang khro gdong dus kyi lce dang brtsigs ma// nag mo'i 'jigs ma gzugs ngan klu yi 'dab ma la gnas lha rnams// dpal gyi lha mo dang mtshungs hri ra r-i r-I hU~M ru r-I raM rnams dang //
128a1(rgyud 'grel): / dbyug pa las byung dpal ldan rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal// ha yig rtse gsum dag las byung ba'i drag mo nyid kyi phyag na rtse gsum cang te kha T+wAM ga dang lto 'gro dkar po// rim pa ji lta ba rnams
128a2(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje dang bcas byang du khyud mchog dang ni pad+ma dmar po la gnas pa la phyag 'tshal// gau ri dang ni geg ma dang rtag ma shin tu 'gyogs ma 'degs ma mtshan nyid ldan ma dang / ser skya ma dang nag mo rnams te de ltar brgyad
128a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams drag mo'i klu yi pad 'dabs la gnas rnams// dpal gyi drag mo dang ni mtshungs ma hu wa wi wAM hUM nyid rnams dang wu wAM waM rnams// rtse gsum dag las byung ba de rnams kun la rab tu dang ba'i sgo nas nges
128a4(rgyud 'grel): par byuga'atsha'o// dz+ham rnaMlas byung ba ma ga ster kyai ny-i dang mdzung // myod pa dang la brag la sa lam dang panas ga zugs byung ba 'bo dang /
128a5(rgyud 'grel): dmar po'i steng na gnas pa la ni rab tu phyag 'tshal// rdo rje 'od ma rdo rje lus ma gser mchog ldan ma rigs 'dzin ma dang sna tshogs ri mo ma// chu shing ma dang zug rngu sel ma shin tu sgrol ma rnams ni lag 'dzin par
128a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dab la// gnas pa brgyad rnams dpal gyi gtso mo dang mtshungs dz+wal l-I l-I trai lu l+li laM ma rnams dang ni// rdo rje dag las rab tu byung ba'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kun la 'dir ni dris par phyag 'tshal lo// k+Sha yig
128a7(rgyud 'grel): dung dag las byung tshangs ma zhal bzhi nyi ma'i spyan ldan kha dog ser po dung dang de byug pa spyi blugs thod pa rnams dang ldan pa// sprin gyi kha dog dang ni mtshungs pa'i 'phrog byed dang ni bcas pa rlung mtshams dang pa pad
128a8(rgyud 'grel): dkar steng na gnas pa la ni phyag 'tshal// nyi ma'i bu mo pad+ma'i mig mchu skyes ldan ma ngagog dbang phyug ma rnams dang // glu ma dang ni glog ma dran ma rnams ni rig byed zhal gyi bad 'dab la ni gnas pa rnams rim pa
128b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du b+h+r-i lA lI l-I kr-I lU l+lI la rnams dang dung dag las byung ba'i// tshangs ma dang ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kun la rab tu dang bas yang dag 'tshal lo// k+Sha dang pad+ma las byung bkra shis ma ni zla ba dang mtshungs pad phreng ka
128b2(rgyud 'grel): ma la dang 'i rin le'i chen nor bu phyag ldan ma// ro'i gdong can dang bcas dpal ldan phyogs na seng dkar sted na gnas pa'i zhabs kyi pad+ma la ni nges par phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan dkar mo zla ba'i ri mo can ri
128b3(rgyud 'grel): bong 'dzin zhal dang pa'i mdog ma 'dzin byed ma/ pad ma'i dbang phyug ma dang 'od zer can ma dri med zla 'dzin ma rnams dbang ldan mtshams nyid du// bkra shis ma yi pad 'dab rnams la rim bzhin g+hu wA lI l-I k+ShA l+lu
128b4(rgyud 'grel): wA rnams dang ni// pad ma dag las yang dag byung ba'i rnal 'byir ma rnams ca/ la thams cad dus su phyag 'tshal mo// dz+haiM yig gaN+DI las byung gzhon nu ma nyid nyi ma dang mtshungs// sha lcags kyi na
128b5(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa rnams ni phyag gi 'dzin ma// bden bral mtshams nas rma bya pad ma dkar po'i steng na gnas pa'i// tshogs kyi bad reg po dang ni bcas pa gang yin de la phyag 'tshal lo// pad+ma ma dang yan lag med ma gzhon
128b6(rgyud 'grel): nu ma dang seng ge 'gros ma rin chen 'phreng ba ma// mig mdzes ma dang kun ma bzang mo rnams ni gtso mo chu skyes gtsug phud can gyi 'gros ma yi// pad+ma'i 'dab ma la gnas rim pa bzhin du kr-I rA rin+ti k+Sha~M rU R+YA ra rnams
128b7(rgyud 'grel): dang ni// sha ga ti dag las byung ba'i lha mo de rnams dang ni bcas pa rnams la rgyun du phyag 'tshal lo// k+Shi yig 'khor lo dag las byung ba'i dpal ldan khyab 'jug ma nyid// zhal bzhi dang bcas pa yi gnaga'i pa'i sku
128b8(rgyud 'grel): mnga' 'khor lo dbyug pa// chu skyes dang ni dag pa'i dung rnams 'dzin pa'i phyag ldan me mtshams// pad mi dkar po dang ni bya byung la gnas de la phyag 'tshal// dpal mo sgyu 'phrul ma dang grags ma bkra shis ma dang shin tu
129a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ma dpal rgyal rnams dang // rab tu rgyal ma dpal ldan 'khor lo can ma dag ni khyab 'jug ma yi pad 'dab la// gnas pa rnams ni rim pa bzhin du k+ShI yA yi l-Ik+ShI yuy+m+R+YuM yaHma lus pa

129a3(rgyud 'grel): so so'i phyag mtshan rnams las byung ba'i 'dod ma lnga rnams phyag gnyis ri bong zhal// shar sgo la sogs kyi g.yas kyi 'dod yon rnams la sa bon rang bzhin tsa TA pa ta yi// sde tshan rnams las de ltar rab
129a4(rgyud 'grel): tu byung ba de rnams lnga lnga so so'i phyogs la gnas pa dang // shar sgo'i g.yon gyi 'dod yon la// sa sde las byung ha sde las// byung ba byang g.yon de las gzhan// k+Shi yig las byung rnams la 'dud// ces pa

129a8(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang bcas shar ske'i g.yon du bya khyud pad+ma dmar po'i steng gnas rkang yig dang // 'khor lo las byung ba yi khyab 'jug ljang gu'i lus la dpal mo gnod sbyin dang ni mtshungs pas 'khyud// 'khor lo dang ni

129b5(rgyud 'grel): blugs dus kyi phyag na bsnams pa drag mos 'khyud pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// ma mi mAM mu mA~M maM/ b+ha b+hi g+h+ra~M b+hu b+h+r-i b+haM/ ba bi bAM bu thai baM/ pa phi phreM pu p+l-i paM/ ba pi p+l-i bu p+l-i baM/ rnams dang zhags pa las byung pad gnas
