155b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams las rdzogs pa'i tshon m+b+hi byi brag/ pa dog lha rnams rim pa bzhin du/ oM AHn+da nA~MH/ rnams las rdzogs pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du bsgoms la nam mkha' laganas pa'i
155b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas oM yig la sogs pa las yongs su rdzogs pa'i ye shes kyi tshogs rnams skud pa sbyangs pa'i dus ltar bkug ste gzhug go// de nas bcas pa ro gcig tu gyur pa ye
155b4(rgyud 'grel): shes kyi tshe na de rnams la oM yig la sogs pa'i sngags brjod nas yang oM badz+ra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM zhes pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// de ltar 'bar ba'i lha stangs kyi so so la hiHyig bkod de yang dag par
155b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyar ro// yang oM raM dze ba hu la yen satwe na? satwe bud+d+he shru b+ha ga wAn+taHsatwa rA gA nu rak+ta ste nas t+ye na sa ra dze dz+wa la tu/ zhes pa'i bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis sbar bar bya'o// de nyid lha'i rnal 'byor gyi dka' thub kyi
155b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bar bar 'gyur ro// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba'i phur bu hUM zhes pa'i sngags brjod cing gdon par bya zhing rang gi lag pa'i rdo rje la blos thim par bsam mo// khung bu tshon snga yis dgang bar byas pa dang / dril bu
155b7(rgyud 'grel): dkrol zhing rdo rje'i glu blangs te mtshan ma ngan pa bcos nas/ 'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste/ sems can khams rnams rab tu sgrol// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po khyod// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// nyes pa
155b8(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rnam por grol// 'khor lo'i dbus su yang dag gnas// de ltar chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag par bsgoms nas/ dang por dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bsdad la lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje 'chang bas byas la
156a1(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra rags ma ya hUM zhes pa'am/ yi ge drug pa brjod cing byang shar mtshams nas brtsams te shar du kha phyogs pas rab gsum bri bar bya'o// de yang / sbom pos nang byed pa dang re kha
156a2(rgyud 'grel): ngan dang phra bas rdzas rnams bri bar rab tu gsal bar 'gyur// chad pas 'chi ba dang ni 'khyog pos mi yi bdag po skye bor bcas pa bskyod de de bzhin du// mtshan ma dang ni nyi ma zla ba chad na 'jig 'joms sngags
156a3(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams la dngos grub yod pa min// rdul tshon rnam par 'dres pas rigs dag 'chad de rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du ni rig par bya// zhes pa'i don ni bdag nyid kyis te gzhan gyis kyang de ltar bri bar bya'o// 'dir
156a4(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo'i zhal gyi dbye bas phyogs kyi rnam par dbye ba la tshon gyi kha dog bye brag ste/ de ltar thugs kyi 'khor lo'i nang gi rdo rje phreng ba gnyis pa'i bar nag po'o// thugs dang gsung dang sku rnams kyi sa gzhi nag
156a5(rgyud 'grel): po'o// lho rnams dmar po'o// byang rnams dkar po'o// nub rnams ser po'o// 'dod yon rnams dkar po'o// rin chen pha gu rnams dmar po'o// dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang ba ku li dang kra ma shir/
156a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams dkar po ste gzhi nag po'o// rta babs kyi ka ba rnams ser po'o// las thams cad pa la gtso bo'i pad+ma ljang gu'o// zhi ba la sogs pa la dkar po la sogs pa'i kha dog tu 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i phreng ba nag
156a7(rgyud 'grel): po'o// ka ba rnams ni shar du ral gri nag po rnams so// lhor rin po che dmar po rnams so// byang du pad+ma dkar po rnams so// nub tu 'khor lo ser po rnams so// pad+ma la gnas pa'i bum pa brgyad po dkar po
156a8(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i 'dab ma la kha phyogs pa'o// pad+ma thams cad kyi lte ba sum cha ba'o// rdo rje phreng ba gnyis pa ljang gu'o// lha'i snam bu rnams dkar po'o// rab gsum ni dkar po dang dmar po dang nag po rnams so//
156b1(rgyud 'grel): rab de rnams kyi sa'i cha dgu las cha re re dor ti cha gnyis gnyis la ra ba'o// sgo khyud rnams su rin po che rdo rjes spras pa'o// rta babs rnams kha dog sna tshogs pa'o// gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi snam
156b2(rgyud 'grel): bu dkar po'o// de nyid laM pad+ma brgyad pa ni nyi ma dang zla ba dang bral ba'i phyogs rnams dmar po'o// mtshams rnams dkar ba'o// rab lnga ni nang nas rim gyis ljang gu dang / nag po dang dmar po dang dkar po dang
156b3(rgyud 'grel): ser po rnams so// sku'i dkyil 'khor ni gsung dang mtshungs pa las rta babs kyi ka ba'i 'og rtsig pa'i rtsar gdengs ka rnams kyi gdan te so so la cha bcu gnyis pa'o// de yang shar phyogs su rlung gi dkyil 'khor
156b4(rgyud 'grel): nag po zlum po ste rgyal mtshan gyis mtshan po dag go// lho phyogs su gru gsum g.yu drung ris kyis mtshan pa dag go/ nub phyogs su gru bzhi rdo rjes mtshan pa dag go/ byang phyogs su tha byed rnam pa pad+mas mtshan
156b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dag go/ shar phyogs kyi g.yas kyi zlum po'i g.yas su bdud rtsi'i bum pa klu'i rgyal po rgyal ba'o// nub phyogs kyi g.yon gyis gru bzhi'i g.yon du bdud rtsi bub pa rnam par rgyal ba'o// shar phyogs kyi rta babs
156b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi rtsegs dang po'i gnas dbu ma la chos kyi 'khor lo dag dang g.yas dang g.yon du ri dgas po dang mo rnams nag po'o// lho phyogs su bum pa bzang po dang g.yas dang g.yon du dung dang pad+ma rnams dmar po'o// nub
156b7(rgyud 'grel): dubyang chub kyi shing dang g.yas dang g.yon du mi 'am ci dang me 'am ci mo rnams ser po'o// byang du ngu ngu bi dang g.yas dang g.yon du dbyug pa dang thob dkar po'o// pad+ma'i 'dab ma kha dog lnga ste de nyid la mchod pa'i rdzas rnams
156b8(rgyud 'grel): dgod do// sa'i dkyil 'khor ser po'o// de'i dbang ldan mtshams su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang ba cha bcu gnyis pa'o// bden bral mtshams su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nub bzhin pa'o// chu'i dkyil 'khor dkar pol
157a1(rgyud 'grel): me'i dkyil 'khor dmar po'o// rlung gi dkyil 'khor nag po'o// de dag gi dbus su cha nyi shu rtsa bzhis la 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'i dur khrod bri bar bya'o// de rnams kyi phyogs rnams
157a2(rgyud 'grel): dmar po mtshams rnams dkar po'o// shar dang nub kyi 'khor lo'i phyi rol du stong pa'i dkyil 'khor dag go/ de yang de dag ni sgrub thabs kyi le'ur gsungs pa ltar ro// 'khor lo bcu la mtshan mo gr-i gug bri bar
157a3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// rlung gi dkyil 'khor la mtshan ma sna tshogs dgod par bya'o// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor gyi kha dog sngon po'o// de nyid kyis phyogs gnyis su cha gsum gsum tsam bskor bar bya'o// dbus kyi cha drug la rdo rje'i
157a4(rgyud 'grel): raba'o// me ra'i phreng ba kha dog lnga'o// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi shar gyi rdul chen nag po'i dpangs la nas kyi rkang pa gcig go/ lho phyogs kyi dmar ba la rkang pa gnyis so// nub phyogs kyi ser po la bzhi'o//
157a5(rgyud 'grel): byung phyogs kyi dkar po la gsum pa// rtog pa'i cha na rnams ni ser pa'i sra ba 'gyur du bya ba sne rdo rje'i bul ya nga // de la gzhan rnamasani tshen mer po zhes 'gyur ro// pad+mA rna mas ni snyam bu rnams kyi zhes 'gyur
157a6(rgyud 'grel): ro// zla ba dang nyi ma rnams ni pad+ma rnams kyi nyis 'gyur ro// de ltar gsungs pa rnams kyi nyos 'gyur gsung gi dkyil 'khor la// de nyid kyis nyes 'gyur skya'i dkyil 'khor le ste/ kra me shir ba'i phyi rol mchod
157a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sa gzhi la gnas gcig gi/ sa'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa rnams rdo rje'i ra ba dang me ri rnams kyi dpangs sku'i rtsig pa'i tshad kyis so// sa gzhi gzhan rnams la tshon sum 'gyur ro// de ltar gtso bo'i pad+ma'i lte
157a8(rgyud 'grel): bar lte ba dang mnyam pa'i steng du dkar po dang dmar po dang nag po dang / dmar po'i zla ba dang nyi ma dang sgra gcan dang dus me rnams la rdo rje sngon po rtse mo gsum pa bcom ldan 'das dum kyi 'khor lo'o// shar gyi 'dab ma
157b1(rgyud 'grel): la spos snod nag po'o// lho phyogs su mar me dmar po'o// nub phyogs su dung ser po'o// byang phyogs su lha bshos dkar po'o// me mtshams la sogs par rnga yab nag po dang dmar po dang ser po dang dkar po rnams
157b2(rgyud 'grel): so// de'i phyi rol gyi dbang ldan du chos kyi dung dkar po'o// me ru yid bzhin gyi nor bu nag po'o// bden bral du chos kyi gaN+DI dmar po'o// rlung du dpag bsam gyi shing ser po'o// 'phar ma gnyis pa'i shar phyogs kyi
157b3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dkar po dang nyi ma dmar po'i steng du ral gri nag po'o// me'i mtshams su pad+ma dmar po dang zla ba'i steng du ut+pa la sngon po'o// lho phyogs su rin po che cha dgu pa dmar po'o// bden bral du pad+ma dmar po'o// nub
157b4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su 'khor lo ser po'o// rlung du 'khor lo ser po'o// byang du pad+ma dkar po'i// dbang ldan du ut+pal dkar po'o// 'phar ma gsum pa'i sgo so so'i logs rnams la pad+ma brgyad de// de rnams la drug la nyaM
157b5(rgyud 'grel): ma'o// nub dang byang gi g.yon phyogs la zla ba'o// zur rnams kyis pad+ma la zla ba bzhi'o// de rnams kyi dbang ldan nas brtsams te me long dang rdo rje dang / ral gri dang gos dang rdo rje dang rin po che dang / bdud rtsi'i
157b6(rgyud 'grel): snod dang tshes 'byung dang // 'khor lo dang dril bu dang pi wang dang pad+ma rnams dkar po dang nag po dang ljang gu dang dmar po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang / ser po dang ser po dang sngon po dang dkar po rnams so// shar
157b7(rgyud 'grel): gyi sgo la pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du ral gri nag po'i// lho phyogs su dbyug pa dmar po'o// nub phyogs su pad+ma ser po'o// byang phyogs su tho ba dkar po'o// 'di rnams las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnams
157b8(rgyud 'grel): kyi pad+ma dkar po rnams dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyi pad+ma dmar po rnams so// shar phyogs kyi 'dod yon gyi rta babs kaM ba'i 'og gi g.yon du dung nag po'o// g.yas su me tog gi phreng ba sngon po'o//
158a1(rgyud 'grel): lho phyogs su spros snod dang mar me dmar po'o// nub phyogs su cod pan dang ma tig gi phreng ba ser po'o// byang phyogs su 'bras bu dang bdud rtsis gang ba'i snod dkar po'o// de ltar 'dod yon
158a2(rgyud 'grel): snam bu kun la glu ma la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo rnams so// shar gyi rta babs kyi mchod pa'i gnas kyi dbus su gos so// lho phyogs su pad+ma'o// nub phyogs su pa Ta ha'o// byang phyogasu rdo rje'o// gsung gi
158a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi shar gyi pad+ma'i lte ba dang 'dab ma rnams la gri gug nag po rnams so// me mtshams su 'khor lo nag po rnams so// lho phyogs su dbyug pa dmar po rnams so// bden bral du mdung thung dmar po
158a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams so// nub phyogs su rdo rje ser pa'o// rlung du tshangs pa'i dbyug pa ser po rnams so// byang phyogs su rtse gsum pa dkar po rnams so// dbang ldan du pad+ma dkar po rnams so// sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi pad+ma'i lte ba dang
158a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dab ma rnams kyi mtshan ma rnams la/ shar sgo'i g.yas su ral gri rnams so// me mtshams su dpag bsam gyi shing rnams so// lho'i sgo'i g.yon du rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa rnams so// g.yas su mdung thung
158a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams so// bden bral du mdung rnams so// nub sgo'i g.yon du rin po che'am dbyug pa rnams so// g.yas su rdo rje rnams so// rlung du khab rnams so// byang gi sgo'i g.yon du rtse gsum rnams so// g.yas su zhugs
158a7(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams so// dbang ldan du dgra sta rnams so// shar sgo'i g.yon du 'khor lo rnams so// shar gyi sgo ru dbyug pa'o// de'i phyi rol tu rdo rje ljang gu'o// lho'i sgo ru mda' dmar po'o// nub kyi sgo ru dbyug to'o// de'i phyi rol
158a8(rgyud 'grel): du rtse gsum sngon po'o// byang gi sgo ru gtun shing dkar po'o// de ltar dbyug pa la sogs pa rnams pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o// gsung deng sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs kyi pad+ma rnams dmar po'o// mtshams kyi pad+ma
158b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams dkar po'o// 'dir gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgo'i 'dod yon gyi snam bu'i g.yas su ut+pal dang gos dang gri gug dang / 'khor lo dang kha T+wAM ga rnams nag po'o// g.yon du gri gug dang ral gri dang gri gug
158b2(rgyud 'grel): dang yang gri gug rnams nag pa'o// lho'i sgo'i g.yas su pad+ma dang bdud rtsi'i snod dang / dbyug pa dang mdung thung dang pad+ma rnams dmar po'o// g.yon du mda' dang dgra sta dang / gri gug dang yang gi gug rnams dmar po'o//
158b3(rgyud 'grel): nub sgo'i g.yas su 'khor lo dri'i dung dang rdo rje dang khab dang 'khor lo rnams ser po'o// g.yon du phub dang chos 'byung dang 'khor lo dang gri gug rnams ser po'o// byang sgo'i g.yas su ut+pa la dang me lang dang rtsa gsum dang
158b4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang ut+pal rnams dkar po'o// g.yon du bi ni sngon po dang thob dang gri gug dang yang gri gug rnams dkar po'o// de ltar mtshan ma sum cu rtsa drug sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'dod yon la yang go bar bya'o// de nas hUM yig dang
158b5(rgyud 'grel): yi ge drug pa bzlas shing bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa dri'i chus dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol byugs nas de nyid zlas shing chus dkyil 'khor la bsang gtor bya'o// de nas tshon rnams kyi lhag ma'i ye shes pa oM AHhU~M badz+ra muH
158b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod de gshegs su gsol ba dang / 'du 'dzi med pa'i sa ru gzhag par bya'o// 'di ni tshen dgye ba'i cho ga'i rim pa'o// / de nas sngon du lhag par gnas par byas pa'i bum pa rnams dkyil 'khor gyi shar la
158b7(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su bzhi bzhag go/ yang nub tu rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa lnga'o// shar du rgyal ba'i bum pa drug pa'o// de'i steng du rnam par rgyal ba chen po'i bum pa'i dung ngo zhes pa ni bum pa drug gi
158b8(rgyud 'grel): phyogs so// bum pa bcu'i phyogs ltar na phyogs mtshams brgyad du brgyad dang nub kyi bum pa'i phyi rol du sor gnyis kyi ma rig par rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'o// shar gyi bum pa'i phyi rol du sor gnyis kyi ma rig par
159a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba'i bum pa'o// de'i steng du rnam par rgyal ba chen po'i dung bcu gcig pa'o// de yang zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang las thams cad pa la dung ngo // gdug pa'i las thams cad la thod pa'o// dbang dang dgug pa
159a2(rgyud 'grel): lazangs dang gser ro// rangs pa dang rmongs pa la kham par ro// de nas las dang mtshungs pa'i gos dang skud pas mgrin par dkri bar bya ste/ gzhag pa 'di ni bum pa dgram pa'i cho ga'o// de nas mtshams bzhi ru pha rol tu phyin
159a3(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs pa bzhi pa klag par bya'o// ga pur dang tu ru ka dang a ka ru la sogs pa'i spos sna tshogs phyogs mtshams brgyad du bzhag go/ sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan la sogs pa la gtso bo'i sngags dang / oM
159a4(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra s+pharA Na ba zhes pa'i sngags brjod de/ rim pa bzhin gnas su dgram mo// dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa'i sgo rnams su rta babs la sna tshogs pa'i gos dang dril bu dang rnga yab rnams kyis brgyan pa'o// lo ma dang bcas pa'i
159a5(rgyud 'grel): chu shing gi ka ba dang gang ba'i bum pa kha brgyan dang bcas pa yang bzhag go/ de nas slob dpon shar phyogs su bsdad la sgrub thabs su gsungs pa'i sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa dang srung ba'i 'khor lo dang / dkyil
159a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rgyal mchog dang / las rgyal mchog dang / thig le'i rnal 'byor dang / bra ma'i rnal 'byor rnams kyi tshig byas la/ bcu drug le nyid lon pa yi// btsun mo shin tu rab tu mdzes// dri dang me tog dang ldan ma// de nyid
159a7(rgyud 'grel): legs par bslabs pa dang // de'i dbus su 'dod pa bya// yon tan rgya mtsho sna tshogs yum// sangs rgyas tshogs rnams spros pa dang // nam mkha'i khams su legs par brgyan// zhes pa rab tu gsungs pas phyi'i
159a8(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya la snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/ de ltar ma yin na ye shes kyi phyag rgya la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / sbyor ba'i sgras spyan drangs pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo dzaHhuM baM hoHzhes pa'i sngags kyis dgug pa dang gzhug pa
159b1(rgyud 'grel): dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba rnams byas la zhabs bsil dang yon tshwa ba la sogs pa sngon du song bas bdag nyid la gzhug par byas pa dang / chags pa chen pos zhu nas rdo rje'i lam nas byung ste lha mo'i pad+mar
159b2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyi 'khor lo spro bar bya'o// rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bsgoms te gnas kyi rim pas de rnams spro bar bya'o// de nas snying ga'i sa bon las mchod pa'i lha mo rnams spros la phyi dang
159b3(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod par bya'o// mchod pa de'i rim pa ni/ oM AHhUM ho/ tre d+hA tu ke shwa rak+Sha la tsakra ar+g+haM pra tits+tsha sa pa ri wA rA tAM b+ha ga wAM me war do b+ha wa shi Sh+yaSh+Ta zhes gsol ba btab pa la yan chab kyi maN+Da la rdul
159b4(rgyud 'grel): chen gyi phyi rol dang / maN+Dal gzhan rnam rgyal gyi bum pa'i sngon du byas la bsngags rnams kyi dang por oM dang tha mar na maHdang ldan pa'i sngags brjod cing me tog la sogs pas mchod pa ni/ bud+d+hA ya/ d+harmA ya/ saM g+ha ya/
159b5(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra satwA ya/ pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA yaM/ swa b+hA be ka kA yA ya/ d+har+m+ma ka yA ya/ saM b+ho ga kA yA ya/ nir+m+ma Na kA yA ya/ dz+nyA na badz+rA ya/ tsit+ta badz+rA ya/ bA ga badz+rA ya/ kA la badz+rA ya/ tsa tu rbi mo k+She b+h+yAM/ tsa tur+b+bat+sa b+h+r-its+tsha re b+h+yo/ sap+taH
159b6(rgyud 'grel): shrang+go d+hi pik+Shi ka d+hAr+m+ma b+h+yoHtsa tu rgI ti sA ha sra d+har+m+ma skan+ne b+h+yo/ sarba d+har+m+ma de sha ka b+h+yo/ rad+na tra yA ya/ shAkya mu nA ye/ kA la tsi kra ya/ dA na pA ra mi tA yaM/ shI la pA ra mi tI yai/ k+Shan+ti pA ra mi tA yai/ bIr+yA pA ra mi tA yai/ d+h+waM bA
159b7(rgyud 'grel): ra mi tA ye/ prad+d+ha bI ra mi tA yaM/ U pa yA'i pA ra mi twA yaM/ 'apra Ni d+hA na pA ra mi tA yaM/ ba la pA ra mi tA yaM/ dz+nyA na pA ra mai tI yaM/ dza ya g+he Te b+h+yo/ bi dza ya g+ha Ta b+h+yo/ sarbA tsiSh+To b+h+yo/ sarba mu dr-I b+h+r-i/ tsin+ta maN+Du yau/
159b8(rgyud 'grel): d+hAR+YA g+har+d+he/ d+har+m+ma shaM kha ya/ kalpa prek+Sha ya/ ak+Sho b+h+ya ya/ a mo g+ha sid+d+ha ye/ rat+na saM b+ha bA ya/ a mi tA b+hA ya/ bai ro tsa nA ye/ lo tsan+yaM/ mA ma kyaM/ paN+Da rA yaM/ tA rA yaM/ badz+ra d+hitrI shwa r+yaM/ badz+ra pA Na yi/ kha gan+d+ha yak+Shi ti gar+b+hA
160a1(rgyud 'grel): ya/ lo ke shwa ra ya/ sarba ni bA ra Na b+hi s+thAm+b+hi ni/ sa man+ta b+hUdrA ya/ gan+d+ha badz+rA yaM/ rU ba badz+ra yAM/ ras badz+rA yai/ s+phar sha badz+ra yaM/ shAp+ta badz+ra yaM/ d+har+m+ma d+hA tu badz+ra yai/ uSh+NI Sh+Ta ya/ big+h+nAn+ta kA ya/ pradz+nyAn ta kA
160a2(rgyud 'grel): ya/ bad+d+hAn+ta kA ya/ ya mAn+ta ka ya/ swA bid+d+haM/ ma nI r+g+haM// ad+hi b+h+r-i d+hA ye/ a ti nI lA ya~M sarba b+ha ra t+na b+h+rU~M/ kha T+wA~M g+hA yi/ zhes bya ba ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khar pa la mchod pa'i tshi ga'o// 2// badz+ra N+yai k+Sha /
160a3(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra ma nyi shAr+ya/ badz+rAn+te/ badz+ra brah+ma NAM/ badz+ra ma hA la kyai/ badz+ra ka mAr+ya/ badz+re beSh+Ta byaM/ aSh+TaSh+Ta ken tsak+ShuShiSh+TaM badz+ra yi gni b+h+yoHShaDadzaM sha da~Mts+tsha b+h+rUM/ zhes bya ba 'di ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa'i cho ga'o//
160a4(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra br-iSh+Ta bi/ badz+ra nai rai drA ya/ badz+rI g+hA yaM/ badz+re d+hA yai/ badz+ren+d+rA ya/ badz+re shwa rA yaM/ badz+ra brah+ma Ne/ badz+ra bai nA ya kA ya/ badz+ra kArti kI yA ya/ badz+ra pA ya be/ badz+ra yA mA ya/ badz+ra yak+She b+h+yo/ ba ru N+yaM/ bA ya byaM/ yA mi n+ye/
160a5(rgyud 'grel): yak+ShIts+tsha/ mang+ga b+hA lA ya/ a tsal+yAH/ rbakrI rA drA yaM/ nI la dAr+b+hU ya/ sam+b+ha rA dz+nyA ya/ ro d+h+r-ik+ShaM yaM/ badz+ra sh+le khalpA yA/ tsAn+da ya/ b+h+r-ik+ShaH/ ma r-in+ta/ prat+taM kam+b+ha sa b+he naSh+NA Sha d+hA ra tAM sha ta badz+rA ti brI daMd+b+haH/ Sh+kaM shad+b+hatAM
160a6(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra dza~M s+phA ya/ badz+ra karbA T+TakA ya/ bad+d+ha b+hA s+'u/ ya~M/ badz+nyAnA ya~M/ bA ta~Mk+Shak+Sha ya/ badz+rA mAhA bad+hA rA/ bidz+ra kA lA~Mk+Sha yai/ badz+rA nA~Mkha pA lA ya/ badz+ra pa d+hA yai/ badz+ra badz+ra yA ya/ zhes bya ba ni sgra'i dkyil 'khor la mchod pa
160a7(rgyud 'grel): shAn+ta s+yA yaM/ su k+Sha ra s+yA ya/ byAg+h+ra s+yA ye/ dza pu ka srA yaM/ ga run+da srA yai/ ul+yA ka s+yA yai/ gr-i d+ha s+yA yaM/ kA kA s+yA yaM/ sarba b+hu te b+h+yo/ zhes bya ba 'di ni dur khrod brgyad rnams la mchod pa'o// badz+ra tsan+d+ra ya/ badz+ra sU r+YA ya/
160a8(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra mig lA ya/ badz+ra bu d+ha ya/ bidz+ri br-i ha swa ta ya/ badz+ra shu thA ya/ badz+ra sa ne sh+tsa rA ya/ badz+ra ki ta be/ badz+ra rA ha baM/ badz+ra kA lAg+na ye badz+ra d+hU be/ badz+rA gastA ya/ sarba nak+Sha/ tre b+h+yo/ dAd sha rA saM b+h+yo/ bai Sho Da sha kA lI b+h+ya/
160b1(rgyud 'grel): sha dikA le b+h+yo/ nan+di ke shwa rA ya/ badz+ra ma hA kA lA ya/ badz+ra gaN+Da kar+N+Na ya/ badz+ra b+h+r-i gi ni/ sarba k+She Ta ba la b+h+yo/ sarba dA ti b+h+yo/ hA rI t+yai sarba sid+d+hi b+ho/ d+har+m+ma tsakra ya/ b+ha dra ga TA ya/ badz+ra dun+na b+hi/ bo d+hi bik+Sha ya/ gu ru bud+d+ha bo d+hi
160b2(rgyud 'grel): satwe b+h+yo na mo na maHzhes bya'o// de ltar mchod pa'i dril bu dkrol zhing bstod pa bye'o// shes rab kyi me tog dang bcas po'i rang gi byang chub kyi sema'i sa pad+ma'i snod du brug la bdud rtsi ru byas pa myang bar bya ste/ 'khor lo
160b3(rgyud 'grel): bde bo chen po'i rang bzhin du byas la gtso bo'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// 'khor rnams kyi sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig dang yi ge brgyad pa bzlas so// gsung bar 'gyur ba'i tsho gas 'byung po thams cad la
160b4(rgyud 'grel): gtor mu sbyin pa ni/ phyogs rnams na gnas pa'i sgrub pa pos grogs mchod dkyil 'khor srung du bcug la phyi rol du song la khro bo la sogs pa la gtor ma sbyin no// de nas cho ga lhag chad la sogs pa'i skyon zhi bar
160b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i phyir gsung bar 'gyur ba'i tshogs zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i sbyin bsreg slob mas byas te/ med par gyur na rang nyid kyis so// rdo rje shugs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas me tog gi phreng ba'i sngags dang rkang pa bcu
160b6(rgyud 'grel): drug pa bzlas shing rdo rje gsor dril bu dkrol zhing shar sgo'i slob dpon dang stabs gcig tu lan gsum du bskor ba bya'o// dkyil 'khor la bltas te gtso bo la me tog gi phreng ba phul la oM badz+ra ung+ku Ta ya sa ma yi
160b7(rgyud 'grel): pra be sha ya hUM zhes pa'i sngags kyi sgo bzhi phye bar bsams la/ oM sa ma ya pra be shwa ya mi zhes pa brjod de slar yang me tog gi phreng ba gar bya zhing blangs nas rang gi mgo la bzhag go/ 'khor lo la phyag byas te sems/
160b8(rgyud 'grel): can la dngos grub thams cad kyi bka' drin byin cig pas gsol ba gdab pa ste/ 'di ni dkyil 'khor rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor la mchod pa byas la de'i phyi rol tu legs par brtag/
161a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i nga rgyal la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i dge ba snyen la sogs pa bslab pa la gnas pa/ thos pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu song ba theg pa chen po'i sdom pa la mos pa rigs dang yon tan
161a2(rgyud 'grel): med pa dang gzugs ngan pa'i slob ma rnams kyang gzung bar bya'o// gal te 'di nyid mchog tu dad pa dang ldan pa rdo rje sems dpa'i sdom pa la lhag par mos pa rdo rje theg pa la slob dpon gzhan la mi phyogs pa ste/ de yang
161a3(rgyud 'grel): byed dang bcas pa'i sum brgya las gsungs pa/ so so'i bslab pa la gnas pa'i// theg pa che la lhag par mos// 'khor rnams bzhi po ma lus pa// gzugs ngan yon tan med pa dang // dman par gyur kyang
161a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi// tsho gas rjes bzung lhag gnas bya// zhes pas so// de ltar slob ma cig gam gnyis sam mang por gyur pa rnams maN+Dal byas pa dang pus mo gnyis sa la btsugs la me tog snyim par bzung ste/
161a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten 'di la bde don dang // 'jig rten pha rol pa de don te// 'on kyang sangs rgyas thob don du// blo dang ldan pa 'jug par bya// zhes pa'i don go bar byas la rang gi kha nas gzhug cing rdo rje'i lam nas shes rab kyi pad+ma
161a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa la rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las spros pas shes rab dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams zhal nas zhugs to// byang chub sems su zhu nas dbang bskur bar bsams la/ de dkyil 'khor gyi shar skor
161a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas pas 'jug pa'i gsol ba gdab pa ni/ skye dang rga dang 'chi ba dang / chu srin la sogs 'jigs pa yi// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las 'don khyod// nga la ston pa mgon po che// bde ba chen pos bdag 'tshal
161a8(rgyud 'grel): bas// byang chub chen po'i lam bstan pa// dam tshig de ni bdag la gsol// byang chub sems kyang bdag la byin// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// skyabs gsum rnams kyang bdag la gsol// thar pa
161b1(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon po bdag ni bzhugs su gsol zhes brjod la/ de nas slob ma cig gtso bor byas te/ bu tshur theg pa chen po yi// lam chen la ni chas pa po// sngags kyi spyod pa cho ga'i lam//
161b2(rgyud 'grel): khyod la yang dag bshad par bya// dus gsum la gnas sangs rgyas rnams// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// sngags kyi nus pa 'di nyid kyis// mnyam pa med pa'i ye shes thob// sngags kyi sbyor ba mnyam med pas//
161b3(rgyud 'grel): shAkya seng ge la sogs kyis// bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa// stobs chen dag kyang de yis bcom// 'jig rten pa rnams bsgral ba'i phyir// 'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das// thams cad mkhyen pa thob bya'i phyir// blo
161b4(rgyud 'grel): gros ldan pas de ltar mdzod// zhes pa'i don go bar bya'o// dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi// sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags// 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang // sangs rgyas byang chub sems bskyed
161b5(rgyud 'grel): do// zhes lan gsum brjod// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid snying po byang chub ma thob kyi bar du// ji ltar dus
161b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum mgon po rnams// byang chub la ni nges mdzad ltar// byang chub sems ni bla med pa// dam pa mchog ni skyed par bgyid// tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang // dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang / sems can don byed/
161b7(rgyud 'grel): tshul khrims gsum// bdag gis bstan par bzung bar bgyi// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun rnams// bla no med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// sangs rgyas sdom pa las byung ba// dus 'di nas ni gzung bar bgyi//
161b8(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa dang / rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya bla ma rnams te 'dod pa'i rdo rje rnams ni spyi bor gzung bar bgyi// rin chen rigs su 'dir ni sbyin pa sbyin bya 'khor lor rgyal ba mchog gi dam tshig bskyang bar bya// ral gri'i rigs su mchod
162a1(rgyud 'grel): pa bya ste gsal bar chu skyes rigs su sdom pa yang dag bskyang bar bya// sems can rnams kyis thar pa'i rgyu ru rgyal ba skyed byed rigs su byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi zhes pa dang / ma bsgral ba
162a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams bsgral ba dang / ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar bgyi/ dbugs ma phyin po dbyugs dbyung zhing sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod// ces pa yang brjod par bya'o// de nas yi ge drug gis bsrungs la// de'i snying
162a3(rgyud 'grel): ga dang mgrin pa dang dpral ba rnams la sgra gcan dang / nyi ma dang zla ba rnams la gnas pa nag po dang / dmar po dang dkar po'i huM dang aHdang oM rnams rnam par bsam par bya'o// de rnams brjod cing snying ga dang mgrin
162a4(rgyud 'grel): padang dpral ba rnams la dri chu dang / me tog dang bcas pa'i rdo rjes rig la me tog dang bdug spos dang dri dang mar me dang lnga bshos rnams dbul lo// de nas u dum+bar la sogs pa'i so shing sar bcu gnyis pa/ sreg
162a5(rgyud 'grel): chags med pa 'khyog pa ma yin pa/ pags pa ma shus pa rma med pa/ dri zhim po'i chus bkrus pa dang steng gi cha la me tog bcings te/ slob ma kha shar du phyogs pa la sngags 'dis sbyin par bya'o// oM AHhUM ho haM k+Sha badz+ra
162a6(rgyud 'grel): dan+ta kaSh+TA n+ya turbi mok+to mu kha bi shud+d+hi swa b+ha wak+ShA ya bAg+h+nAM d+ha dz+nyA na mu khadan+ta da ma laM bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya swA hA/ zhes pas te yang gru bzhi pa khru bzhi nga ldan pa la/ ba lang gi lci ba la sogs pa byugs pa'i maN+Dal la oM AHhU~M zhes pa lan
162a7(rgyud 'grel): bdun brjod nas sol brud de bsgyur ro// so shing maN+Dal la lhung ba de gang du phyogs kyi dbye bas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub rtag par bya'o// maN+Dal gyi phyogs su song na dngas grub med do// de nas dri zhim po'i chu bdud
162a8(rgyud 'grel): rtsi lnga dang bcas pas khyor ba gsum blud pa ni/ oM hrIHbi shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma sarba pA pA ni tsa s+ya sho d+ha ya sarba bi kalpan pa na ya hUM zhes brjod pas so// de nas mnyam par bzhag pa la nye bar gnas te/ hUM las byung ba'i ku sha steng gi
162b1(rgyud 'grel): cha ma mnyams pa la de nyid dang yi ge drug pa bzlas pa ni stan gyi don du'o// de ltar yang sngas kyi don du d+hIHlas byung ba de nyid dang yi ge drug pa bzlas so// de yang oM badz+ra ta~Mk+Sha zhes pa brjod la sbyin par bya'o// de nas skud pa dmang po
162b2(rgyud 'grel): sum bsgril hUM las byung ba la de nyid dang yi ge drug pa bzlas te mdud pa gsum byas pa rgyud dang rgyud las gsungs pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis bcing ba ni/ oM bud+d+ha mai trai rak+Sha rak+Sha sar+b+baM swA hA/ zhes brjod pas so// de nas dpral ba dang
162b3(rgyud 'grel): mgrin pa dang snying ga dang / lte ba dang gsang ba dang gtsug tor rnams su oM A hUM ho/ haM k+ShaHzhes pa'i rigs drug rim pa bzhin bkod la sngags 'dis rdo rje sems dpa' bskul ba ste/ oM A A oM aHbadz+ra swatwA ma hA su kha
162b4(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra kA la tsakrA shi Sh+ya sa ya b+hi mu kho b+ha ba san+duSh+Ta b+ha ba/ war do b+ha ba kA ya bAk+ShI t+tA d+hiSh+ThA na ku ru ku ru swAhA/ zhes pas so// de nas 'khor ba la gnas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnyed par dkon te/ de thob pas sdug bsngal ma
162b5(rgyud 'grel): lus pa dang bral bar 'gyur zhes pas 'jigs pa las gzengs bstod pa ni/ mngal du mngal gnas nyid dang skye ba'i dus dang byis pa'i rang bzhin rnams kyis mi bzad sdug bsngal lo// gzhon nu lang tsho dag la
162b6(rgyud 'grel): bud med nor dang bkra shis 'dod pas nyon mongs sdug bsngal chen pos gang // rga dang 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal chen po dag ste slar yang du 'bod la sogs 'gro drug 'jigs ster ba// 'gro ba 'di rnams ma lus sgyu ma la
162b7(rgyud 'grel): rmongs gyur pas sdug bsngal ba las sdug bsngal 'gyur ba'o// 'khor ba'i nang nas gal te mi nyid dag tu gyur kyang chos kyi blo ni brgya lam zhig la'o// de las dge ba'i dbang gi sangs rgyas nyid la rjes chags gyur kyang dang /
162b8(rgyud 'grel): po'i theg par rab tu 'jug/ de las dpal ldan rdo rje'i theg pa dang ni ma lus snying po sgom pa'i blo 'jug brgya lam na'o// de las sangs rgyas nyid de 'dod chags bde ba'i go 'phang la 'jug e ma'o shin tu dka'o// zhes
163a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / bskal pa bye ba grangs med par// gang gi sngon du sdig byas pa// dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra mthong ba yis// de rnams ma lus zad par 'gyur// gang dag spyod pa mchog 'di la/ blo gros shin tu dri
163a2(rgyud 'grel): med pas// sdug bsngal rnams la gnas pa yi// ngan song skye ba 'joms par byed// bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis// rnyed pa mnyam med do rang rnyed// gang zhig rgyal ba sdus bcas pa/ bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams
163a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis// thams cad yongs su bzung bar bgyis// bdag nyid chen por bskyed pa des// khyed rnams theg pa chen po la// legs par bgrod pas 'gyur ba yis// de phyir 'di ni lam gyis mchog/ theg chen 'byung ba'i
163a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhi yin pas// gang zhig 'gro bar 'gyur ba rnams de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur/ zhes pas so// de nas de nyid yi ge drug gis bsrungs la bzlas pa'i don du de nyid byin te nang par snga bur rmi lam smos shis
163a5(rgyud 'grel): ces sgo nas/ yol ba'i phyi rol lam// gnas gzhan du seng ge ltar nyal bar bya'o// 'di ni slob ma lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o// de nas bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gyi lho phyogs su/ oM ho badz+ra ka ma la da
163a6(rgyud 'grel): la gar+b+he sha yai badz+ra su kha ma hA ni traM ka ro mi ya thA tA thA ga ten kr-i ta haHswA hA/ zhes pas nyal sa la lhag par gnas par bya ste/ slob dpon nyal ba ni nub tu mgo bo dang shar du rkang pa'o// gal te bsgoms pa'i stobs
163a7(rgyud 'grel): kyis rmi lam brtags pas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha mo'i tshogs kyi lag na pi waM la sogs pa bzung ba mthong bas dge bar 'gyur ro// yang na rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams thod pa dang gri
163a8(rgyud 'grel): gug phyag na bzung ba dang / khro bo'i rgyal po rnams kyis bdud dang bgegs dang log par 'dren pa la sogs pa rnams rnam par 'joms par byed pa dang / srung ba'i 'khor lo byed pa mthong na dge ba'o// 'on te gang
163b1(rgyud 'grel): yang ma mthong na 'bring po'o// 'on te bdud kyi tshogs rnams bkres pa dang / skom pa dang lus rid bskams pa rnams kyis lag na thod pa dang gri gug bzung ba rnams ni skye bo dam pa rnams la bya ba ma yin pa byed
163b2(rgyud 'grel): par 'dod pas// slob dpon nam slob mas mthong na ngan pa'i mtshan ma'o// de lta bu mthong na slob dpon nya la sa spros te/ dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs kyi sa gzhi la bsdad la srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom pa dang / yang
163b3(rgyud 'grel): de rnams la gsung bar 'gyur ba'i tshogs gtor ma chen po sbyin par bya ba ni/ de yang oM pheM badz+ra DA ki ni badz+ra d+hAtrI shwa ri ga gan swa b+hA wa sarba dra b+hA bi sho d+ha ni sarba dra byan+ti baM sho d+ha ya hUM phe~M phaT/ zhes pa ni bgegs nye bar zhi bar
163b4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i gtor ma sbyang ba'i sngags so// de nas sangs rgyas rnams spyan drang bar bya ba ni sangs rgyas yab dang yum du bcas par gyur pa dang / sras bcas 'khor rnams lhan cig grogs dang 'brel pa rnams// lha dang lha mo'i
163b5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rnams 'dus pas bskor ba yis// dgyes gyur rdo rje sems dpa' mchog nyid gshegs su gsol// zhes pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs la sogs pa rnams rang rang gi khams la gzhug par bya'o// de nas rdo rje mkha'
163b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma rnams spyan drang ba'i sngags 'di lta ste/ oM ha hA hi hI badz+ra b+hai ra wA kaR+Sha yA kaR+Sha ya/ pra we sha ya pra we sha ya/ b+han+d+ha ya b+han+d+ha ya/ to Sha ya to Sha ya/ dzaHhUM baM hoHbadz+ra DA ki ni nAM hri da yaM hUM hUM pheM pheM zhes pas so// de nas rdo
163b7(rgyud 'grel): rje'i phyag rgyas rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams la gtor ma dri dang / me tog dang bdug spos dang / mar me dang mchod yon dang 'bras bu ma nyams pa rnams dang bcas pa gsung bar 'gyur ba'i cho gas sbyin par byas pas phyi rol gyi dur
163b8(rgyud 'grel): khrod kyi sa gzhi la bza' ba dang btung ba byed par bsam mo de nas bdud dang bgegs la sogs pa zhi bar bya ba'i don du rkang pa bcu drug pa phreng ba'i sngags bzlas pa ste/ cho ga 'di thig 'debs pa'i skabs su yang go bar bya'o//
164a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i cho ga'i rim pa'o// de nas nang par snga bar rdo rje slob dpon gyis gtor ma btang ba dang // dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa nas 'thon la slob ma rnams la rmi lam dri bar bya
164a2(rgyud 'grel): ste/ mi dge na phreng ba'i sngags kyis yang dag par bsrung ngo // de nas dkyil 'khor gyi khang par 'jug pa'i dus su bdud la sogs pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i don du sgrub thabs su gsungs pa'i tsho gas srung ba'i 'khor lo sngon du
164a3(rgyud 'grel): song bas// bcom ldan 'das kyis rnal 'byor la dmigs pa dang yan lag drug dgod pa dang / phyag rgya drug dang phyag rgya bzhi dgod par byas la// de nas slob ma rnams kyis/ oM pra wi sha b+ha ga wan ma hA su kha mo k+Sha su
164a4(rgyud 'grel): raM sarba sid+d+hi su kha pra daM pa ra ma su kho d+ha ma sid+d+h+ya dzaHhUM baM hoH/ pra sid+d+ha sA zhes pas gsol ba btab la/ 'jug pa ni bskor ba byas te nub sgo ru bsdad nas dkyil 'khor gyi shwar sgo dbye ba la sogs pa'i sngags 'di lta
164a5(rgyud 'grel): ste/ oM badz+ro d+h+mA Ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha ya thAM tr-i zhes pas so// de nas dkyil 'khor la me tog gi phreng ba 'bul ba'i sngags ni/ oM pa ra ma ma hA su kha sha ya su la lI ta bi la sa mi ta na mi ter+Na mA mi b+ha ga bAn+ta dzaHhUM
164a6(rgyud 'grel): bo hoHhi hi hi he hrIHpra tIts+tsha ku su mAny+dza liM nA thA hoHzhes pas so// slar blangs te rang gi spyi bor bcing ngo // de nas 'khor lo dang bcas pa'i gtso bo bla mar dmigs la dbang bskur ba don du gnyer bas gsol ba gdab
164a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sngags kyi tshig ni/ oM haM haM hai hau hriM hriM huM huM hrIM hU~M/ A I r-I A lA~M badz+ra DA ki n+ya badz+rA mr-i ta ga Ta ya b+hi Shiny+tsa tu maM swA hA/ oM aM iM r-i u~M la~M sarba bud+d+ha badz+ra mu ku TaM ma ma pany+tsa bud+d+hat+ma kaM b+han+d+ha yan+t+ra hUM hUM phaT/ oM a
164a8(rgyud 'grel): A aM aHha hAM haM haHpheM hoHsarba pA ra mi tA ma ma badz+ra pa Ta b+han+d+ha yan+d+ra huM hUM phaT/ oM hUM hoHbi dz+nyA ni dz+nyA na swa b+hA bai kA ru NA pradz+nyAt+ma ka badz+ra badz+ra g+haN+De sa byot+ta ra ka ra yo ra ma ma badz+ra satwaHpradz+nyo da dA tu huM hUM phaT/ oM A A
164b1(rgyud 'grel): e e A Ar o oM a la A la aM AHsarba b+ho d+hi satwAHsab+hA T+Ta sarba trA sarba ka mo ba b+ho ga badz+ra bA taM mA ma dA dAn+ta swAhA/ oM ha hA ya yU ra rA wa wA la lA sarba kro d+ha rA dzAHsap+naR+YAHmai trI kA ru NA mu diSh+Tha u pek+Sha sarbas ma
164b2(rgyud 'grel): tra sA b+hA wi badz+ra pU rbaM ga ma nA ma me dadan+d+ha hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM e pad+ma badz+ri tsih+na pradz+nyo pA yo maN+Da la/ a d+hi pat+ti badz+ra su khaM dz+haiM nA ga ma ma dad taM haM haHhUM hUM phaT/ zhes pas so// de nas dbang bdun rnams kyis dbang bskur bar
164b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid bsam par bya'o// de nas dbang bdun thob par nga rgyal bskyed pa ni/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sap+tA b+hi Sha ka sap+ta b+hU mi prA p+to haM zhes pa ste/ dbang bdun rjes su gnang ba'i cho ga'o// de nas yang sngags pas bum
164b4(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs pa'i dbang gong mngon du gnyer bar bya ba'i tshig 'di lta ste/ oM oM pradz+nyo pa yau ka la shA b+h+r-i She kaM me da dA ti huM hUM phaT/ oM AHpradz+nyo pa yo gu h+ma b+hI She kaM me da dA taM huM hUM phaT oM hUM pradz+nyo pA yau badz+ra satwa pi shwa
164b5(rgyud 'grel): mUtA ro pradz+nyA dz+nyA nA b+hI She kaM ma da dA taM huM hU~M phaT/ zhes pas gsol ba gdab po// de nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i tsho gas bdag nyid la dbang bskur bar bsam mo// de nas de ltar bsams nas oM oM badz+ra satwe na badz+ra ka la shA
164b6(rgyud 'grel): b+hi She ke n+da b+hi Shik+She badz+ra satwa pu tr-i tsa lA b+hU mi lab+h+yo haM/ oM AHbadz+ra satwe na guh+ma b+hi She ke nA b+hi Shek+to badz+ra satwa yu wA ra dzo na wa b+hU mi lab+h+yo haM/ oM hUM badz+ra satwa na pradz+nyA dz+nyA ne nA b+hi She ke nA b+hi Shik+to dwi tI ya badz+ra d+ha ro he d+har+m+ma
164b7(rgyud 'grel): mag+na b+hU mi lab+h+yo he/ zhes pas dbang go ma'i nga rgyal kyi bya ba'i cho ga'o// de nas dbang gong ma bas kyang gong ma'i dbang bzhi pa'i man ngag don du gnyer ba'i sngags kyis tshig 'di lta ste/ oM ho pradz+nyo pa yAt+ma kaM badz+ra'e
164b8(rgyud 'grel): sa na gyi shes tham m+b+ha me A \u0f7f tho pas/ zhas pas gsas ba sa 'as padag/ pa dang thas pa dab ga/ bar sa la pa la/ de sa rdo rjem bas dpa'i rgyal bye ni/ oM /
165a1(rgyud 'grel): / ke nA b+hi Shik+to badz+ra satwa nAt+mA nA taM gnyis pa sa bcu gnyis pa thob pa rdo rje sems dpa' don chen po mchog tu mi 'gyur ba 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo e
165a2(rgyud 'grel): baM yi ge zhes bya ste/ dbang gong ma las kyang gid ma'i cho ga'o// de nas slob dpon gyis bya ba thams cad la rjes su gnang ba thob nas slob ma la dbab par bya ba ni/ bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid shes rab dang thabs kyi dang
165a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin de kho na nyid kyi bstod pa sngon du song bas/ dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub 'dod pa pos bden pa'i byin brlabs bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' las ni byung dang mtshungs// thog ma
165a4(rgyud 'grel): tha ma med pa'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis// dngos grub kun gyi dam pa gsol// mi bskyod rdo rje'i dngos grub ni// dbang po chen po lhag pa'i lha// rgyal ba rdo rje thams cad 'dzin// bdag la dngos grub
165a5(rgyud 'grel): mchog 'gyur gsol// skyon rnams spangs pa'i rtag pa nyid// chags pa che las rjes su chags// chags pa chen po dag pa che// de nyid dngos grub bdag la gsol// shin tu dag pa'i chos kyi mchog/ sngon du
165a6(rgyud 'grel): grol ba'i de bzhin gshegs// kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag/ byang chub sems kyi dngos grub gsol// dbang po chen po phyag rgya che// rdo rje'i dngos grub mchog chen po// dngos grub kun gyis dam pa nyid// sna
165a7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs yum gyi yab kyis gsol// sems can kun gyi yid la khyab// sems can kun gyi snying la gnas// sems can kun gyi yab gyur pa// 'dod pa'i rtse mo dam tshig rtse// bden pa'i ye shes mchog gyur pa//
165a8(rgyud 'grel): shes rab thabs bdag dkyil 'khor gyi// bden pas bdag la mgon po kye// 'dod pa yongs su gang bar mdzod/ zhes pas so// 'di ni slob dpon bdag 'jug gi tshe ga'i rim pa'o// de nas slob ma lhag par
165b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa byas pa rnams khrus byas te/ dri zhim po la sogs pas dag par byas nas brtul zhugs blang bar bya ba ni// gsod dang mi bden pa dang gzhan gyi bud med rnams spang de bzhin gzhan nor chang 'thung dag
165b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang ste// 'khor bar rdo rje zhags pa rang gi dge ba 'joms par byed pa sdig pa lnga po 'di nyid rnams// gang zhig gang gi dus su byung ba'i lha dang mi yi bla ma de yi ming gis rab tu sbyin byas pa'i// sna tshogs gtso bo'i bka'
165b3(rgyud 'grel): stsal 'di yis srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pas khyed rnams kyis kyang bskyang bar bgyi// rgyan 'gyed kha na ma tho bcas pa'i zas dang tshig ngan klog dang 'byung po lha min chos rnams dang // ba lang byis pa bud med skyes
165b4(rgyud 'grel): brnams dang lha dang mi rnams bla ma lnga ni gsad mi bya// grogs dang rje'o dang ni lha dang mi yi bla ma dge 'dun dbugs 'byin rnams la mkhu ba dang // dbang po rnams kyis yongs su chags rnams min te srid pa'i bdag
165b5(rgyud 'grel): po'i brtul zhugs nyi shu rtsa lnga'o// zhes so// de nas yol ba'i phyi rol du slob ma rnams dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bor dmigs pa la oM sarba ta thA ga tA nut+ta ra bod+d+ha laM ka ra bas+t+ra pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA sa s+pha ra na sa ma ye hUM zhes
165b6(rgyud 'grel): pas smad g.yog bcing ngo // oM badz+ra rak+Sha haM zhes pas stod g.yogs la'o// oM badz+roSh+NI Sha hUM phaT zhes pas thod pa la'o// oM dA da shA ga ni ro d+ha ka ri ne huM phaT zhes pas mig ras bcing ngo // A khaM bI ra hUM zhes
165b7(rgyud 'grel): bas me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du gzhug go/ de nas slob mas dkyil 'khor du 'jug yon phul ba dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i drung gis chus gtor te/ snying ga dang mgrin pa dang dpral ba rnams su gdan gsum gyi steng du
165b8(rgyud 'grel): yi ge gsum gyi 'od zer gyi chus dri ma med par byas te/ huM zhes brjod nas dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgo ru gnas pa las kyi rdo rjes gzung ba dang / dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa dri bar bya ba ni/ kye ho bu sdug khyod su yin zhes
166a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lan// bde chen skal ldan bdag lags so zhes pa brjod la de nyid rjod du gzhug/ oM sarba yo ga tsit+ta mud+hA dA yA mi zhes pas/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed la me tog dang bcas pa'i rdo rje snying gar bzhag
166a2(rgyud 'grel): la oM su ra te sa ma ya swA ho sid+d+ha badz+ri ya tha su khaM zhes pa brjod cing rdo rje la 'dzin du gzhug go/ de nas brjod pa/ deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob pas khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
166a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams la smra bar ma byed cig ces brjod la/ oM big+h+nAn+ta krid hUM zhes pas dgug par bya'o// de nas yang A khaM bi ra huM zhes pas yol ba'i nang du bcug
166a4(rgyud 'grel): ste/ oM ma hA rata su dri D+ha su toSh+Tha su su kha badz+ra satwAr+ya sid+d+ha maM zhes brjod cing bskor ba bya'o// de nas thal mo sbyar la sha ra sgo nas brjod pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzo pas+thA na yAt+ma naM nir+ya ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra satwA d+hi tiSh+Tha maM/
166a5(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA karma NA yA ta ma ni ni r+yA ta ya ma~M sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra karma ku ru maM zhes pas so// de nas lho phyogs nas oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA b+hi She ka yAt+ma nai nai r+ya tA ya mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra radA b+hi Shiny+tsa maM zhes pas
166a6(rgyud 'grel): so// de nas nub phyogs nas oM sarba bud+d+ha pu dze bas+thA nA ya/ At+ma na nIr+yA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra bai ro tsa n+da nI tiSh+Tha maM zhes pas so// de nas byang phyogs nas oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dz+nyA pra warta nA yAtwe nir+yA tI ya mi sarba ta thA ga ta
166a7(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra d+harmA pra warta ya maM zhes pas so// de nas yang sher phyogs su 'ong nas/ oM gu ru tsi ra Na pas+thAn+na yAShA ne nir+yA ta ya mi oM sarba satwa pa ri tra nA ya/ at+ma nanai nir+yA ta yA mI zhes pa'i don go bar byas li bklag tu gzhug go//
166a8(rgyud 'grel): de nasa'i yang deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs pas de'i phyir rdo rje ye shes bskyed do// ye shes des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub rnams kyang thob na dngos grub gzhan
166b1(rgyud 'grel): ci smos gal te khyod kyi dam tshig 'das na sdug bsngal chen po ster bar 'gyur bas de'i phyir khyod kyi 'di dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi sngon du smra bar mi bya'o zhes brjod de/ mgo la rdo rje bzhag la dril bu dkrol
166b2(rgyud 'grel): zhing rjod pa/ 'di ni dam tshig rdo rje ste/ gal te spras na mgo bo 'ges/ shes po go bar byas la/ snying gar rdo rje gzung ste/ oM dus kyi 'khor lo khyod nyid kyi// snying la yang dag gnas pa ste/ gal te gzhan la
166b3(rgyud 'grel): spras pa na// de ma thag tu dral te gshegs// shes pa'i bka' stsal byin la rnam rgyal gyi drung mthe bong dang srin lag gis blangs te/ de'i khar sbyin par bya zhing // 'di ni khyod kyis dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig
166b4(rgyud 'grel): bzlas na sreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub thob// 'thung zhig rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu// zhes brjod cing mna' chu blung do// deng nas brtsams te khyod kyi dus kyi 'khor lo nga yin pas nga yis gang bsgo
166b5(rgyud 'grel): bakhyod kyis b+ha dgos so// daphyir bag dang ldan par gyis shig/ mi mthun pas rkyen byas nas dmyal bar ma byed cig ces brjod de// 'di ni dam tshig gi chu'i cho ga'o// de nas dngos grub nges pa'i don du byas la mtshan
166b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid dang ldan pa'i slob ma la lha dbab par bya'o// de yang 'du 'dzi med pa'i gnas su dus kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor la gnas la bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg gis mnyes par bya ste/ dbab pa'i nus pa dang ldan
166b7(rgyud 'grel): pas// slob ma mdun du bzhag la skad cig gis stong par btang ba'i rjes la a yaug las 'od dpag tu med par bskyed de/ oM sarba ta thA ga tashwo d+hi tiSh+ThAn te kA la tsa kro ma ya we sha tu zhes brjod pa dang / de'i lce
166b8(rgyud 'grel): b.ral las byung ba'i sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa ser po 'khor los mtshan pa dus me'i steng du ho ser po'o// snying garo yaM las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor g.yo ba'i ba dan gnyis kyis mtshan pa nag po gzhu'i rnam
167a1(rgyud 'grel): pa sgra gcan gyi steng du hUM nag po'o// mgrin par raM yig las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum dmar po rin po ches mtshan pa nyi me'i steng du aHdmar po'o// dpral bar waM yig las byung ba'i
167a2(rgyud 'grel): chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum la dkar ba bum pas mtshan pa/ zla ba'i steng du oM dkar po rnams rnam par bsgoms te/ bdag nyid kyi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis ye shes dang thugs dang / gsung dang sku'i rdo rje rnams spyan
167a3(rgyud 'grel): drangs la rim pa bzhin du ho hUMHA oM rnams la thim par bsgom par bya'o// de nas rkang pa dag gis 'og tu yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi spar ba'i raM las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor raM gyis mtshan pa dmar po gru gsum pa steng
167a4(rgyud 'grel): du dz+haiHyig ste de dag gi 'od zer gyis bskyod pas ho la sogs pa'i 'od zer yang bskyod nas lus kun yongs su gang bar bsgom zhing // bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i bdug spos kyis bdug cing dril bu dkrol te oM a ra ra ra ra la la
167a5(rgyud 'grel): la la badz+rA we sha ya hUM zhes pas dbab par bya'o// 'di'i 'bras bu rgyud du shes par bya'o// de nas oM AHhUM haM zhes pa'i sngags kyis me tog mgo la bzhag na babs pa de gshegs par 'gyur ro// yang mgo bo dang snying ga dang
167a6(rgyud 'grel): gtsug tor rnams su oM hUM haM rnams thabs kyi'o// lte ba dang mgrin pa gsang ba rnams su hoHaHk+ShaHrnams shes rab rnams kyi'o// 'di ni dbab pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o// de nas slob ma dkyil 'khor la lta ru bcug la mig sngar
167a7(rgyud 'grel): cir snang dris nas// kha dog gi dbye bas phrin las kyi dbye ba go bar bya'o// de nas mthe bong gnyis lag pa g.yas pas rdo rje dang bcas pa bzung la rdo rje'i gar bya zhing rtsa ba'i sngags sam yi ge drug pa bzlas shing bskor ba
167a8(rgyud 'grel): gsum byas te// bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs bya ba ni// 'di ltar dkyil 'khor dam pa 'dir// bdag gi slob ma bcug pa yi// bsod nams gang gis 'di la mdzod// lha rnams rigs kyi rim pa yis// dngos grub ji bzhin
167b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di la 'byung // gang du lhung ba de yi rigs// gang gis bsod nams nus pa yis// de bzhin dkyil 'khor 'di la 'byung // 'di ni mig ras dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o// de nas
167b2(rgyud 'grel): sngon gyi me tog gi phreng ba las me tog gcig phyung ste snyim pa rnam par dag pa'i don du me tog de'i snyim par byin la slob mi de nyid kyi yi ge sbyar bar byas pa'i sdig pa rnam par dag par bsam mo// slob dpon gyis
167b3(rgyud 'grel): kyang de ltar byin gyis brlab pa'o// de nas dad pa dang mos pa sngon du song bas// mdun na gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor la dmigs te dkyil 'khor de ru 'jug par bsams la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ku la bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/
167b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod la/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i mtshan ma rgyal ba'i bum pa'i steng du bzhag pa la 'am/ zad ka la dor ba ste/ de dang dus mtshungs su mig ras bshu bar bya'o// gal te sngon du me tog der nas btsun
167b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di brjod pa ste/ oM daM b+hed+d+hay+YA n+ya tA+e nu ya swAt+ma/ zhes pas mig dbye bar bya'o// me tog gang du ltung ba de nyid rigs kyi lha'o// rigs kyi lha de nyid kyi las kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ro// me \u0f7f
167b6(rgyud 'grel): de nyid byungs la phreng ba la btags te/ oM pra ti gr-ih+Na tA me me sa twa bal zhes pas slob ma'i mgol ga dgas so// de nas kyi rdo rjes ltos shig ces brjod la// lha rnams kyi ming sbyin du song bas dkyil 'khor gyi
167b7(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo la sogs pa bstan pa dang brjod pa/ dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di la ltos// da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed// khyod ni sangs rgyas rigs su 'gro// sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs// dngos grub phun sum tshogs pa dang //
167b8(rgyud 'grel): dmatshig mchog ni thob par 'gyur// rdo rje pad+ma mchog la rol// sngags rnams la ni btsun par gyis// zhes pas go bar byas la oM badz+ra maN+Da la ma hA maN+Dal pra wiSh+Ton// yo ga maN+Da la ma hA maN+Da lA dA rA ti hi/ gu h+ya maN+Dal
168a1(rgyud 'grel): ma hA maN+Da la d+hA k+Shi to haM zhes brjod la dam tshig brjod pa/ hoHhoHhoHzhes pa 'di ni me tog dor ba dang / slob ma la dkyil 'khor bstan cing gzhug pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o// de nas chu la sogs pa'i
168a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba'i don du bla ma'i sngun du slob ma pus mo sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la// dbang mchog dam pa byin pa ltar// bdag kyang bskyab pa'i don gyi phyir// nam mkhar
168a3(rgyud 'grel): rdono sogs dang bdag gsol/ zhes brjod la gsol ba gdab pa'o// de nas slob dben gyis gsung bar 'gyur ba'i rim pas shar gyi sgo ru rnam par bskrad par bya'o// de na saM slob dpon gyis slob ma'i lag pa
168a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa nas bskyod cing las kyi rdo rje dang bcas pas bskor ba bya zhing byang sgor khrid la// der gdan la bsdad de de'i snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis phyogs kun na gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rigs pa'i
168a5(rgyud 'grel): lha mo rnams spyan drangs te/ mchod nas slob ma la dbang bskur ba'i don du// sangs rgyas rnams la rdor 'chang gis// dbang bskur bzhin du 'gro ba rnams// bsgral phyir yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas// de ltar 'di
168a6(rgyud 'grel): la gnang bar zhu// zhes gsol ba btab nas/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab dang bcas pa chags pa chen pos zhu ste// rnam par snang mdzad kyi lam nas zhugs pa dang // rdo rje'i lam nas phyung ste zhu ba de
168a7(rgyud 'grel): yang slob ma'i zhal nas zhugs pas lha mo'i pad+ma na gnas pa skad cig gis sku rdo rje shes rab dang bcas pa'i gzugs ye shes sems dpa' dang / tha mi dad pa la dbang bskur ro// yang zhal dang phyag la sogs pa
168a8(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa'i cha byad can pad+ma nas 'thon pa la spyan ma la sogs pa dang bcas pa nam mkha'i khams gang bar gnas pas gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang / na bza' dang sgra dang gar dang glu dang gur gum
168b1(rgyud 'grel): dang // ga pur dang / me tog la sogs pa'i char dang / byang chub sems kyis gang ba'i bum pa dkar po phyag gis bzung bas/ slob ma de yang pad+ma na sa byung ba la dbang bskur ro// gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa lha mo rnams
168b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi brjod pa/ bkra shis gang gis sems can kun gyi snying la gnas// sems can ma lus rang bzhin kun mkhyen mchog gyur pa// skyed byed kyis byed bde chen ji lta ba bzhin du// de ltar dbang gis mchog gis 'dir ni bkra//
168b3(rgyud 'grel): shis gsol// dpal dang ldan pa'i ri bo dang ni mtshungs pa yi// 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma gsum dang bral// mtsho lasaM byung ba'i pad+ma dang mtshungs sangs rgyas spyan// de yi bkra shis zhi bar byed pa de
168b4(rgyud 'grel): gsol cig/ de yis gsungs pa'i rab mchog g.yo ba med pa yi// mi dang lha yi mchod gnas 'jig rten gsum du grags// chos kyi mchog tu gyur pas 'gro rnams zhi bar mdzod// de yi bkra shis zhi bar byed pa
168b5(rgyud 'grel): de gsol cig/ dam pa'i chos dang ldan zhing thos pa'i bkra shis ldan// dge 'dun mi dang lha dang lha min yon 'bras ster// gang zhig dpal ldan gnas pa'i tshogs kyis mchog gyur pa// de yi bkra shis zhi bar byed/
168b6(rgyud 'grel): bde gsol cig/ ces pa'i bkra shis kyi glu 'di yis nye bar byed pa ste/ bdag nyid la sogs pas kyang ngo // de nas lus dag pa'i don du sbrel ma la sogs pa'i sngags kyis bum pa thams cad nas chu blangs
168b7(rgyud 'grel): te/ rnam rgyal gyi dung por du blugs nas gtsug tor dang / dpung pa'i tshig g.yas pa dang / g.yon pa dang de ltar dpyi mgo'i tshigs dag las/ dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che// khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa//
168b8(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba bzhi ni 'byung ba'i gnas// byin cig sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ zhes pa dang / oM A I r-I U lA~M pany+tsa d+hA tu bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ zhes brjod cing rnam rgyal gyi dung phor gyi chus dbang bskur ba ni khams lnga lnga
169a1(rgyud 'grel): mo lngar bskyed pas so// de nas cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba la yang gnas sngar sngags 'dis dbang bskur ba ni phung po lnga de bzhin gshegs pa lngar bskyed pas oM a i ri u li pany+tsa ta thA ga ta pa
169a2(rgyud 'grel): shud+d+ha swAhA/ zhes pas so// de nas rin po che 'am/ gser ram ras las byung ba'i cod pan la sngags 'di brjod de mgo la bcing bar bya'o// de ltar dbang gnyis kyi khams dang phung po rnam par dag pa ni lus yongs su
169a3(rgyud 'grel): dag pa ste/ 'di ni chu dang cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o// de nas g.yas su bskor te lho skyor khrid la gong ltar gsol ba 'debs pa'i slob ma la ngag rnam par dag pa'i don du gsung rdo rje'i gzugs ye shes
169a4(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' dang tha ma dad pa la dbang bskur po ni rdo rje che// zhes pa la sogs pa brjod la/ oM a A aM AHha hA he haHpheM hoHda sha par ma~M d+hU pa ri pUr Ni swAhA/ zhes pa'i sngags kyi gnas lngang dbang bskur ba
169a5(rgyud 'grel): ni rlung bcu lha mo bcu ru bskyed pas so// de nas rin po che'am gser bI dar dpyangs sam me tog gi phreng ba dpral ba la bcing bar bya'o// de nas de ltar gsol ba btab la rtsa gnyis yab yum gnyis su bskyed pas/
169a6(rgyud 'grel): oM hUM hoHsUr+ya tsan+d+ra bi sho d+hA ni swA hA/ zhes pa'i sngags kyis rdo rje dang dril bu laM mgrol bzhag la gnas lngar dbang bskur ba 'di dag gis rlung dang rtsa dag pa ga rnab par dag pa ste/ dar dpyangs dang rdo rje dril bu'i
169a7(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'i rim pa'o// de nas g.yas bskor gyis shar gyi sgor rdo rje sor gdub byin la shar gyi zhal du yid dag par bya ba'i phyir snga ma ltar gsol ba btab la thugs rdo rje'i gzugs ye shes
169a8(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' dang tha mi dad pa la// thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// kun tu bzang po kun rang bzhin// sna tshogs yum gyi bdag po mchog/ ces pas bcom ldan
169b1(rgyud 'grel): 'das dang po'i skyes bu go bar byas te/ oM a A ai ai ar Ar o au a la Al aM aHbi Sha yen+d+ri ya bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ zhes pa'i sngags kyis de kho na'i rang bzhin rdo rje byin la de nas gnas sngar dbang bskur
169b2(rgyud 'grel): ba ni dbang po dang yul rnams sems dpa' dang sems mar bskyed pas so// de nas rna ba la sogs la me tog byin nas de nas ming gi dbang bskur ba ni gsol ba gdab pa dang / las kyi dbang po dang de'i yul rnams khro
169b3(rgyud 'grel): bo dang khro mor bskyed pas/ oM ha hA ya yA wa wA la lA tsa tur+thah+ma bau hA ra bi shud+d+ha swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis gnas sngar dbang bskur la// de nas lag pa dang rkang pa rnams la lag gdub bam/ me tog gi phreng ba
169b4(rgyud 'grel): bcings la// srid pa'i ngan 'gro las bton nas// srid pa mchog tu zhi bya'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bdag gis khyod ni lung bstan gyi// ta thA ga ta sid+d+ha sa ma ya s+t+waM b+hA b+hU baHsraHzhes
169b5(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa ni me tog lhung ba'i sgo nas rang gi rigs kyi ming gis lung bstan pa naM/ ba rAr+ya dang / a nu pa ma dang / su ra ta dang / sa ma ra sa dang / bi dza ya dang / a la la dang / satwa dang ki/ mA hA su kha da / a naM ga dang / dzA
169b6(rgyud 'grel): na dang / sA hA dza badz+ra zhes pa rdo rje sems dpa'i ming bye brag ste mthar rdo rje kun la go bar bya'o// mi bskyod pa'i hA sa dang / bi la sa dang / ra ti dang / li lA dang / la li ta dang / swa yaM bu dang / dwe Sha dang / he dang / ka r+ra
169b7(rgyud 'grel): Na dang / tsit+ta dang / hUM kar dang / ak+Sho b+hA badz+ra/ zhes pa rnams so// don yod grub pa'i/ a mo g+ha dang / pa ra mA shwa dang / sa ma ya dang / pA ra mi ta dang / karma dang / a ni la dang / spang sha dang / ir+tha zhes pa rnams so//
169b8(rgyud 'grel): rin chen 'byung ldan gyi/ rat+na dang / tsin+ta ma ni dang / kha dang / ga gan dang / ta dze dang / mAr+har+b+ba dang / b+ha sa ka ra dang / mAn zhes pa rnams so// rnam par snang mdzad kyi/ bai ro tsa na dang / oM kA ra dang / sha shA ta dang /
170a1(rgyud 'grel): ta thA ga ta dang / mA yA dang / bud+d+ha dang / rU ba dang / ka ya badz+ra zhes pa rnams so// 'od dpag med kyi/ rA gA dang a ba lo ki dang // d+har+m+mo dang / pad+ma dang / badz+re kur dang / pad+mi kur dang / su ra ta aM ku ra dang /
170a2(rgyud 'grel): ka ra Na kur dang / pad+mA nan+ta dang / su ratrA nan+ta dang / a mi ta dang pAg badz+ra zhes pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i// be gi dang / be la si ni dang / ba d+hA dang / ko kAn+na dang / a na na dang / pA dA kA dang / mA lA dang
170a3(rgyud 'grel): badz+ro ta ya zhes pa rnams so// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i/ badz+ra ha ra dang / swa s+tha dang / dzA li dang / mA lA dang / A k+Sha sA dang / badz+rA k+Sha sa ra ti zhes pa rnams so// mA ma kI'i/ At+ma dang / hasta dang / a wA lI dang / ka rA
170a4(rgyud 'grel): dang / badz+ramA mak+Shi dang / dwe Sha ra tI zhes pa rnams so// sgrol ma'i/ garba dang / mA yA dang / ba Di wa dang / tA rA dang / badz+ra nar+b+he shwa rI dang / saM ma ya badz+ra dang / badz+ra ra ti zhes pa rnams so// spyan ma'i/ Da ki ni dang / gau ri dang / lA s+ya
170a5(rgyud 'grel): dang / lo tsa na dang / badz+ra mo ha ra ti zhes pa rnams so// gos dkar mo'i rA ga dang / gi ta dang / a ho su kha dang / bai tA li dang / ma ti dang / ha s+yA dang / pAN+DA ri dang / badz+ra rA ga ti zhes pa rnams kyi dang po rdo rje dang ldan par byas
170a6(rgyud 'grel): te/ 'di rnams kyis yid rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i brtul zhugs dang ming gi dbang gi cho ga'i rim pa'o// de nas de ltar g.yas skor du khrid la nub kyi zhal du ye shes dag pa'i don du slob mas gsol ba gdab pa dang / ye shes rdo
170a7(rgyud 'grel): rje'i sku ye shes sems dpa' dang tha mi dad pa ye shes dang rnam par shes pa yab yum gnyis su bskyed la/ oM haM k+ShAHdz+nyA na bi sho d+ha ni d+har+m+ma tsakra pra brta k+Sha swA hA/ zhes pa ste d+hArmA'i gnas su badz+ra dang khan+d+ha dang / rat+na dang tsaH/
170a8(rgyud 'grel): dang pad+ma rnams bcug la lan lnga ru brjod cing // gnas lnga ru dbang bskur ba ye shes rnam par dag pa ste/ de nas slob mi bstan la bsnga'ad pa la b+h+rUM las byung ba'i chos 'akyi 'khor lo badz+ra he tu mi zhes brjod de rkang pa
170b1(rgyud 'grel): dag la byin nas/ dbyangs yig tha ma las byung ba'i dung / oM badz+ra b+hA Sha raM zhes pa brjod de lag pa g.yas su gtad do// dbyangs yig dang po las byung ba'i pu tI a zhes brjod cing g.yon par ro// yang a las byung ba'i
170b2(rgyud 'grel): dril bu de nyid brjod cing lag pa g.yon du btad de/ thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ nam mkha' nyid la mtshan nyid med// nam mkha' dang ni ma tshungs pa ste/ kun gyi mchog de mnyam nyid gsal// ding nas bsams
170b3(rgyud 'grel): pa tsam gyis ni// chos kyi dung ni bla med pa// kun tu gang ba byed bzhin pas// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// zhes brjod pa dang / sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir// 'jig rten ma lus thams cad la//
170b4(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar 'dul ba chos rnams kyis// 'khor lo rab tu bskor bgyis// shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin dag/ yid bzhin nor bu dang mtshungs par// ngal med dmigs pa rnams dang bral// sems can don rnams de
170b5(rgyud 'grel): ring gyis/ zhes brjod do// des kyang phyag byas te brjod pa/ mnga' bdag gsung ba de ltar bgyi/ zhes pa/ 'di ni rjes su gnang ba'i cho ga'i rim pa'o// de nas oM hrAM hU~M b+h+rUM hUM b+h+rUMHswAhA/ zhes pa dang / oM AHhuM hoH
170b6(rgyud 'grel): k+ShaHzhes pa dang / de ltar phreng ba'i sngags la sogs pa rnams lan gsum brjod de sbyin pa ni// bcom ldan bdag gis sbyin byas pa// 'di la nye bar gnas par bgyis/ zhes pa'i tshig go// slob mas brjod
170b7(rgyud 'grel): pa/ bdag gi bcom ldan 'das blangs pas/ 'di la nye bar gnas par gyis zhes pas blangs te 'di ni sngags rjes su gnang ba'o// de nas gser ram dngul las byas pa'i snod du mar dang sbrang rtsi'i mig sman gser
170b8(rgyud 'grel): las byas pa'i thur mas blangs te/ slob ma'i mig tu pra yig bsams la/ oM badz+ra ne tA pa ha rab tra laM hriHzhes pa brjod cing bskur bar bya zhing / ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis// 'jig rten rab rib gsal ba
171a1(rgyud 'grel): ltar// bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa'i// rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyi gsal// zhes pa 'di ni mig sman gyi cho ga'i rim pa'o// de nas me long mngon par blangs te aHmngon par bzlas shing slob ma la bstan
171a2(rgyud 'grel): cing brjod la// chos rnams gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs par// dag cing gsal la dri ma med// gzung bya med cing brjod bya med// rgyu dang las las yang dag byung // dus 'khor me long gnas mtshungs par// dag cing
171a3(rgyud 'grel): gsal la dri ma med// sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso bo ste// bu khyod snying la yang dag gnas// khyod la 'dren pa'i spyan ldan pas// ngo bo med cing gnas med pa// 'di ltar chos rnams shes gyis la// sems can don ni
171a4(rgyud 'grel): mnyam med kyis// shes pa ni me long gi tshe ga'i rim pa'o// de nas ho yig las byung ba'i gzhu ho zhes pa byin la yang / oM sarba ta thA ga tA nA na nu rA gA ya swA hA zhes brjod par bgyi'o// slob mas kyang mda' bkang bzhin
171a5(rgyud 'grel): pas/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA na na nu rA ga ya mi zhes brjod cing / blos bgegs la 'bugs par bsam zhing phyogs mtshams snying 'og rnams su'o// 'di ni mda' gzhu'i cho ga'i rim pa'o// de nas slob ma la kye rdo rje che ge mo
171a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod de rdo rje dang dril bu byin la mchog gi snying rjes dag pa'i chos rnams bstan par bya/ rdo rje'i rigs su nges par srog gcod pa dang ral gri mi bden pa'i ngag brjod bya ba dang / rin chen du ni gzhan nor 'phrog dang mchog
171a7(rgyud 'grel): gi pad+ma'i rigs nyid du yang gzhan gyis bud med 'phrog/ 'khor lor chang dang mar me sangs rgyas rnams dang yul rnams mtha' dag shin tu bsten par bya'o// gri gug tu ni gdol ba mo la sogs pa bud med mtha' dag mkha'
171a8(rgyud 'grel): yi smad smad mi bya// sems can rnams kyi don du nor dang lus bcas sbyin bya 'di ni khyod kyis bsrung bar bya ba min// rigs kyi bu rnams gzhan du bskal pa grangs med pas kyang sangs rgyas min par rgyal bas gsungs par nges/
171b1(rgyud 'grel): chu yi sgrol ma la sogs lha mo rnams dang dbu rgyan rgyal ba rnams te dar dbyangs nus ma rnams// rdo rje dril bu nyi zla dag dang brtul zhugs yul sogs rnams dang ming gi byams pa sogs su sbyong // rjes gnang rdzogs
171b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i byang chub dpal ldan srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa dus kyi 'khor lo rjes khyab pa// de ltar dbang bdun rnams kyi sdig pa'i dri ma 'joms pas dkyil 'khor nyid du yang dag rab tu sbyin// de nas ras kyi yol ba
171b3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pas dben par byas pa'i gnas su gzugs dang lang tshe dang ldan pa dam tshig dang ldan pa lo bcu gcig pa nas nyi shu'i bar ram/ de med na gzhan phyag rgya ma bum pa'i dbang la sogs pa'i don du phul la thal
171b4(rgyud 'grel): me sbyar te bla ma dus kyi 'khor lor dmigs pa// sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa yi// dus 'khor khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mchog tu mi 'gyur ba des gang ba// ye shes sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// stong dang snying rje dbyer
171b5(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i// byang chub sems gang mi 'gyur ba// mgon po bdag la dbang de yis// da lta nyid du bka' drin mdzod// bu dang chung ma sogs bcas pas// thams cad du ni khyod kyi 'bangs// ji srid byang chub
171b6(rgyud 'grel): snying po'i bar// bdag la skyabs ni gzhan ma mchis/ zhes pa dang bcas pas gsol ba btab pa dang / de nas bla mas dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas/ slob ma sku rdo rje'i gzugs dang / rig ma tha mal
171b7(rgyud 'grel): gyi rang bzhin dag pa'i yongs su rdzogs pa'i lha mo'i gzugs kyi sgeg pa dang chags pa'i lta bas nu ma la reg tu gzhug pa'o// 'di ni lus rnam par dag pa bum pa'i dbang gi cho ga'i rim pa'o// de nas de ltar ba
171b8(rgyud 'grel): rgyal dang ldan pas// de la gsol ba btab pa dang / slob mas phul ba stong pa'i ngang las lha mo'i gzugs su bskyed la rdo rje dang pad+ma byin gyis brlabs pa sngon du song bas snyoms par 'jug par bya zhing / oM sa
172a1(rgyud 'grel): / ta thA ga tA nu rAgA Na badz+ra swa b+hA bAt+ma ko he zhes brjod la sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis sgrol ma la sogs pa dang / mnyam par sbyar ba'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag nyid
172a2(rgyud 'grel): lazhugs pas chags pa chen pos zhu nas a ba d+hU tA nas song ste/ rdo rje nor bur lhan cig skyes pa brtan par byas pa pad+ma nas byung ste/ mthe bong dang mthe chung dag gis gzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i khub dang
172a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid kyi byang chub kyi sems tha mi dad par go bar byas la/ slob ma gsung rdo rje'i khar dbab pa ni/ de yang sngon gyi sangs rgyas sras rnams la// rdo rje 'dzin pas dbang bskur ltar// byang chub sems ni yid 'ong bas// da
172a4(rgyud 'grel): ltar bunams bus gsol cig ces pa dang / ngargyal grIs sngags pa dubasas// slob mdes rnam par srung ba da la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdzogs kyi thas tsam pa de po che 'azhis brnyad cing babang gi/
172a5(rgyud 'grel): shes rab kyis kyang na bza' dang bral bar langs te rang gi pad+ma'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i thig le dang me tog de nyid kyi khar dbab pa'o// des kyang de ltar btung bar bya ste shes rab dang thabs kyi kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems gsang
172a6(rgyud 'grel): ban gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'o// 'di ni ngag rnam par dag pa gsang ba'i dbang gi cho ga'i rim pa'o// de nas slob mas kyi bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad thob pa da ni bdag gis ji ltar bgyi zhes bzod pas//
172a7(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon gyi bka' bsgo ba ltar gsol ba btab pa'i slob ma la gzugs la sogs pa yang dag par ldan pa'i shes rab de'i sna rtse 'jibs te/ snyoms par zhugs la chags pa dang ldan pas byas te/ de bstan cing / 'di de 'dzin par/
172a8(rgyud 'grel): byed cing mdzes// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsten byar gsungs// sbyor bas 'khor lo la dbab cing // dam pa'i bde bas ro mnyam myong // rdo rje la gnas byang chub sems// nor bu'i mthar ni blta bar bya// zhes pa dang /
172b1(rgyud 'grel): las kyi phyag rgya rab 'dus dang // ye shes phyag rgya rjes chags pas/ byang chub sems brtan brtul zhugs kyis// bde ba chen por bsrung ba ni// b+ha gar mtshan ma rab gnas te// byang chub sems ni mi 'dzag pas//
172b2(rgyud 'grel): srid pa gsum po ma lus pa// sangs rgyas skur ni bsgom par bya// zhes brjod cing gtad pa'o// shes rab mas kyang gur gum la sogs pa'i dri zhim pos lus byug ste/ slob ma la chu skyes bstan cing / kye ma bdag
172b3(rgyud 'grel): gi pad+ma 'di// bde ba dang bcas ma lus pa// gang gis cho ga bzhin bsten na// de yi mdun du bdag gnas pas// ji ltar 'dod bzhin pad+ma spyod// sangs rgyas mnyes pa la sogs phyir// bdag ni bde chen rgyal
172b4(rgyud 'grel): po ste// 'di ni rgyun du gnas pa'i phyir// mthar ba'i bsnyen pas mnyes par gyis// slob ma de nyid kyang lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas// oM AHn+d+ra swA hA// zhes pa rnams dpral ba dang mgrin pa dang snying ga dang gsang
172b5(rgyud 'grel): ba dang gtsug tor rnams su bkod la// rigs lnga'i tshogs kyi bdag nyid kyi gzugs su gnas la AHhUM dag las byung ba'i pad+ma rdo rje mtshan paM/ b+h+rUM AHrdo rje pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad kyis mtshan par dmigs
172b6(rgyud 'grel): la/ gzhon pa'i g.yon gyi rgyu 'dzub mo'i rtse mo la gyi dmar po bsams la bskyed pa ni/ wA'-i shrIgs bad+d+hod byas so// de nas oM sh+tha shrI shrI h+Na h+Na h+Na swA d+ha zlas pa dang / oM sarba b+hag d+hanA rAg N+Da badz+ra swAb+hU wAH
172b7(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa hUM phaT dang ldan pa brjod cing bla ma'i gdams ngag las dga' ba'i dbye bas go bar byas la/ sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis spyan drangs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas lus byin gyis brlabs te/ bla mas kyang rnam
172b8(rgyud 'grel): bar snang mdzad la sogs pa grangs med pa spyan drangs te/ ro gcig tu gyur pas mnyes par bya'o// de yang sku gsung thugs dang chags pa rnams// dpral ba la sogs rnams su dgod// swA hA gsang ba gtsug
173a1(rgyud 'grel): tor du// de nas pad+ma rnams sbyangs bya// a las pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa/ hUM las rdo rje dang ldan pa// de ltar rdo rje dang bcas pa// shes rab thabs kyi rgyu nyid do// hUM las bdag gis rdo rje nyid//
173a2(rgyud 'grel): rje lnga pa ru bsams par bya// de dbus pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa// a yig la ni rab tu brtag/ de ltar pad bcas rdo rje nyid// pad+ma la ni bzhag par bya// rnal 'byor pa de hUM phaT brjod// mngal du rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyu// b+ha gar
173a3(rgyud 'grel): ling ga rab gnas pas// byang chub sems ni spro mi bya// khams gsum po ni ma lus pa// sangs rgyas gzugs su bsgom par bya// zhes pa'i don go bar bya zhing ji ltar rigs par bzung ste/ dal gyis btang bas pad+ma/
173a4(rgyud 'grel): nas lce yi blangs la de kho na'i blos dam tshig gi rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems btung bar bya'o// 'di ni yid rnam par dag pa shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi cho ga'i rim pa'o// de nas tshig dbang rin po che sbyin pa zhes bya
173a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i don gyi khyad par gyi dga' ba'i mtha' ste/ byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pas thig le gsum gyis mthar rab tu skyes pa nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i rang bzhin de kho na chos thams cad bsam du med pa rdo rje 'dzin pa chen
173a6(rgyud 'grel): po'i rang bzhin la dbang bzhi par brjod do zhes pas so// de nas tshogs kyi 'khor lo bya ste gshegs su gsol la slob mo la sdom pa byin pa ni/ nga yis bstan pa'i kun rdzob bye brag tu dga' ba'i mtha' lhan cig skyes pa'i
173a7(rgyud 'grel): skad cig gang thig le gsum gyi mtha' de don dam pa ma yin te/ don dam pa ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi bde ba mi 'dzag pa ste de bas na khyod kyis srungs shig/ de bzhin du dang po'i sangs rgyas su bcom ldan 'das kyis
173a8(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa/ las kyi phyag rgya rab 'dus dang // ye shes phyag rgya rjes chags pas// byang chub sems brtan brtul zhugs kyis// bde ba chen por bsrung ba ni// b+ha gar mtshan ma rab gnas te// byang chub sems ni mi
173b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzag pas// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// 'di las dam pa'i ye shes med// khams gsum dbang phyug dam pa ste// stong dang snying rje dbyer med pa// rang gzhan don ni rab sgrub byed// skyob pa kun gyi sdom pa ni//
173b2(rgyud 'grel): gang tshe nga yis bu stong na// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs nas// de yis byang chub thob par 'gyur// gal te chags pa'i dbang phyur bdag/ khyab bdag sngon du gzung ba yi// sdom pa stong bar mi byed na// de ni d+ha
173b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bod du ni 'gro/ gang tshe sems dman skye gnas su// byang chub sems 'dzag gyur pa na// phyag rgya'i pad+ma'i phyi rol nas// rang lces blang bar shes par bya// zhes pa'o// 'di ni ye shes dag pa dbang bzhi pa'i tshe
173b4(rgyud 'grel): ga'i rim pa'o// de nas slob ma'i lag par shes rab kyi lag pa gtad la/ de nas bdag nyid kyis lag pa g.yon pas bzung la g.yas pas rdo rje dang bcas pa slob ma'i mgo la bzhag ste gtad la/ 'di'i dbang
173b5(rgyud 'grel): po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yin pas shes de ltar byas la/ thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs rgyas min// khams gsum 'di yis dag 'gyur bas// de phyir 'di dang sbyor ba las// nam yang 'bral bar ma byed cig//
173b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rigs pa'i brtul zhugs bla na med// rmongs pa 'ga' zhig 'das pa na// dngos grub dam pa med par 'gyur// zhes brjod la rig pa'i brtul zhugs sbyin par bya'o// 'di ni rig pa'i
173b7(rgyud 'grel): rdul zhugs kyi cho ga'o// de nas dbang thams cad thob pa dang thos pa dang / bsams pa dang bsgoms pa las byung ba'i rgyud kyi don thams cad bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi lam dpal gyi bla ma khyed kyi bka'
173b8(rgyud 'grel): drin gyis ding ngas shes pas ding nas brtsams nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang khyod spangs bla ma gzhan la gus par mi bya'o// de ltar dam bcas nas/ de nas bla ma la gsol ba gdab pa ni// sngon gyi
174a1(rgyud 'grel): tshigs su bcad pas so// de nas lhag pa'i bdag po'i don du cho ga 'di lta ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa'i phyi rol du sa gzhi mnyam pa'i cha la khru bzhi'i bar la ba lang gi lci ba la sogs pa byugs la
174a2(rgyud 'grel): tshon sna lnga yis rab byas te/ de'i dbus su khru pa'i gdan gyi steng du pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bris la de'i steng du slob dpon dge slong bzhag la gzugs bzang brgyan dang ldan pa bum skyes pa'i bu mo brgyad/ gzhon nu ma gnyis rnam
174a3(rgyud 'grel): par rgyal ba'i bum pa dang bcas pas cod pan dang dar dpyangs dang phyag rgya dang bcas pas bcings la khrus bya'o// dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sdig mdzub dang chos gos mthong bas gdug pa de rnams 'og tu 'gro ba'o zhes so// de
174a4(rgyud 'grel): ltar ra kha lnga dang ldan pa'i dbus su pad+ma dang bral ba'i gdan la slob dpon dge tshul bzhag pa la phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i dar dbyangs byin la/ bu mo bzhi dang gzhon nu ma gnyis kyi khrus bya'o// de ltar ro kha gsum dang ldan pa'i
174a5(rgyud 'grel): dbus su thamal pa'i gdan la slob dpon khyim pa bzhag pa la phyag rgya byin te/ rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa gcig pus gzhon nu ma gcig gis khrus bya'o// 'di ni mcho ga dang bar ma dang tha ma'i slob dpon gyi dbang gi tshe ga'o// de
174a6(rgyud 'grel): nas dbang gong ma'i gong ma'i don du slob mas slob dpon la phyag rgya bcu gtad de/ de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa/ tsha ma dang bu mo dang / sring mo skyed byed ma de bzhin// chung ma'i ma de sgyug mo nyid// de bzhin du ni zhang ne mo//
174a7(rgyud 'grel): pa yi de bzhin spun chung ma// bskyod byed kyi ni sring mo dang // rang gi ma yi spyan nyid dang // rang gi chung ma mchog gzugs can// sgron ma la sogs cho ma khams mthar// rig ma bcu rnams ring gi skyes// thar pa 'dod pa'i khyim pa/
174a8(rgyud 'grel): yis// dbang gi dus su rab sbyin bya// gang zhig rigs ni 'di bsrungs pas// bla la rigs ma mi 'bul na// de la dbang ni sbyin mi bya// gzhan du na ni khyim nas min// dkyil 'khor rnams su dbang bskur ba'i// gzhan yang dmangs
174b1(rgyud 'grel): rigs skyes mchog rnams// dge slong dge tshul rnams la yang // bla mas sbyin no mi bdag kye// rlung sngogs rim pas dmangs rigs dang // rgyal rigs bram ze de bzhin du// rje'u rigs g.yung mo nyam dang // gar
174b2(rgyud 'grel): mtsho so ma de bzhin du// ko lpags mkhan dang gtum mo dang // chos khams mthar de bcu po rnams// rig ma chen mor yang dag bshad// zos dang grol 'bras rab tu ster// zhes pas 'di thams cad sngon du song ba
174b3(rgyud 'grel): ltar dmangs rigs la sogs pa phyag rgya bcus dge slong la'o// de rnams kyis nang nas drug gis dge tshul bgyi'o// rang gi chung ma gcig pus khyim pa la'o// 'di ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'o//
174b4(rgyud 'grel): lhag ma rnams ni snga ma ltar ro// chu la sogs pa'i dbang bdun gyis sa bdun du lung bstan pa dge bsnyen no// bum pas brgyad pa mi g.yo bar lung bstan pa dge tshul gzhon nu'i zhes pas so// gsang bas legs
174b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i blo gros su lung bstan pa dge slong sangs rgyas kyi sras rgyal tshab bo// shes rab ye shes kyis chos kyi sprin du lung bstan pa gnas brtan te sangs rgyas gnyis pa'o// de nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams rdo rjer bya/
174b6(rgyud 'grel): bA'i don du gser las byas pa'i mchod phyir thogs dang / phyag rgya dang / drar dpyangs dang / cod pan rnams ni bum pa dang / gsang ba shes rab ye shes te gong ma'i gong ma'i drab gi tshe ga'i rim pa'o// de nas shar
174b7(rgyud 'grel): gyi sgo ru slob ma'i steng du gdugs bzung la g.yas su bskor ba byed bzhin pas/ thal mo sbyar byas dkyil 'khor skor// gdugs dang bcas pas mchod pa la// slob ma 'di ni khyod la gtad// rgyud kyi 'dzin pa po ru
174b8(rgyud 'grel): mdzod// ces dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo la de ltar gsol ba btab pa dang / gdugs gzhon du bzhag la slob ma'i yid la 'dod pa sbyin par bya ste/ da ni dkyil 'khor slob dpon 'gyur// sngags dang rgyud kyi
175a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa khyod// sangs rgyas rnams dang byang chub sems// lha rnams kun kyang mnyes par 'gyur// sems can kun la brtse ba yis// cho ga bzhin dkyil 'khor khyod nyid kyis// shin tu rtsol bas
175a2(rgyud 'grel): bri bar bya// sgrub pa po yi rgyud la zhugs// gsang chen mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// mchog tu blta zhing zhugs pa yis// de ring khyod kyi sdig pa rnams// ma lus grol nas yang dag gnas// gzhan yang khyod la 'pho ba med// bde
175a3(rgyud 'grel): chan theg pa 'di nyid kyis// 'khor ba shin tu dag byas nas// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams las log/ tshe ldan di ring dbang nyid kyis// sangs rgyas kun dang rdo rjer bcas// khams gsum kun gyi rgyal srid kyi// rje bor khyod
175a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid nges pa'o// 'dod chags bral ba'i sdig lta bu// khams gsum na ni yod pa min// de phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba// khyod kyis nam yang bya ba min// chags pa kun la nye bar spyod// bde ba nam yang 'jig ma byed// sha lnga/
175a5(rgyud 'grel): bdud ci dang bcas s+ho// dmache ga nam yadang de bzhin bzung // breg gcod pananam yang min// dpal gyi rin chen spyad mi g+sa// sdom pa snang bar ma b+ha zhing // khyod kyi slob dpon mo snang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs
175a6(rgyud 'grel): paltar// mi bya ba ni ci yang med// shes rab thabs kyi sems ldan pas// khyod la sdig med 'jigs mi dgos// zhes pa'i chos nyid 'dis chog rje lta ba bzhin dbang bskur nas/ bu gcig pa la brtse ba ltar sangs rgyas dang /
175a7(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' brje ba'i sems kyis dge bar dgongs pa 'di ni dbugs dbyung ba'i tshi ga'i rim pa'o// de ltar slob ma dbang thob cing dbugs byung bas 'di ltar bya ste/ de ring bdag skyes 'bras bur bcas// bdag ni
175a8(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu dang bcas srog/ di ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes// di ring sangs rgyas sras su gyur ces brjod do// de nas dbul ba ni/ glang po dang na dang rin po che dang gser dang gos dang rgyan dang baM lang dang / ma he dang / bran pho dang
175b1(rgyud 'grel): bran mo dang yid du 'ong ba'i chung ma dang bu dang bu mo la sogs pa ji ltar 'byor pa bla ma la gus pas dbul bar bya'o// de nas nyin mo'i dus su gzhon nu dang gzhon nu ma bcu la 'o ma la sogs pa mngar ba'i ston mo bya'o// chu tshod
175b2(rgyud 'grel): bdun song ba dang / dge slong dang dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la nya sha la sogs pa spangs pa'i mngar bas mnyes par byas te yon phul la lha khang du gshegs su gsol lo// bug pa med pa bar du gcod pa med pa 'du 'dzi med pa'i
175b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas su mtshan mo nyi ma rgas pa'i dus su rigs sum cu so drug gi dpa' bo dang dpa' ma'i dbang phyug ma rnams gzhan gyis ma tshor bar zhugs la dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rim pas gnas pa ni/ dbus su ba lang
175b4(rgyud 'grel): stag gi pags pa'i gdan la shes rab dang bcas pa'i gtso bo ste/ slob dpon bsdad cing mi'i pags pa'i snod do// de'i g.yas phyogs su mi'i pags pa'i steng du g.yung mo'o// phyogs rnams la khyi dang rta dang ba lang
175b5(rgyud 'grel): dang glang po che'i pags pa'i spyan rnams la dmangs rigs ma dang / rgyal rigs mo dang bram ze mo dang rje rigs ma rnams so// mtshams rnams kyi byang shar nas dri chu dang dri chen dang khrag dang rkang rnams kyi snod rnams so// de
175b6(rgyud 'grel): nas thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su bskor ba'i phyogs rnams su lug dang nags kyi khyi dang rnga mo dang 'dam seng ge'i pags pa rnams la khar mgar ma dang / um bi'i steng du gar byed ma dang nor bu byed ma dang khron pa byed
175b7(rgyud 'grel): ma rnams so// mtshams rnams la ra dang ri dwags dang bong bu dang phag pa'i pags pa'i stan rnams la thag ma dang / chang 'tshong ma dang gser mgar ma dang phreng ba ma rnams so// de nas gsum pa gsung gi 'khor lo'i
175b8(rgyud 'grel): gnas la phyogs dang mtshams rnams la chu srin kum b+hI ra dang / 'gron bu'i phung po dang / ka ka ri'i phung po dang / nya skam dang / chu srin dang / sbal ba dang / rus sbal khog pa dang / dung gi gdan rnams lar bshan
176a1(rgyud 'grel): pa ma dang bum pa byed ma dang / khur ba byed ma dang / smad 'tshong ma dang / 'khyogs mkhan ma dang / nyab ma dang / gar ma dang / khrus mkhan ma rnams so// de nas bzhi pa'i yongs su bskor ba'i phyogs su
176a2(rgyud 'grel): bse dang / stag dang / dred dang dom rnams kyi pags pa la lcags mgar ma dang / rgya skegs mkhan ma dang / srin bal mkhan ma dang / mar khu mkhan ma rnams so// mtshams rnams su me'i mtshams nas 'bri dang / ce spyang ma
176a3(rgyud 'grel): dang sram dang byi la'i pags pa rnams/ skug mkhan ma dang shing mkhan ma dang / ke lpags mkhan ma dang / 'dreg mkhan ma rnams so// yongs su bskor ba lnga po la go d+hU ba dang byi ba dang / sA li dzA ta ka dang spre'u rnams la/ k+Sha
176a4(rgyud 'grel): klo ma dang mi gtsang 'phyag ma dang dur khrod gnas ma dang / tshen rtsi ma rnams so// mtshams kyi me mtshams nas ri bong dang / gzungs mo dang / i shu ka pa shu dang / sbal ba rnams la ko sgyu ma dang / mthum dang / mi rgod
